					Director, Electrical Engineering - Northridge, CA
				</h1>
				<div class="subtitle">
					<div class="flg_hldr">

					<div class="job_description">
						
						
						

						

						
						
						

						
						
							
								<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b>POSITION DESCRIPTION:</b></p><p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px">This Director will focus on electrical engineering R&amp;D specifically within the Insulin Pump, Continuous Glucose Monitoring, and Peripheral Communication hardware while serving as the functional and project leader who will drive technical excellence in engineering research, technology development, and product development. The job requires strong leadership and analytical skills combined with a solid understanding of product development and cross-functional collaboration.</p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px">Director will lead a team of engineers and support staff.&nbsp; The Director and Team are responsible for researching, designing, developing, and testing electrical components, equipment, systems, networks and products.&nbsp; Additionally the Director will build an organization and&nbsp; team to handle the ever changing and dynamic environment within the Type 1 Diabetes medical device space. </p><p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><br></p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b></b></p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b>POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES:</b></p><p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px">&nbsp;Creates an organization to meet near term goals and objectives while balancing long term strategic needs.&nbsp;&nbsp; Able to institute change and prepare an organization for the future.<br>&nbsp;Champions and implements process improvements towards product development effectiveness by promoting the use of predictive analysis tools, effective design reviews, rapid prototyping methods, and other best practices.&nbsp; <br>&nbsp;Drives adoption of the Medtronic Design, Reliability, and Manufacturability (DRM) principles into the organization.<br>&nbsp;Evaluates new information with existing information/ paradigms to create new and innovative ideas/ways of doing things.<br>&nbsp;Builds functional bench strength and recruits, retains and develops top technical talent.&nbsp; Staffs and develops a flexible, high-performing workforce which may include contractors. <br>&nbsp;Participates in strategic planning and actively owns technology development of electrical hardware<br>&nbsp;Identifies, participates in negotiations, and manages external resources to aid in hardware development and automated test processes<br>&nbsp;Researches available and pipeline technologies for feasibility of implementation into medical devices.<br>&nbsp;Manages team to lead designs, analysis, and testing of low-powered battery operated embedded microcontroller based, wireless-enabled new and legacy medical devices.<br>&nbsp;Monitors project risk and identifies ways to prevent risks. Anticipates obstacles and takes appropriate action to resolve issues to ensure success of project. <br>&nbsp;Monitors real world performance of product line and investigates, resolves, and proactively eliminates issues that may present themselves<br>&nbsp;Creates a sense of urgency in others.<br>&nbsp;Applies understanding of Medtronic's business and strategy to think more broadly within own area.<br>&nbsp;Actively pursues development opportunities for self and team. <br>&nbsp;Appropriately involves others in decisions and plans that affect them.<br>&nbsp;Clearly expresses ideas and concepts verbally and in writing. <br>&nbsp;Prepares and delivers clear, well-organized presentations.<br>&nbsp;Develops and mentors Electrical Engineering staff via daily activities, formal training, development plans and other tools to achieve development goals.<br>&nbsp;Fosters strong working relationships with other functions within and outside R&amp;D to align functional and project objectives.<br></p>
							
							
						

				
						
				
				
						
							<div class="job_qualifications">
							<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b>BASIC QUALIFICATIONS:</b><br>&nbsp;Bachelors of Science degree in Electrical Engineering<br>&nbsp;10+&nbsp;years experience in design, analysis and test of electrical components<br>&nbsp;7+ years experience leading a technical team<br>&nbsp;Experience with designing and developing electro - mechanical systems and working with the integration of various microcontrollers<br>&nbsp;Experience with BLE and RF communication protocols</p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><br><b>PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:</b><br>&nbsp;M.S. in Electrical Engineering <br>&nbsp;Experience in the medical device, consumer electronics, or mobile hand held device industries<br>&nbsp;Experience performing tolerance analysis calculations and studies<br>&nbsp;Experience using design tools such as SPICE and Matlab.<br>&nbsp;Experience in design and manufacturing processes for complex multilayer circuits.<br>&nbsp;Experience in Integrated Circuit design and Miniaturization<br>&nbsp;Experience in low power medical devices<br>&nbsp;Solution orientated, generates multiple innovative solutions and is able to determine pros and cons of the solutions objectively <br>&nbsp;Leadership and interpersonal skills including ability to effectively develop and present business information with leaders and employees at all levels of the organization<br>&nbsp;Strong organizational and analytical skills. <br>&nbsp;Experience working collaboratively in project teams on high profile projects<br>&nbsp;Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to articulate complex ideas in easy to understand business terms<br>&nbsp;Ability to manage multiple priorities and delivering end product efficiently and on time </p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b></b></p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b>PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS:</b></p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px">The physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job.&nbsp; Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.</p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><br>It is the policy of Medtronic to provide equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local law. In addition, Medtronic will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities.</p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b></b></p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b>ABOUT MEDTRONIC</b><br>Together, we can change healthcare worldwide.&nbsp; At Medtronic, we push the limits of what technology can do to help alleviate pain, restore health and extend life.&nbsp; We challenge ourselves and each other to make tomorrow better than yesterday.&nbsp; It is what makes this an exciting and rewarding place to be.<br>We can accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations  but we will only succeed with the right people on our team.&nbsp; Lets work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients lives.&nbsp; Help us shape the future.<br><b></b></p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b></b></p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b>EEO STATEMENT</b><br>It is the policy of Medtronic to provide equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local law. In addition, Medtronic will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities.</p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><br>This employer participates in the federal E-Verify program to confirm the identity and employment authorization of all newly hired employees. For further information about the E-Verify program, please click here:<a href="http://www.uscis.gov/e-verify/employees">http://www.uscis.gov/e-verify/employees</a></p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b></b></p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><b>DISCLAIMER</b><br>The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by employees assigned to this classification. They are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties and skills required of employees assigned to this position.</p>
<p style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px">&nbsp;</p>
							</div>

<div id="ga_relationship" class="jUserRefreshArea">
	<script type="text/javascript">
	function setGaRelationship() {
		var ga_relationship_name = 'unaffiliated';

		
		
		

		
			
		
		
		return ga_relationship_name;
	}
	
	function setGaReferrer(){
		var ga_referrer_relationship;
		
			
			
			
				ga_referrer_relationship = 'No referrer';
			
		
		
		return ga_referrer_relationship;
	}
</script>

</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	var _gaq = _gaq || [];	
	
	var ga_relationship = setGaRelationship();
	
	var ga_referrer = setGaReferrer();
	
	
	_gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-77302915-1']);  // Site Specific Tracker
	
	_gaq.push(['_setVar',"Relationship: " + ga_relationship + " | " + ga_referrer]);
	_gaq.push(['_setCustomVar',1,'Relationship',ga_relationship,3]);
	_gaq.push(['_setCustomVar',2,'Referrer',ga_referrer,3]);
	_gaq.push(['_trackPageview', window.location.pathname]);
	
	
		_gaq.push(['aggregate._setAccount', 'UA-19128950-12']); // Aggregate Tracker
	
	
	_gaq.push(['aggregate._setDomainName', '.selectminds.com']);
	
	_gaq.push(['aggregate._setVar',"Relationship: " + ga_relationship + " | " + ga_referrer]);
	_gaq.push(['aggregate._setCustomVar',1,'Relationship',ga_relationship,3]);
	_gaq.push(['aggregate._setCustomVar',2,'Referrer',ga_referrer,3]);
	_gaq.push(['aggregate._trackPageview', window.location.pathname]);
	
	var ga_alert = "";
	
	if(ga_alert == "yes") {
		alert('Page View: ' + window.location.pathname + ' | Relationship: ' + ga_relationship + ' | Referrer: ' + ga_referrer);
	}
	
	(function() {
	  var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
	  ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
	  var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
	})();

	function asTrackPageview(url_name) {
		
		var ga_relationship_name = setGaRelationship();
		
		var ga_referrer_relationship = setGaReferrer();
		
		_gaq.push(['_setCustomVar',1,
			'Relationship',
			ga_relationship_name,
			3
		 ]);
		_gaq.push(['_setCustomVar',2,
			'Referrer',
			ga_referrer_relationship,
			3
		 ]);
		_gaq.push(['_setVar',"Relationship: " + ga_relationship_name + " | " + ga_referrer_relationship]);
		
		_gaq.push(['aggregate._setCustomVar',1,
			'Relationship',
			ga_relationship_name,
			3
		 ]);
		_gaq.push(['aggregate._setCustomVar',2,
			'Referrer',
			ga_referrer_relationship,
			3
		 ]);
		_gaq.push(['aggregate._setVar',"Relationship: " + ga_relationship_name + " | " + ga_referrer_relationship]);
		
		if(ga_alert == "yes") {
			alert('Page View: ' +url_name + ' | Relationship: ' + ga_relationship_name + ' | Referrer: ' + ga_referrer_relationship);
		}
		
		
		_gaq.push(['_trackPageview', url_name]);
		
		_gaq.push(['aggregate._trackPageview', url_name]);
		
		//alert("Tracking Page: " + url_name);
	}

	function asTrackEvent(category, action, opt_label) {
		
		var ga_relationship_name = setGaRelationship();
		
		var ga_referrer_relationship = setGaReferrer();
		
		if(ga_alert == "yes") {
			alert('Event: ' +category +"."+ action +"."+ opt_label + ' | Relationship: ' + ga_relationship_name + ' | Referrer: ' + ga_referrer_relationship);
		}
		
		_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', category, action, opt_label]);
		
		_gaq.push(['aggregate._trackEvent', category, action, opt_label]);

		// alert("Tracking Event: " + category + " | " + action + " | " + opt_label);
	}

</script>

							<div class="typography body">
								                         <div class="summary_information typography body-sidebar">
<a class="btn_share addthis_button" href="http://www.addthis.com/bookmark.php?v=300&amp;pubid=ra-53d9664370df35b9">
    <img src="/images/share-button.png" alt="share" align="right" /></a>
      <p class="job_title">Job Title: Motor Controls System Engineer</p>
      <div class="float_left">
      <ul class="nobull">
        
        <li><span class="bluegreen">Alternate Job Title:</span> <strong>Eng Sr Prin - Sys</strong></li>
        <li><span class="bluegreen">Job ID:</span> <strong>29103BR</strong></li>
        <li><span class="bluegreen">Posting Date:</span> 2017-07-24</li>
        <li><span class="bluegreen">Travel Percentage:</span> 10%</li>
      </ul>
      </div>

      <div class="float_left">
      <ul class="nobull">
        <li><span class="bluegreen">Location:</span> <strong>Los Angeles, CA  90056</strong></li>
        <li><span class="bluegreen">US Citizenship Required:</span> <strong>No</strong></li>
        <li><span class="bluegreen">Shift:</span> <strong>1st Shift</strong></li>
        <li><span class="bluegreen">Required Security Clearance:</span> <strong>None</strong></li>
      </ul>
      </div>

    <br class="dd_clear"/>

    </div>

   <br/>

    <div class="float_right">
        <a class="inline-button" href="https://sjobs.brassring.com/1033/ASP/TG/cim_jobdetail.asp?siteid=5403&partnerid=25771&areq=29103BR&codes=BSCS" target="_blank" onclick="ga('jbTracker.send', 'event', 'Button', 'Click', 'Job Apply');" >APPLY NOW</a>
        &nbsp;
        <a class="inline-button" onclick="history.go(-1); return false;" href="#">Back to Results</a>
        <div class="mobile-spacer" /></div>
        <a class="inline-button" href="/search-jobs.php">Start New Search</a>
    </div>

    <br class="dd_clear"/>

<div class="job_description">
<strong>Job Description:</strong><br/>
<P dir=ltr>BAE Systems is hiring for a Power Electronics Engineer.&nbsp;<BR><BR>At BAE Systems, we deliver a full range of products and services for air, land and&nbsp;naval forces, as well as advanced electronics, security, information technology&nbsp;solutions and customer support services. If you are an individual that enjoys a&nbsp;cohesive team environment and is interested in a variety of challenges across a&nbsp;variety of products, then we are interested in hearing from you!<BR><BR>The qualified Power Electronics Engineer candidate will have experience&nbsp;with in design, analysis, test and integration of motor drives, grid tie systems and exportable power as well as high power DC/DC converters.&nbsp; Responsibilities may include DC  AC, AC-AC and DC  DC power conversion from 1W  1MW and 28 to 800VDC / 460VAC.&nbsp; Experience with power magnetics design, machine control and EMI control is also desirable.&nbsp; An individual at this level should demonstrate the leadership ability to lead small work groups or program teams.</P><P dir=ltr>Duties and responsibilities include the following:</P><P dir=ltr>Detailed design, analysis and testing of:<O:P></O:P></P><UL type=disc dir=ltr><LI>Polyphase Motor Drive powertrains from thermal feasibility to detailed design of busbars, snubbers and DC link.&nbsp; <O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Cost Effective Gate Driver Architectures and circuit design for MOSFET, Si IGBT and SiC devices<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Isolated and Non-Isolated High Power DC/DC converters (greater than 1kW)<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>System level DC link interactions<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>EMI Filters and control for high power inverters, motor drives and DC/DC converters<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Filters for importable and exportable sine wave power for grid tie and other applications<O:P></O:P></LI></UL><P dir=ltr>Other activities:<O:P></O:P></P><UL type=disc dir=ltr><LI>Defining of requirements for motor control software and interfacing hardware components including voltage and current sensors, power stages, speed sensors<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Practical understanding to drive implementation of motor controller functionality, behaviors, and algorithms<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Develop, test and validate motor control algorithms in the laboratory and on target systems<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Architect and analyze vehicle level power systems potentially utilizing multiple Motor Drives, Energy Storage Systems, Fuel Cells, and DC/DC converters. <O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Architect test fixtures and test systems for motor drives and other power conversion products<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Prepare and/or review documentation for power systems designs and architectures<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Perform circuit and/or power system integration at Circuit Board, Electronic Enclosure, and Vehicle Level<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Produce and/or review technical documents, test procedures, specifications and standards<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Prepare and present design reviews and customer technical presentations <O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Write Technical&nbsp; Proposals<O:P></O:P></LI></UL><P dir=ltr>May support:<O:P></O:P></P><UL type=disc dir=ltr><LI>Manufacturing operations production and test issues<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Test Equipment design and troubleshooting<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Component quality and procurement issues<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Reliability Engineering Activities such as FMEA, Stress Analysis, Tolerance analysis<O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Field Service Technicians, or Field Support Group with Power Systems Issues<O:P></O:P></LI></UL><BR>&nbsp;
<br/>
<br/><strong>Minimum Education and Experience:</strong><br/>
Bachelor's Degree and 12 years work experience or equivalent experience
<br/>
<br/><strong>Required Skills and Education:</strong><br/>
<UL type=disc dir=ltr><LI>Experience working on motor control systems or subsystems<!--?xml:namespace prefix = "o" /--><O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Experience in power electronics related design and development, including familiarity with motor drives, gate drivers, analog circuitry, and magnetics <O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Experience in full lifecycle development including component level requirements and design, component and system-level integration, validation, and verification. <O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Ability to work with software and firmware controlled power converters and power systems.&nbsp;&nbsp; Must be willing to work in a high voltage / high power lab environment.&nbsp;&nbsp; <O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Software skills:&nbsp;&nbsp; SPICE, Mathcad <O:P></O:P></LI><LI>Technical writing skills: capable of creating required engineering documentation.</LI><LI><O:P>Demonstrated experience providing technical leadership and mentoring.</O:P></LI></UL>
<br/>
<br/><strong>Preferred Skills and Education:</strong><br/>
<UL dir=ltr><LI>Masters Degree or higher</LI><LI>Experience addressing implementation constraints of motor control including, non-linear effects, hysteresis and electrical impedance</LI><LI>Familiarity with motor sensors including encoders, resolvers and force sensors</LI><LI>Experience designing motor control switching algorithms in either Simulink or VHDL for implementation onto FPGA hardware or microcontrollers</LI><LI>Experience with design of DC DC converters and motor drives with power levels of up to 500kW and DC link voltages to 1000V or higher</LI><LI>Experience with Power Magnetics Design and electromagnetic concepts</LI><LI>Experience with partial discharge and bearing EDM issues</LI><LI>Basic working knowledge of AC machines</LI><LI>Familiarity with Vector and Field Oriented Control</LI><LI>Demonstrated leadership ability to lead working groups or program teams.</LI><LI>Software Skills:&nbsp; Matlab/Simulink, Ansys Maxwell</LI><LI>Experience with Requirements Management tools and Configuration Management and Problem Reporting tools.&nbsp;</LI></UL><BR>&nbsp;
<br/>
<br/><strong>About BAE Systems Electronic Systems:</strong><br/>
BAE Systems is a premier global defense and security company with approximately 90,000 employees delivering a full range of products and services for air, land and naval forces, as well as advanced electronics, security, information technology solutions and customer support and services.<BR>The Electronic Systems (ES) sector spans the commercial and defense electronics markets with a broad portfolio of mission-critical electronic systems, including flight and engine controls; electronic warfare and night vision systems; surveillance and reconnaissance sensors; secure networked communications equipment; geospatial imagery intelligence products and systems; mission management; and power-and energy-management systems. Headquartered in Nashua, New Hampshire, ES employs approximately 13,000 people globally, with engineering and manufacturing functions primarily in the United States, United Kingdom, and Israel. Equal Opportunity Employer/Females/Minorities/Veterans/Disabled/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity/Gender Expression
<br/>
<br/>    </div>

                                <h3 class="font-blue">ACCESSIBILITY ACCOMMODATIONS</h3>
                                <div class="items-wrapper">
                                    <p class="accommodation-footer">If you require an accommodation to navigate or apply to our career site, please send your request to: <a href="https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&amp;fs=1&amp;tf=1&amp;to=accessibility@baesystems.com" target="_blank">accessibility@baesystems.com</a> or call 1-855-541-4654 or fax 704-541-4401.</p>
                                    <p class="eoe-footer">SCAM ALERT: BAE Systems always has great job opportunities, and apparently scammers think so too. Dont be fooled by a scammer! During our recruitment process, BAE Systems will NOT: (1) ask you for money; (2) offer to send you a check before doing any work; (3) require you to provide sensitive personal information, like your drivers license or social security number (this happens later as part of the background check process); or (4) send you emails from free email accounts such as Yahoo, Gmail, Hotmail, and others. If you believe you have been scammed, please contact local law enforcement. Please see further guidance from the <a href="https://www.consumer.gov/jobs#!what-it-is" title="U.S. Federal Trade Commission">U.S. Federal Trade Commission</a>.</p>

                        <a href="javascript:void(0)" id="subscribeOption-top-manual" class="networkContainer applyOption" data-idx="1" aria-label="Join Now">

                        var searchString = '';

            <div id="social-network-button" class="pull-left">

			<script type="text/javascript">
				var addthis_config = {
					username:'addthisj2w'
					,ui_open_windows: true
					,ui_click: true
					,ui_508_compliant: true
					,data_track_clickback: false
					,ui_language: "en"
					,data_ga_property: "UA-81643606-1"
					,data_ga_social: true
				};
                var calledsfshorturl = false;
				$(function(){
					$('.addthis_toolbox').mouseover(function(e){
                        if (!calledsfshorturl) {
                            calledsfshorturl = true;
                            $(this).sfshorturl({
                                callback:addthisCallback
                                ,event:e
                                ,track: trackVars
                            });
                        }
					});

					function addthisCallback(data){
						$(data.event.target).attr('addthis:url',data.shorturl);
						addthis.update('share', 'url', data.shorturl);
					}

				});

			</script>

			<div class="addthis_toolbox addthis_default_style pull-left">

            <p lang="en_US" xml:lang="en_US" class="jobDate" id="job-date"><strong>Date: </strong>
                <span itemprop="datePosted">Oct 13, 2017
                </span>
            </p>
		    <p lang="en_US" xml:lang="en_US" class="jobLocation" id="job-location">
		    	<strong>Location: </strong>
		    	<span itemprop="jobLocation">El Segundo, CA, US, 90245</span>
		    </p>
            <p id="job-company" class="jobCompany" lang="en_US" xml:lang="en_US">
                <strong>Company: </strong>
                <span itemprop="hiringOrganization">The Aerospace Corporation</span>
            </p>
                <div class="job clearfix">
        <span itemprop="description"><p><span style="font-size:18.0px"><strong>Requisition ID: 33122</strong></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:16.0px"><strong>All Locations:</strong> El Segundo, CA (California)</span></p>

<p>A trusted partner. A national resource. A leader in national security space. We are THE Aerospace Corporation. A team that takes pride in our readiness to solve some of the most complex technical challenges in existence. With challenges spanning clandestine to commercial, youll have the unique opportunity to work on projects that are literally evolving our nation's space and launch capabilities. We all share a common passion and aspiration  to serve a mission much bigger than ourselves. When you join our team, youll be part of a rare collection of thought leaders and game-changing innovators. Are you ready to launch your career?</p>
<div><p style='padding: 10px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><p style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><b>Responsibilities</b>&#13;</p><p><p><strong>SUMMARY OF RESPONSIBILITIES</strong></p>

<p>The Aerospace Corporation is seeking a Embedded Software Engineer for an internship opportunity. This position will be located in El Segundo, CA.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>The qualified candidate will become part of the Applied Computer Systems Department working on embedded software and hardware projects.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>KEY FUNCTIONS</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Develops and demonstrates software for embedded systems (may include internet of things devices and prototype picosatellite flight software)</li>
	<li>Participates with an interdisciplinary team in ongoing research or technical programs with academic collaboration partners</li>
	<li>Applies standard techniques and procedures to carry out a series of prescribed&nbsp;scientific and/or engineering tasks.</li>
	<li>Training and mentorship will be provided.</li>
</ul>
&#13;</p></p><p style='padding: 10px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><p style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><b>Qualifications</b>&#13;</p><p><p><strong>Performance standards to be successful in this internship position include:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Strong written and oral communication skills</li>
	<li>Must work well in a team environment</li>
	<li>Must possess strong organizational, time management and project management skills</li>
	<li>Demonstrated flexibility and ability to adapt to changing organizational need</li>
	<li>Effective interpersonal skills to coordinate efforts and work with other internal and external organizations</li>
	<li>Demonstrates behavior that is consistent with the company&rsquo;s values of Dedication to Mission Success, Technical Excellence, Commitment to Our People, Integrity and Objectivity.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Currently enrolled at an accredited college/university degree program pursuing a Bachelor&#39;s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering or related program</li>
	<li>Minimum GPA 3.0</li>
	<li>Must be able to obtain a security clearance</li>
	<li>US Citizenship required</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Working knowledge of C or C++</li>
	<li>Working knowledge of Python</li>
	<li>Experience with microcontrollers, FPGAs and electronics</li>
	<li>Experience developing embedded software that interfaces with sensors and actuators</li>
	<li>Familiarity with real-time operating systems</li>
	<li>Familiarity with Linux operating systems</li>
	<li>Participation in extracurricular activities related to embedded systems</li>
	<li>Alignment between this internship duties and the applicant&#39;s career goals/planning</li>
	<li>GPA 3.5 or higher</li>
	<li>Completed to two or more years of undergraduate education</li>
	<li>Active security clearance</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Temporary housing assistance is not available.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>The Aerospace Corporation functions as the nation&rsquo;s independent testing, assessment, and research center for national security space systems, specializing in advanced military space systems.&nbsp; Aerospace offers summer internship positions at our headquarters in El Segundo, California, and our campuses in Chantilly, Virginia, Colorado and New Mexico to give students the opportunity to work in the scientific, technical, or administrative areas of the company.</p>
&#13;</p></p><p style='padding: 10px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><p style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><b>Transcript Requirement</b>&#13;</p><p><p>Transcripts are required for this position.&nbsp;</p>
&#13;</p></p></div><p></p>

<p><span style="font-size:16.0px"><strong>Additional Requisition Details</strong></span></p>

<p><strong>System Job Title:</strong><span style="font-family:arial, helvetica, sans-serif"><strong></strong><span>TECHNICAL INTERN REQ</span></span><font face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><strong>Clearance Requirement: </strong>Secret</p>

<p><strong>Access: </strong><span>None</span></p>

<p><strong>Polygraph: </strong><span>None</span></p>

<p><strong><span>Employment Type: </span></strong><span><span>Casual</span></span></p>

<p><strong><span>Work Schedule: </span></strong><span><span>Part Time</span></span></p>

<p></p>

<p><span style="font-size:16.0px"><strong>Company Statement</strong></span></p>

<p>The Aerospace Corporation has provided independent technical and scientific research, development, and advisory services to national security space programs since 1960. We operate a federally funded research and development center (FFRDC) for the United States Air Force and the National Reconnaissance Office, and support all national security space programs. We also apply more than 50 years of experience with space systems to provide critical solutions to technologically complex systems in such areas as communications, shipping, law enforcement, and cyber, among others.</p>

<p>From our inception, our highly skilled technical staff has focused on ensuring the success of every mission and developing the most effective and economic space-related hardware and software in the world. Our greatest asset is the technical expertise of our people. Our state-of-the-art laboratory facilities are staffed by some of the leading scientists in the world.</p>

<p></p>

<p><span style="font-size:16.0px"><strong>Equal Opportunity Commitment</strong></span></p>

<p>The Aerospace Corporation is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. We believe that a diverse workforce creates an environment in which unique ideas are developed and differing perspectives are valued, producing superior customer solutions. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment and will not be discriminated against on the basis of race, gender, gender identity or expression, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, or disability status.</p>

<p>You can also review <a href="https://www.eeoc.gov/employers/upload/poster_screen_reader_optimized.pdf" target="_blank"><font color="#0066cc">The Equal Employment Opportunity is the Law</font></a> poster and <a href="https://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/OFCCP_EEO_Supplement_Final_JRF_QA_508c.pdf" target="_blank"><font color="#0066cc">the supplement</font></a>, as well as the <a href="http://www.aerospace.org/wp-content/uploads/hrdocs/PAY-TRANSPARENCY-POLICY.pdf" target="_blank"><font color="#0066cc">Pay Transparency Policy Statement</font></a></p>
        </span>

            <script type="text/javascript">
                //<![CDATA[
                    j2w.SSO.init({
                        email    : '',
                        enabled  : false,
                        jobID    : 436200300,
                        locale   : 'en_US',
                        tcaction : 'job',
                        usingRD  : true
                    });

                    // This code is to deal with empty e-mail strings on back button clicks to the page when first logging in.
                    $(window).load(function () {
                        if (''.length && !j2w.SSO.getEmail().length) {
                            $.ajax({
                                type    : 'GET',
                                url     : '/services/security/email',
                                success : function (data) {
                                    if (data.email.length) {
                                        j2w.SSO.setEmail(data.email);
                                    }
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    });
                //]]>
            </script>
            <script type="text/javascript">
                //<![CDATA[
                j2w.Apply.init({
                    jobID                 : 436200300,
                    locale                : 'en_US',
                    relocateApplyURL      : '',
                    subscribeAtApply      : true,
                    useOnPageBusinessCard : true
                });
                //]]>
            </script>
        <script type="text/javascript">
            //<![CDATA[

            $(function() {
                $errorbox = $('#signin-error').hide();
                $errorboxmessage = $('#signin-error-message');
                $infobox = $('#signin-info').hide();
                $infoboxmessage = $('#signin-info-message');
                $successbox = $('#signin-success').hide();
                $successboxmessage = $('#signin-success-message');

                originalURI = "/job/El-Segundo-Embedded-Software-Undergrad-Intern-CA-90245/436200300/";
                enterEmailPrompt = 'Email';
                applyErrorMessage = 'There was an unexpected error processing your email. Please try again.';
                applySuccessMessage = '<p>Thank you. You should receive an email containing a link to this job along with details on how to apply.</p><p>A larger screen is required, so please open the email with a full-scale device.</p>';
                invalidEmailMessage = 'Please enter a valid email address.';
                pleaseWaitMessage = 'Please wait...';
                alreadyAUserMessage = 'You are already a user of this site. {0}';

                emailRegex = '^(?=([a-zA-Z0-9.+!_-])+[@]([a-zA-Z0-9.-])*[.]([a-zA-Z0-9]){1,63}$)(?!.*[-\\s,])(?!.*[.]{2})';
                jobLocale = "en_US";

                tcSignIn = 'Sign in';
                useSSL = 1;
                useMobileTC = 0;

                $message = $('#apply-message');
                $email = $('#email');
                $jobid = $('#jobid');
                $applyButton = $('#apply-button');

                // format is a jQuery validation built-in function. That library is not used on this page, so provide a similar format here.
                String.prototype.format = function() {
                    var s = this, i = arguments.length;
                    while (i--) {
                        s = s.replace(new RegExp('\\{' + i + '\\}', 'gm'), arguments[i]);
                    }
                    return s;
                };

                lastEmailSubmitted = ''; // Holds email address last submitted, to prevent multi-clicks

                if ( !$email.val().length ) {
                    $email.val(enterEmailPrompt.unescapeHTML()).one('focus',function(){
                        $(this)
                        .val('')
                        .css({
                            color:'#222222'
                        });
                    });
                }

                $('#email-job').submit(function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();

                    applyFormUrl = '/mobile/talentcommunity/apply/'+$jobid.val()+'/?email=' + encodeURIComponent($email.val()) + '&locale=' + jobLocale + "&slp=" + encodeURIComponent("/mobile/talentcommunity/thanks/");

                    loginFormUrl = '/mobile/talentcommunity/login/?email=' + encodeURIComponent($email.val()) + '&locale=' + jobLocale + '&returnurl=' + encodeURIComponent(originalURI);


                    if ( $email.val().match(emailRegex) ) {
                        if ( $email.val() != lastEmailSubmitted ) {
                            switch (useMobileTC) {
                                case 1: //useMobileTC
                                    infoMessage(pleaseWaitMessage);
                                    $.ajax({
                                        type:	'POST',
                                        url:	'/services/security/validateemail',
                                        data:	{ email : $email.val() },
                                        dataType: 'json',
                                        error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                                            errorMessage(applyErrorMessage);
                                        },
                                        success: function(data) {
                                            lastEmailSubmitted = $email.val();
                                            $email.unbind('keyup');

                                            if ( data.rmk8 && !data.emailMatchesSession ) {
                                                // The logged-in user is not a new user, and the e-mail address they provided to apply doesn't match -- they need to login.
                                                // Build a "sign in" link with return URL and locale information.
                                                msg  = '<a href="' + loginFormUrl + '">' + tcSignIn + '</a>';
                                                // Substitute the {0} placeholder in alreadyAUserMessage with msg.
                                                infoMessage(alreadyAUserMessage.format(msg));

                                                setReturnURL( null, document.location);
                                            } else if ( data.rmk8 && data.emailMatchesSession ) {
                                                // The user is valid and is logged in. Send the mobile apply e-mail and go to 'thanks'.
                                                sendMobileApplyEmail(finishDirectToThanks, $jobid.val(), $email.val());
                                            } else {
                                                // The user is a brand-new user. Send the mobile apply e-mail and go to mobile subscribe.
                                                $errorbox = $('#signin-error').hide();
                                                $errorbox.hide();
                                                // Empty submitted to allow for 'Back' pressing in mobile device
                                                lastEmailSubmitted = '';
                                                // Redirect the user to the subscribe page.
                                                setReturnURL( function(){ document.location.href = applyFormUrl; }, document.location);
                                                //document.location.href = applyFormUrl;
                                            }
                                        }
                                    });
                                    break;
                                case 0: //dontUseMobileTC
                                    sendMobileApplyEmail(finishDirectToThanks, $jobid.val(), $email.val());
                                    break;
                                default:
                                    break;
                            }
                        }
                    } else {
                        errorMessage(invalidEmailMessage);

                        $email
                        .keyup(function(){
                            if($(this).val().match(emailRegex)) {
                                $errorbox = $('#signin-error').hide();
                            } else {
                                errorMessage(invalidEmailMessage);
                            }
                        });
                    }
                });
            });

            // Finishes an apply action by showing the thanks message.
            function finishDirectToThanks() {
                successMessage(applySuccessMessage);
                // Reposition the screen so the thanks message is visible.
                window.scrollTo(0,0);
            }

            // Sends out the mobile apply e-mail, and optionally performs additional steps on success.
            function sendMobileApplyEmail(fCallback, jobid, email) {
                serviceUrl = '/services/mobileapply/sendemail?email='+email+'&jobid='+jobid;
                $.ajax({
                    type:	'GET',
                    url:        serviceUrl,
                    dataType:   'json',
                    error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                        errorMessage(applyErrorMessage);
                    },
                    success: function(data) {
                        if ( data == true ) {
                            if ( typeof fCallback == 'function' ) {
                                fCallback();
                            }
                        } else {
                            errorMessage(applyErrorMessage);
                        }
                    }
                });
            }

            function setReturnURL(fCallback, url){
                $.ajax({
                    type:	'GET',
                    url:        '/services/navigation/setredirect?url='+encodeURIComponent(url),
                    dataType:   'json',
                    error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                        errorMessage(applyErrorMessage);
                    },
                    success: function(data) {
                        if ( typeof fCallback == 'function' ) {
                            fCallback();
                        }
                    }
                });
            }

            function infoMessage(message){
                $infobox.show();
                $errorbox.hide();
                $successbox.hide();
                $infoboxmessage.html(message);
            }
            function errorMessage(message){
                $errorbox.show();
                $infobox.hide();
                $successbox.hide();
                $errorboxmessage.html(message);
            }
            function successMessage(message){
                $successbox.show();
                $errorbox.hide();
                $infobox.hide();
                $successboxmessage.html(message);
            }
            //]]>
        </script>
					<script type="text/javascript" src="/platform/js/j2w/min/j2w.socialApplyCore.min.js?h=78293032"></script>
					<script type="text/javascript" src="/platform/js/j2w/min/socialApplyRD.min.js?h=78293032"></script>
            <script type="text/javascript">
                //<![CDATA[
                j2w.SAB.init({
                    profileData : [ {type : 'linkedin',shorttype : 'li',label : 'Start apply with LinkedIn',helptext : 'Use your LinkedIn profile to join our talent community, receive job alerts, and start the apply process.',moretext : '<ul><li>Nothing is posted on your LinkedIn account.</li><li>We do not login to your LinkedIn account.</li><li>We do not save login credentials to your LinkedIn account.</li><li>You will be joining our Talent Community using your social profile.</li><li>Please ensure that pop-up blockers are disabled in order to proceed.</li></ul>' }, {type : 'manual',shorttype : '',label : 'Apply Now',helptext : 'Join our talent community, receive job alerts, and start the apply process.',moretext : '' },],

                    locale      : 'en_US',
                    autoOpen    : { open : false }
                });
                //]]>
            </script>

                        $('.join-form').submit(function (e) {

                            // Trim the e-mail form field to prevent e-mail validation from failing because of leading or trailing spaces.

<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

</span>
</span>
<span class="navBi"><a href="https://www.indeed.com/account/login?dest=%2Fcmp%2FHarris-Corporation" rel="nofollow" id="userOptionsLabel">Sign in</a></span>

}

}


#user_actions .navBi a#userOptionsLabel {

}

class="cmp-TopWidget cmp-TopWidget--review-category"><h3 class="cmp-TopWidget-title">Reviews and ratings</h3><div class="cmp-TopWidget-reviewOverallContainer"><div class="cmp-OverallRating"><div class="cmp-BarChart-bar-filled" style="width:28px"></span></span><span class="cmp-BarChart-percentage">18%</span></div></div></div></div><div id="cmp-content" class="cmp-inline-block"><div id="cmp-about" class="cmp-section cmp-with-border cmp-chapter" data-tn-section="about"><h1 class="cmp-section-first-header">About Harris Corporation</h1><div class="cmp-section clearfix cmp-about-description" data-tn-component="about-description"><p class="cmp-body-text"><span id="cmp-short-description">Harris has ways to makeits customers communicate. The company, which develops communications products for government and commercial customers in more than 125 countries, makes radio-frequency (RF) and satellite communications and other wireless network transmission equipment; air traffic control systems; and digital network broadcasting and management</span><span id="cmp-more-link-container">&nbsp;&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="javascript:void(0);" id="cmp-more-link" data-tn-action-click data-tn-element="more-link">more...</a></span>&nbsp;<span id="cmp-more-description" class="hidden">systems.Harris also offers specialized IT services. Its primary customersareUS government agencies, including prime contractors and supported foreign militaries, accounting for about 70% of sales. Harris&#39; commercial clients come from theconstruction, energy, health care, maritime, oil, transportation, and utilities industries.<br><br>Harris&#39; largest segment, RF communications (40% of sales), offers radio communications and encryption technology for the US DoD, international tactical communications, and public safety and professional communications. Government communications systems (about a third of sales) provides advanced communications and information systems to government civil, national intelligence, and defenseprograms. Civil settings include aviation and weather; national intelligence applications provide tracking, surveillance, cyber security and other functions; defense programs offers communications and information processingin support of missions and other defense operations.Integrated network solutions (less than 30%) offers IT services, managed satellite and terrestrial communications, and health care interoperability and image management.<br><br>Harris has seen a steady rise in sales over the years, but revenues finally dipped in fiscal 2012 (ended June), by 8% to $5.5 billion. Some of that came, however, from discontinued operations, and its continuing operations did sustain annual growth, though only barely, rising less than 1% over the previous year. Sales growth in its largest segment, RF communications, was hampered by a change in the way theDoDmarket was driven. Sales for its integrated network solutions saw growth from its CapRock and Schlumberger GCS acquisitions, as well as from health care solutions, which included another recent acquisition, Carefx. Harris&#39; government communications segment achieved a modest 3% increase. Although the company preserved its streak of profitability, it netted only $30 million, resulting in its narrowest margin in the past decade at little more than half a percent.<br><br>Harris considers its greatest opportunities for growth to be in managed satellite communications, public safety and professional communications, health care IT, and emerging national markets. Affected sectors include energy, maritime, and government. The continued global deployment of the wireless 4G LTE standard will help fuel growth. In a bid to court more international customers, Harris opened a European headquarters in the UK in 2010. More recently, the company is focusing on Brazil and the Middle East. To better focus on these growth areas, Harris in late 2012 agreed to sell its Broadcast Communications unit, which includes TV and radio transmission systems, digital signage, and other digital media management services.<br><br>Harris&#39; purchase of managed satellite communications services provider CapRock Communicationsearlier in the year. That $525 million deal addeda range of remote communication and support services for the oil exploration and drilling, military, maritime, and mining industries to Harris&#39; portfolio, and provided the company with new customers for its satellite equipment (part of its integrated network solutions division). It also marked the company&#39;s entry into the energy market.<br><br>Further strengthening itsgrowing satellite communications business for the energy industry, the CapRock deal was complemented by the purchase that year of the global communications services business of oil field services provider Schlumbergerfor nearly $350 million. Known as SchlumbergerGlobal Connectivity Services (GCS), the division provided communications and support services to clients in the global oil and gas industries. Its key operations are locatedinNorway, Singapore, the UK,and the US.<br><br>Harris has also added to its IT services and software operationsthrough acquisitions.In 2011 itpaid $155 million forCarefx, a private company that offered Fusionfx, a software platform that compiles patient information from different systems and departments and delivers it in one program. The purchaseput Harris inpositionto provide services related to the integration of theVA and Military Health Systems. In 2010 Harris bought SignaCert, a provider of IT compliance applications that combine change detection capabilities with both custom and commercial lists of approved software, so-called whitelists.&nbsp;&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="javascript:void(0);" id="cmp-less-link">less</a></span></p></div></div><div id="cmp-reviews" class="cmp-section cmp-with-border cmp-chapter" data-tn-section="reviews"><h2>Reviews</h2><div id="cmp-featured-review" class="cmp-section" data-tn-component="featuredReview"><h3 class="cmp-featured-review-header">Featured Review</h3><div class="cmp-section cmp-review-entry"><div class="cmp-Rating cmp-Rating--normal cmp-Rating--middle"><span class="cmp-Rating-on" style="width: 80.0%;"></span></div><div class="cmp-strong"><a data-tn-element="featuredReviewLink" class="cmp-featured-review" data-tn-link href="/cmp/Harris-Corporation/reviews?id=829358cbd98be950" rel="nofollow">A good IT environment</a></div><div class="cmp-note">Certified IT Professional, Fort Lee, VA - <span>September 24, 2014</span></div><div class="cmp-review-text cmp-body-text">I learned how federal government agencies function.  I perform various tasks within the IT department at Fort Lee.  I&#39;ll tell you more about it in the interview...</div></div></div><div class="cmp-section-footer" data-tn-component="reviewLinksSummary"><div class="cmp-chevron-link"><a <script type="text/javascript">
function loadJSAsync( ) {
for ( var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
var url = arguments[i];
(function() {
var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.async = true;
s.src = url;
el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
})();
}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

if (typeof window['closureReadyCallbacks'] == 'undefined') {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'] = [];
}

function call_when_jsall_loaded(cb) {
if (window['closureReady']) {
cb();
} else {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'].push(cb);
}
}
</script>

<div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

</span>
</span>

<tr valign="top"><td style="padding:20px;padding-left:23px;">

<a tabindex="-1" id="job_header"></a>
<div data-tn-component="jobHeader">
<b class="jobtitle"><font size="+1">Robotics-Centric Electrical Engineer</font></b>

<br>
<span class="company">Opto-Knowledge Systems, Inc.</span>
 -
<span class="location">Torrance, CA 90502</span>
</div>
<table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0><tr><td class="snip">
<span id="job_summary" class="summary"><p>OKSI is an award-winning R&D company located in Torrance, CA and is looking for a Robotics Engineer to join our Autonomous Systems team. We are looking for someone with an Electrical Engineering background who is experienced in interfacing with various hardware sensors (e.g., EOIR cameras, INS sensors, etc.) using various computer/microcontroller hardware. We are looking for someone who can take a sensor suite concept and layout breadboard, brass board, and field-ready system configurations.</p><p><b>Duties: </b></p><ul><li>Interface various sensors with microcontrollers/computers with peripheral sensor hardware such as EOIR sensors, Inertial Navigation Systems (INS), and miscellaneous COTS and custom hardware systems</li><li>Ability to set-up sensor hardware on a sync-trigger to ensure that measurements between multiple devices/sensors are synchronously captured</li><li>Interface various sensors with ARM processors, GPU processors, and small form computers (e.g., Intel NUC)</li><li>Write controls specifications defining the functional scope and I/O requirements</li><li>Develop electrical schematics in AutoCAD</li><li>Assist in debugging robot programs</li><li>Program and debug PLC programs while under experienced supervision</li><li>Support integration on FRA floor and customers facility</li><li>Write customer documentation</li><li>Perform/support customer training</li><li>Design and implement hardware and software set-ups appropriate to system use cases</li><li>Assist with testing and iteration of design capabilities</li></ul><p><b>Requirements: </b></p><ul><li>Ability and willingness to obtain security clearance is important.</li><li>Authorized to work in the United States.</li><li>Bachelors degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineer, Robotics, Physics, or equivalent</li><li>Robotics engineering hardware experience</li></ul><p><b>Required Skills: </b></p><ul><li>Embedded systems/microcontroller programming</li><li>Communication protocol</li><li>Networking</li><li>GPS/IMU/AHRS sensor system experience</li><li>EOIR Sensor interfacing</li><li>C/C++</li><li>Python</li><li>Matlab</li><li>Version control</li><li>Linux development</li><li>Autopilot & control systems experience (desired)</li><li>Microcontroller design/layout (desired)</li><li>Fixed/rotary wing UAS platforms experience</li><li>Ardupilot/PX4 experience</li><li>ROS experience</li><li>Q-Ground Control experience</li><li>Computer vision/AI</li><li>Qt</li></ul><p>Job Type: Full-time</p><p>Required education:</p><ul><li>Bachelor's</li></ul><p>Required experience:</p><ul><li>Robotics: 1 year</li></ul></span><br><div id="p_4620184e17a82487">
<div class="result-link-bar-container result-link-bar-viewjob">

So when we don't have a salary provided from the hiring company, we look at salary data from across related industries and locations to come up with a reasonable estimation of what you can expect.</p><p>With over 450,000,000 salaries collected from other jobs and employees, we have one of the biggest databases of salary data in the world to draw upon for these estimates. And because we are continually adding feedback from other users like you, we are able to keep refining our accuracy.</p><p>These salaries are not endorsed by the hiring companies and may vary from what's actually offered, but we have a pretty great record of getting close enough for you to make an informed decision.</p><p><a href="https://www.indeed.com/hire/contact-us?hl=en-us">Send feedback or report inaccuracy</a></p></div></div></div><script type="text/javascript">

<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

var viewJobOnSerp = new indeed.vjs('1btij9iq70nl80uh');
var vjk = viewJobOnSerp.getVJK();
var vjUrl = viewJobOnSerp.vjUrl(vjk);
var normalVjOnSerp = false  && window.innerWidth >= 1280;
var clickCardVjOnSerp = false  && window.innerWidth >= 1280;

<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

</span>

<script type="text/javascript">
    function setRefineByCookie(refineByTypes) {
        var expires = new Date();
        expires.setTime(expires.getTime() + (10 * 1000));
        for (var i = 0; i < refineByTypes.length; i++) {
            setCookie(refineByTypes[i], "1", expires);
        }
    }
</script>

function sm_cv_tag(activityId) {
var ebRand = Math.random()+'';
ebRand = ebRand * 1000000;

var tagContainer = document.body.appendChild(document.createElement("div"));
tagContainer.style.position="absolute";
tagContainer.style.top="0";
tagContainer.style.left="0";
tagContainer.style.width="1px";
tagContainer.style.height="1px";
tagContainer.style.display="none";

var jsTag = document.createElement('script');
jsTag.src = '//bs.serving-sys.com/Serving/ActivityServer.bs?cn=as&ActivityID=' + activityId + '&rnd=' + ebRand;
jsTag.setAttribute('crossorigin', 'anonymous');
jsTag.style.width="1px";
jsTag.style.height="1px";
jsTag.style.border="0";
jsTag.async = 1;

var noScript = document.createElement("noscript");
var noScriptText = '<img width="1" height="1" style="border:0" src="//bs.serving-sys.com/Serving/ActivityServer.bs?cn=as&ActivityID=' + activityId + '&ns=1"/>';

// IE less than 9 and RCs do not support innerHTML on some DOM elements, but supports .text for it
if (((typeof noScript.canHaveHTML) === "boolean") && (noScript.canHaveHTML === false)) { // canHaveHTML only exists for IE
noScript.text = noScriptText;
} else {
noScript.innerHTML = noScriptText;
}

tagContainer.appendChild(jsTag);
tagContainer.appendChild(noScript);
}
</script>

<div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    function setRefineByCookie(refineByTypes) {
        var expires = new Date();
        expires.setTime(expires.getTime() + (10 * 1000));
        for (var i = 0; i < refineByTypes.length; i++) {
            setCookie(refineByTypes[i], "1", expires);
        }
    }
</script>

<script>
var focusHandlers = [];
var linkHighlighter = new LinkHighlighter();
focusHandlers.push(googBind(linkHighlighter.fadeToOriginalColor, linkHighlighter));
var lostFocusHandlers = [];
lostFocusHandlers.push(googBind(linkHighlighter.clickedAway, linkHighlighter, "#551a8b"));

if (!showVjOnSerp) {
    var didYouApplyPrompt = new DidYouApplyPrompt('1btij8mr31a3q4uc', 60, 'serp',
        false);
    focusHandlers.push(googBind(didYouApplyPrompt.returnedToPage, didYouApplyPrompt));
    lostFocusHandlers.push(googBind(didYouApplyPrompt.leftPage, didYouApplyPrompt));
    didYouApplyPrompt.dyaChangeFromCookie();
}

function sm_cv_tag(activityId) {
var ebRand = Math.random()+'';
ebRand = ebRand * 1000000;

var tagContainer = document.body.appendChild(document.createElement("div"));
tagContainer.style.position="absolute";
tagContainer.style.top="0";
tagContainer.style.left="0";
tagContainer.style.width="1px";
tagContainer.style.height="1px";
tagContainer.style.display="none";

var jsTag = document.createElement('script');
jsTag.src = '//bs.serving-sys.com/Serving/ActivityServer.bs?cn=as&ActivityID=' + activityId + '&rnd=' + ebRand;
jsTag.setAttribute('crossorigin', 'anonymous');
jsTag.style.width="1px";
jsTag.style.height="1px";
jsTag.style.border="0";
jsTag.async = 1;

var noScript = document.createElement("noscript");
var noScriptText = '<img width="1" height="1" style="border:0" src="//bs.serving-sys.com/Serving/ActivityServer.bs?cn=as&ActivityID=' + activityId + '&ns=1"/>';

// IE less than 9 and RCs do not support innerHTML on some DOM elements, but supports .text for it
if (((typeof noScript.canHaveHTML) === "boolean") && (noScript.canHaveHTML === false)) { // canHaveHTML only exists for IE
noScript.text = noScriptText;
} else {
noScript.innerHTML = noScriptText;
}

tagContainer.appendChild(jsTag);
tagContainer.appendChild(noScript);
}
</script>

<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

</span>

our customers may face. Our passion and dedication shows in everything we dofrom advanced electronic systems to cyber operations and intelligence analysis, from combat vehicles to naval weapons, and from ship maintenance and modernization to vehicle upgrades and services. <div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

class="cmp-BarChart-bar-filled" style="width:50px"></span></span><span class="cmp-BarChart-percentage">31%</span></div><div class="cmp-BarChart-entry"><span class="cmp-BarChart-name">Relaxed</span><span class="cmp-BarChart-bar" style="width:160px"><span class="cmp-BarChart-bar-filled" style="width:27px"></span></span><span class="cmp-BarChart-percentage">17%</span></div></div></div></div><div id="cmp-content" class="cmp-inline-block"><div id="cmp-about" class="cmp-section cmp-with-border cmp-chapter" data-tn-section="about"><h1 class="cmp-section-first-header">About Medtronic</h1><div class="cmp-section clearfix cmp-about-description" data-tn-component="about-description"><p class="cmp-body-text"><span id="cmp-short-description">Founded in 1949 as a repair shop for medical devices, Medtronic has grown to become one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the world.  The recent integration of Covidien as the company&#39;s Minimally Invasive Therapies group allows Medtronic to expand the business and bring its services to even more people around the world. The company operates</span><span id="cmp-more-link-container">&nbsp;&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="javascript:void(0);" id="cmp-more-link" data-tn-action-click data-tn-element="more-link">more...</a></span>&nbsp;<span id="cmp-more-description" class="hidden">through three additional groups: Restorative Therapies Group, Cardiac and Vascular Group, and Diabetes Group. Medtronic operates in more than 140 countries.<br><br>Medtronic offers company matching on employee 401(k) contributions, and two weeks paid time off in the first year of employment. Many employees think the health insurance coverage is excellent, including &quot;amazing infertility treatment&quot; on the company&#39;s plans. Workers also like the &quot;friendly and inclusive work environment,&quot; the &quot;great work-life balance,&quot; and the fact that Medtronic &quot;invests heavily in training and developing&quot; its employees. However, some find that &quot;with the acquisition of Covidien, benefits have suffered a bit,&quot; though that is &quot;to be expected&quot; because of the fact that the company &quot;doubled in size.&quot;&nbsp;&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="javascript:void(0);" id="cmp-less-link">less</a></span></p></div><ul class="cmp-photo-stream" data-tn-component="about-photos"><li data-tn-element="photo[]"><a href="/cmp/Medtronic/photos?photo=1bhtj79ps0mtj6ru" data-tn-link><img class="companyPhoto" src="/cmp/_s/photos/de1eb80a32a8c1c2-sqt-1bhtj79ps0mtj6ru" alt="Medtronic photo: Medtronic of Boulder" /></a></li><li data-tn-element="photo[]"><a href="/cmp/Medtronic/photos?photo=1b7r195d7d04mdvh" data-tn-link><img class="companyPhoto" src="/cmp/_s/photos/de1eb80a32a8c1c2-sqt-1b7r195d7d04mdvh" alt="Medtronic photo: PB 980" /></a></li><li data-tn-element="photo[]"><a href="/cmp/Medtronic/photos?photo=1b7r1aglfd04me2j" data-tn-link><img class="companyPhoto" src="/cmp/_s/photos/de1eb80a32a8c1c2-sqt-1b7r1aglfd04me2j" alt="Medtronic photo: Monitoreo cerebral" /></a></li><li data-tn-element="photo[]"><a href="/cmp/Medtronic/photos?photo=1b7r166chd04mesb" data-tn-link><img class="companyPhoto" src="/cmp/_s/photos/de1eb80a32a8c1c2-sqt-1b7r166chd04mesb" alt="Medtronic photo: Cateter de dialisis en UTi
Monitoreo cerebral" /></a></li></ul><div class="cmp-section-footer cmp-chevron-link" data-tn-section="photos" data-tn-component="photoLinksSummary"><a href="/cmp/Medtronic/photos" data-tn-element="photos-viewAllLink" data-tn-link>See all 12 Medtronic photos</a><span class="cmp-chevron"></span></div></div><div id="cmp-reviews" class="cmp-section cmp-with-border cmp-chapter" data-tn-section="reviews"><h2>Reviews</h2><div id="cmp-featured-review" class="cmp-section" data-tn-component="featuredReview"><h3 class="cmp-featured-review-header">Featured Review</h3><div class="cmp-section cmp-review-entry"><div class="cmp-Rating cmp-Rating--normal cmp-Rating--middle"><span class="cmp-Rating-on" style="width: 100.0%;"></span></div><div class="cmp-strong"><a data-tn-element="featuredReviewLink" class="cmp-featured-review" data-tn-link href="/cmp/Medtronic/reviews?id=217e414a193e13c2" rel="nofollow">Great job environment</a></div><div class="cmp-note">manufacturing operator, Villalba Municipio, PR - <span>October 27, 2017</span></div><div class="cmp-review-text cmp-body-text">The culture of the staff in very warming,  ist a great place to work at. 								if (element.addEventListener)
									element.addEventListener(eventName, fn, false);
								else if (element.attachEvent)
									element.attachEvent('on' + eventName, fn);

			Homepage		</span>

						<div class="post-content">
				<div  class="fusion-fullwidth fullwidth-box fusion-parallax-none nonhundred-percent-fullwidth"  style='background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0);background-image: url("http://nectarpd.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/white-pattern-1.jpg");background-position: center center;background-repeat: no-repeat;padding-top:100px;padding-right:30px;padding-bottom:100px;padding-left:30px;border-top-width:0px;border-bottom-width:0px;border-color:#ffffff;border-top-style:solid;border-bottom-style:solid;-webkit-background-size:cover;-moz-background-size:cover;-o-background-size:cover;background-size:cover;background-attachment:none;'><div class="fusion-builder-row fusion-row "><div  class="fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_5  fusion-one-fifth fusion-column-first 1_5"  style='margin-top:15px;margin-bottom:15px;width:16.8%; margin-right: 4%;'>
					<div class="fusion-column-wrapper" style="background-position:left top;background-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-background-size:cover;-moz-background-size:cover;-o-background-size:cover;background-size:cover;"  data-bg-url="">

					</div>
				</div><div  class="fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_3_5  fusion-three-fifth 3_5"  style='margin-top:15px;margin-bottom:15px;width:58.4%; margin-right: 4%;'>
					<div class="fusion-column-wrapper" style="background-position:left top;background-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-background-size:cover;-moz-background-size:cover;-o-background-size:cover;background-size:cover;"  data-bg-url="">
						<h2 style="text-align: center;">User-Centered Product Development</h2>
<div class="fusion-sep-clear"></div><div class="fusion-separator sep-single sep-solid" style="border-color:#f58220;border-top-width:5px;margin-left: auto;margin-right: auto;margin-top:;margin-bottom:20px;width:100%;max-width:100px;"></div><p style="text-align: center;">Our complete range of industry-leading product development services ensure that you have access to the resources that you need to create innovative products when you need them. We provide turnkey product development, from concept-through-manufacturing to engagement at any stage in the process.</p>
<div class="fusion-clearfix"></div>

					</div>
				</div><div  class="fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_5  fusion-one-fifth fusion-column-last 1_5"  style='margin-top:15px;margin-bottom:15px;width:16.8%'>
					<div class="fusion-column-wrapper" style="background-position:left top;background-repeat:no-repeat;-webkit-background-size:cover;-moz-background-size:cover;-o-background-size:cover;background-size:cover;"  data-bg-url="">

					</div>

<p></span></h5></div><div class="fusion-sep-clear"></div><div class="fusion-separator fusion-full-width-sep sep-none" style="margin-left: auto;margin-right: auto;margin-top:;margin-bottom:20px;"></div></div></div><div class="fusion-clearfix"></div>

							function sgAddEvent(element, eventName, fn) {
								if (element.addEventListener)
									element.addEventListener(eventName, fn, false);
								else if (element.attachEvent)
									element.attachEvent('on' + eventName, fn);
							}

						<h2 style="text-align: center;">User-Centered Product Development</h2>
<div class="fusion-sep-clear"></div><div class="fusion-separator sep-single sep-solid" style="border-color:#f58220;border-top-width:5px;margin-left: auto;margin-right: auto;margin-top:;margin-bottom:20px;width:100%;max-width:100px;"></div><p style="text-align: center;">Our complete range of industry-leading product development services ensure that you have access to the resources that you need to create innovative products when you need them. We provide turnkey product development, from concept-through-manufacturing to engagement at any stage in the process.</p>
<div class="fusion-clearfix"></div>

					</div>

							function sgAddEvent(element, eventName, fn) {
								if (element.addEventListener)
									element.addEventListener(eventName, fn, false);
								else if (element.attachEvent)
									element.attachEvent('on' + eventName, fn);

						<h2 style="text-align: center;">User-Centered Product Development</h2>
<div class="fusion-sep-clear"></div><div class="fusion-separator sep-single sep-solid" style="border-color:#f58220;border-top-width:5px;margin-left: auto;margin-right: auto;margin-top:;margin-bottom:20px;width:100%;max-width:100px;"></div><p style="text-align: center;">Our complete range of industry-leading product development services ensure that you have access to the resources that you need to create innovative products when you need them. We provide turnkey product development, from concept-through-manufacturing to engagement at any stage in the process.</p>
<div class="fusion-clearfix"></div>

<div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

id="cmp-about" class="cmp-section cmp-with-border cmp-chapter" data-tn-section="about"><h1 class="cmp-section-first-header">About Infineon Technologies</h1><div class="cmp-section clearfix cmp-about-description" data-tn-component="about-description"><p class="cmp-body-text"><span>Infineon Technologies AG offers semiconductor and system solutions addressing three central challenges to modern society: energy efficiency, mobility, and security. In the 2013 fiscal year (ending September 30), the company reported revenues of 3.84 billion euros with approximately 26,700 employees worldwide.</span></p></div><ul class="cmp-photo-stream" data-tn-component="about-photos"><li data-tn-element="photo[]"><a href="/cmp/Infineon-Technologies/photos?photo=18gm1fd4pb84g9p4" data-tn-link><img class="companyPhoto" src="/cmp/_s/photos/e9afa588f8da14ed-sqt-18gm1fd4pb84g9p4" alt="Infineon Technologies photo: FUN Walk" /></a></li></ul><div class="cmp-section-footer cmp-chevron-link" data-tn-section="photos" data-tn-component="photoLinksSummary"><a href="/cmp/Infineon-Technologies/photos" data-tn-element="photos-viewAllLink" data-tn-link>See the only photo for Infineon Technologies</a><span class="cmp-chevron"></span></div></div><div id="cmp-reviews" class="cmp-section cmp-with-border cmp-chapter" data-tn-section="reviews"><h2>Reviews</h2><div id="cmp-featured-review" class="cmp-section" data-tn-component="featuredReview"><h3 class="cmp-featured-review-header">Featured Review</h3><div class="cmp-section cmp-review-entry"><div class="cmp-Rating cmp-Rating--normal cmp-Rating--middle"><span class="cmp-Rating-on" style="width: 100.0%;"></span></div><div class="cmp-strong"><a data-tn-element="featuredReviewLink" class="cmp-featured-review" data-tn-link href="/cmp/Infineon-Technologies/reviews?id=dc43425b044f3d00" rel="nofollow">Productive and fun work environment</a></div><div class="cmp-note">Production Supervisor, Sandston, VA - <span>October 12, 2014</span></div><div class="cmp-review-text cmp-body-text">The Qimonda co-workers were like family. <script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
(function(ENV, TOKEN) {
	var isSupportedBrowser = false;
	var enabledEnvironments = ['prod', 'stage'];
	var isEnabled = isSupportedBrowser && enabledEnvironments.indexOf(ENV) > -1;
	var isMobile = false;

	function checkIgnoreCases(isUncaught, args, payload) {
		try {
			var isRemoteUncaught = isIgnoringRemoteUncaught(isUncaught, payload);
			var isIgnoringUrl = isIgnoringUrlSegment(args);

			return isRemoteUncaught || isIgnoringUrl;

		} catch (e) {
			// Most likely there was no filename or the frame doesnt exist
		}

		return false;
	}

	function isIgnoringUrlSegment(args) {
		var severity = args[0];
		var message = args[1];

		var ignoreMessage = [
				/WalkMeAPI/,
				/_walkmeInternals/
			].some(function(regex) {
				return regex.test(message);
			});

		return ignoreMessage;
	}

	function isIgnoringRemoteUncaught(isUncaught, payload) {
		var filename = payload.body.trace.frames[0].filename;

		// Ignore uncaught errors that are not from any bamboohr domains
		return isUncaught && !filename.match(/bamboohr/);
	}

	var locRegex = /^(https?):\/\/[a-z._-]*\.bamboohr\.[^\/]+(.*)/i;
	var buildVersionRegex = /^\/\d{2}\.\d{4}\.\d{6}-\w{7}\/js\//;
	var distJsRegex = /\.dist\.js$/i;
	var _rollbarConfig = {
			accessToken: TOKEN,
			captureUncaught: isEnabled,
			captureUnhandledRejections: isEnabled,
			enabled: isEnabled,
			payload: {
				environment: ENV + '-' + (isMobile ? 'mobile' : 'desktop'),
				client: {
					javascript: {
						source_map_enabled: true,
						code_version: '17.1028.010201-8e12234',
						guess_uncaught_frames: true
					}
				}
			},
			ignoredMessages: ['Script error.', 'Script error'], // ignore CORS issues (confirmed by rollbarjs devs)
			checkIgnore: checkIgnoreCases,
			transform: function(payload) {
				var trace = payload.body.trace;
				if (trace && Array.isArray(trace.frames)) {
					trace.frames.forEach(function(frame) {
						var filename = frame.filename;
						if (typeof filename === 'string') {
							var m = locRegex.exec(filename);

							if (m) {
								var protocol = m[1];
								var path = m[2];

								if (
									distJsRegex.test(path) &&
									buildVersionRegex.test(path)
								) {
									path = path.replace(buildVersionRegex, '/js/');
								}

								frame.filename = protocol + '://dynamichost' + path;
							}
						}
					});
				}
			}
		};

	// Rollbar Snippet
