		<script type="text/javascript">
	(function() {
		Object.defineProperties(window, {
			ENV: {
				value: 'prod'
			},
			BUILD_VERSION: {
				value: ''
			},
			BASE_DOMAIN: {
				value: 'bamboohr.com'
			},
			isarray: {
				value: Array.isArray
			}
		});

		window.BambooHR = window.BambooHR || {};

		Object.defineProperties(window.BambooHR, {
			env: {
				value: Object.freeze({
					val: window.ENV,
					dev: window.ENV === 'dev',
					stage: window.ENV === 'stage',
					prod: window.ENV === 'prod'
				})
			}
		});

		Object.defineProperty(window, 'DOMAIN', {
			value: (function() {
				if (window.BambooHR.env.dev) {
					return '';
				}
				var subdomain = window.BambooHR.env.prod ? '' : '.' + window.ENV;
				return 'resources' + subdomain + '.bamboohr.com';
			})()
		});
		Object.defineProperty(window, 'ROOT_URL', {
			value: window.location.protocol + '//' + (window.DOMAIN || window.location.hostname)

				<div class="ResAts__card-content">
					<div class="row">
						<div class="col-xs-12">
							<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >COMPANY</span></p>
<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >Thor Trucks is a technology company working on solutions in the commercial freight and renewable energy sectors. We develop solutions that enable a new energy future free of fossil fuels. Currently, we are building &nbsp;safer, smarter, greener ways of transporting freight.</span></p>
<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >We are a small team that moves fast and is growing quickly. Ideal candidates at this stage are those who are excited about joining a young company, able to take on real responsibilities with limited oversight, have leadership experiences, and thrive on executing.<br ><br ></span></p>
<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >ROLE</span></p>
<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >Thor is looking for an Electrical Engineering intern to assist lead engineers with design, fabrication, and validation of pre/post-production systems. This is an opportunity to take on a dynamic role in a multidisciplinary team building a real product.</span></p>
<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >This role is ideal for candidates that are:</span></p>
<ul style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" >
<li ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >self motivated to learn quickly</span></li>
<li ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >will excel in the start-up environment (fast-paced, small team, wear many hats)</span></li>
<li ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >obsessed with solving complex problems<br ><br ></span></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >RESPONSIBILITIES</span></p>
<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >- Creating electrical schematics, such as building wiring diagrams&nbsp;</span><br ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >- Designing wire harnesses comfortably through bidirectional integration&nbsp;</span><br ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >- Utilize knowledge of circuit components to perform circuit analysis&nbsp;</span><br ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >- Work with DSPs, microcontrollers, and other programmable devices<br ><br ></span></p>
<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >QUALIFICATIONS</span></p>
<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >- Be able to understand and draw schematics with at least one CAD tool&nbsp;</span><br ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >- Basic shop skills for hands-on construction&nbsp;</span><br ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >- Experience with power electronics and high/low voltage systems&nbsp;</span><br ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >- Experience with automotive environmental, reliability, and safety requirements is a plus</span></p>
<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >The Thor internship program is an opportunity for students enrolled in a bachelor&rsquo;s degree program, consolidated bachelor&rsquo;s/master&rsquo;s degree program, master&rsquo;s degree program, or PhD program.</span></p>
<p style="color: #2b333a;font-size: 16px;font-family: OpenSans, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" ><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif" >You must be available to work a minimum of 15 hrs per week, for a minimum of 10 weeks. Compensation starts at $12/hour.</span></p>
						</div>

<fieldset class="fieldsetIndent-outside">
				<div class="fieldRow ">
		<div class="fieldBox fileField  required">
			<label for="resume">Resume</label>
			<div class="fieldDiv" id="resumeUpload">
				<div class="files">
									</div>

				<span class="attach-wrapper" data-id="resume" ></span>
				<script>
					$(function() {
						var resumeFileId = '';
						var options = {
							linkHTML: '<a class="attach-link btn" >Choose File</a>',
							success: function (data, elm) {
								$('#resumeUpload .noFile').hide();
								$('#resumeUpload .attach-link').parent().hide();
								$('#resumeUpload .fallbackframe').parent().hide();
								var attachInput = $('#resumeUpload .attach-wrapper').closest('form').find('input[name=attachId]');
								if(attachInput.length != 0) {
									attachInput.val(data.fid);
								} else {
									var form = $('#resumeUpload .attach-wrapper').closest('form')
									form.append('<input type="hidden" name="attachId" value="'+data.fid+'">');
								}
							},
							removeFile: function() {
								$('#resumeUpload .noFile').show();
								$('#resumeUpload .attach-link').parent().show();
								$('#resumeUpload .fallbackframe').parent().show();
								$('#resumeUpload .attach-wrapper').closest('form').find('input[name=attachId]').remove();
								return true;
							},
							createFileWrapper: function(name, progress) {
								$('#resumeUpload .attach-link').parent().hide();
								$('#resumeUpload .noFile').hide();
								return $.fileUploader.createFileWrapper(name, progress);
							},
							uploaderId: 'edit_application',
							validExtensions: '.xlsx, .xls, .pptx, .ppt, .docx, .doc, .txt, .rtf, .odt, .ods, .odp, .pdf, .png, .jpg, .gif, .bmp',
							fallbackParams: {
								style: 'default',
								requirePreviewable: 1
							}
						}
						$('#resumeUpload .attach-wrapper').parent().fileUploader(options);
						if (resumeFileId) {
							$('#resumeUpload .attach-link').parent().hide();
							$('#resumeUpload .fallbackframe').parent().hide();
							$('#resumeUpload .file-x').click(function () {
								$.fileUploader.remove($(this).closest('#resumeUpload .file-wrapper'));
								$('#resumeUpload .noFile').show();
								$('#resumeUpload .attach-link').parent().show();
								$('#resumeUpload .fallbackframe').parent().show();
							})
						}
					});
				</script>
				<span class="noFile"><i class="bicon-file-upload"></i>No file selected</span>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>

<script>
var curStateVal = '';
$(function () {
	$('label.input :input').insetLabel();
	$('#country').change( updateStateDropDown );
	$('.js-state-fieldDiv').on('keyup', '.js-state-input', function() {
		curStateVal = this.value;
	});
	var initialCountry = $('#country').val();
	if(initialCountry != "1" && initialCountry != "2" && initialCountry != "222" && initialCountry != "3") {
		updateStateDropDown();
	}

	if ($('input[name="applicant\[linkedinUrl\]"]').closest('form').is('.bhrValidate')) {
		//delay this until all other loading scripts are complete, since validator probably hasn't run on the form
		setTimeout(function() {
			$.validator.addMethod('linked_in_url', function(value, element, param) {
				return validateLinkedIn($(element));
			});
			$('input[name="applicant\[linkedinUrl\]"]').each(function() {
				$(this).rules("add",{ linked_in_url:true });
			});
		},1);
	}
	if ($('input[name="applicant\[websiteUrl\]"]').closest('form').is('.bhrValidate')) {
		//delay this until all other loading scripts are complete, since validator probably hasn't run on the form
		setTimeout(function() {
			$.validator.addMethod('website_url', function(value, element, param) {
				return validateWebsite($(element));
			});
			$('input[name="applicant\[websiteUrl\]"]').each(function() {
				$(this).rules("add",{ website_url: true });
			});
		},1);
	}
});
	function updateStateDropDown() {
	    // look up by name = countryId
	    var country = false;
	    var stateText;
	    if($('#country').length) {
		country=parseInt($('#country').val());
	    }
	    if(!country){
		return;
	    }
	    switch (country) {
		    case 1://us
		    case 0://nothing
		    case 3: // australia
			    stateText = "State";
			    break;
		    case 222://uk
			    stateText = "County";
			    break;
		    default:
			    stateText = "Province";
			    break;
	    }
	    $('label[for=state]').text(stateText);
	    var stateSelector = ".state-field";
	    $.getJSON("/ajax/states.php?country="+country, function(data) {
		if(data.result=='OK') {

			var lastVal=$(stateSelector).val() || "";

			if(data.data.length>0) {
				var newEl=$('<select class="list-field state-field"></select>');
				newEl.attr("name",$(stateSelector).attr("name"));
				if( $(stateSelector+':first').hasClass('request')) {
					newEl.addClass("request");
				}
				if( $(stateSelector+':first').hasClass('disabled')) {
					newEl.addClass('disabled');
					newEl.attr("onmousedown","return false");
				}
				$(stateSelector+':first').replaceWith(newEl).next('.chzn-container').remove();
				var optList=$(stateSelector)[0];
				if(optList){
					$(optList).removeClass('chzn-done').next('.chzn-container').remove();
					optList.options.length=0;
					optList.options[0]=new Option( "", "" );

					for(var i=0;i<data.data.length;i++) {
						var opt=new Option( data.data[i].name , data.data[i].id );
						if(data.data[i].name==lastVal || data.data[i].id==lastVal) {
							opt.selected=true;
						}
						optList.options[ i+1 ]=opt;
					}
				}
				$('select'+stateSelector+':visible').chosen(bhrChosenOptions);
			} else if($('input'+stateSelector).length==0) {
				if (!isNaN(curStateVal)) {
					curStateVal = '';
				}
				// There are no input.state elements, so de
				var newEl2 = $('<input type="text" class="state state-field text wide js-state-input" maxlength="255" ba-count-chars value="' + curStateVal + '" />');
				if( $('select'+stateSelector+':first').hasClass('request')) {
					newEl2.addClass('request');
				}

				newEl2.attr("name",$('select'+stateSelector).attr("name"));
				$('select'+stateSelector+':first').replaceWith( newEl2 );
				newEl2.next('.chzn-container').remove();
			}

		}
	    });
	}

	/**
	 * Validate a LinkedIn URL (make sure it has https?://linkedin.com)
	 *
	 * @param {wrapper} linkedin The jQuery wrapped element
	 *
	 * @returns {boolean}
	 */
	function validateLinkedIn(linkedin) {
		if (linkedin.length) {
			if (linkedin.val().length > 0 && linkedin.val().indexOf('http://') != 0 && linkedin.val().indexOf('https://') != 0) {
				linkedin.val('http://' + linkedin.val());
			}
			linkedInUrlRegEx = /^https?\:\/\/(.*\.)?linkedin.com/;
			if (linkedin.val().length > 0 && linkedInUrlRegEx.exec(linkedin.val()) === null) {
				return false;
			}
			return true;
		}
	}

	/**
	 * Validate a website (make sure it has https?://)
	 *
	 * @param {wrapper} website The jQuery wrapped element
	 *
	 * @returns {boolean}
	 */
	function validateWebsite(website) {
		if (website.length) {
			if (website.val().length > 0 && website.val().indexOf('http://') != 0 && website.val().indexOf('https://') != 0) {
				website.val('http://' + website.val());
			}
			websiteUrlRegEx = /^https?\:\/\/(.*\.)/;
			if (website.val().length > 0 && websiteUrlRegEx.exec(website.val()) === null) {
				return false;
			}
			return true;
		}
	}

	function applicationFormValidation() {
		var website = $('input[name="applicant\[websiteUrl\]"]');
		if(website.length && website.val().length > 0 && website.val().indexOf('http://') != 0 && website.val().indexOf('https://') != 0 ){
			website.val('http://'+website.val());
		}
		var linkedin = $('input[name="applicant\[linkedinUrl\]"]');
		if(!validateLinkedIn(linkedin)) {
			linkedin.closest('.fieldBox').addClass('error');
		} else {
			linkedin.closest('.fieldBox').removeClass('error');
		}
		var website = $('input[name="applicant\[websiteUrl\]"]');
		if(!validateWebsite(website)) {
			website.closest('.fieldBox').addClass('error');
		} else {
			website.closest('.fieldBox').removeClass('error');
		}
		var missing = {};
		$('#applicationForm').find('.required :input').each(function(index, item) {
			if($(item).is('#description')) {
				if(tinyMCE.get('description').getContent() == '') {
					missing[$(item).attr('name')] = item;
				}
			} else if($(item).is('.uploadInput')) {
				if($(item).parent() && $(item).parent().data('id') == "coverLetter") {
					//deal with verifying either clAttachId or coverLetterFileId
					if($('#applicationForm').find('input[name=clAttachId]').length == 0 && $('#applicationForm').find('input[name=coverLetterFileId]').length == 0) {
						missing[$(item).attr('name')+'cl'] = item;
					}
				}else{
					//deal with verifying either attachId or resumeFileId
					if($('#applicationForm').find('input[name=attachId]').length == 0 && $('#applicationForm').find('input[name=resumeFileId]').length == 0) {
						missing[$(item).attr('name')] = item;
					}
				}
			} else if(!$(item).val() && $(item).attr('name') != undefined) {
				missing[$(item).attr('name')] = item;
			}
		});
		for(var i in missing) {
			$(missing[i]).closest('.required').addClass('error');
			$(missing[i]).parent().children(':input').on('change.missing', function () {
				$(this).closest('.required').removeClass('error');
				$(this).off('change.missing');
			});
		}
		if($('.fieldBox.error').length > 0 || Object.keys(missing).length > 0) {
			alert("Whoops... No worries. Please fix any missing or incorrect information and try again.");
			return false;
		}
		return true;
	}
</script>
						</form>

					</div>
				</div>

				<div class="ResAts__card-content ResAts__card-content--footer clearfix">
					<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4">
						<button class="btn btnLarge btnAction js-jobs-submit-application addProcessing">Submit Application</button>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

			<div class="ResAts__page ResAts__success js-jobs-page js-jobs-success">

				<div class="ResAts__card-content">
					<div>
						<svg class="baseFillColor" viewBox="0 0 80 80" preserveAspectRatio="xMaxYMax meet">
							<use xlink:href="#Jobs-Complete"></use>
						</svg>
					</div>
					<div class="thanks">Thank You</div>
					<div class="success">Your application was submitted successfully.</div>
				</div>
			</div>

		</div>

	</div>

</div>

	window.addEventListener('message', function(e) {

<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

</span>

#g_nav #p_nav a:link,
#g_nav #p_nav a:visited,
.navBi #navpromo a:link,
.navBi #navpromo a:visited,
#g_nav #u_nav .navBi a:link,

,#user_actions:not(.loggedin) .navBi #userOptionsLabel
{

class="cmp-inline-block"><div id="cmp-about" class="cmp-section cmp-with-border cmp-chapter" data-tn-section="about"><h1 class="cmp-section-first-header">About gpac</h1><div class="cmp-section clearfix cmp-about-description" data-tn-component="about-description"><p class="cmp-body-text"><span id="cmp-short-description">Our headquarters is comprised of 8,000 square feet filled with a team of over 100 members who dedicate themselves to the recruiting industry.  We have a mindset.  We have a burning desire to be the absolute very best we can be. There is no such thing as simply sustaining in our world.  Businesses either grow or regress... and failure to grow is not</span><span id="cmp-more-link-container">&nbsp;&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="javascript:void(0);" id="cmp-more-link" data-tn-action-click data-tn-element="more-link">more...</a></span>&nbsp;<span id="cmp-more-description" class="hidden">an option for us.  Our winning culture defines the attitudes and behaviors that will be required by us to make our vision a reality.&nbsp;&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="javascript:void(0);" id="cmp-less-link">less</a></span></p></div><ul class="cmp-photo-stream" data-tn-component="about-photos"><li data-tn-element="photo[]"><a href="/cmp/Gpac/photos?photo=18at0kn0f5ncgd1m" class="cmp-featured-review-header">Featured Review</h3><div class="cmp-section cmp-review-entry"><div class="cmp-Rating cmp-Rating--normal cmp-Rating--middle"><span class="cmp-Rating-on" style="width: 100.0%;"></span></div><div class="cmp-strong"><a data-tn-element="featuredReviewLink" class="cmp-featured-review" data-tn-link href="/cmp/Gpac/reviews?id=0a1237a44c36bc39" rel="nofollow">Great culture with unlimited earning potential</a></div><div class="cmp-note">Search Consultant, Sioux Falls, SD - <span>January 2, 2017</span></div><div class="cmp-review-text cmp-body-text">The earning potential at gpac is completely dependent on the work you put in. Management and leadership wants nothing more to see everyone succeed and reach their full potential, and they have created one of the best work cultures in Sioux Falls (we just got air hockey, foosball, shuffleboard, and a dart board in the office). This job is not for everyone, but if you are self motivated, competitive, and eager to achieve your financial dreams while working with a great team, gpac is an opportunity to explore!</div></div></div><div class="cmp-section-footer" data-tn-component="reviewLinksSummary"><div class="cmp-chevron-link"><a data-tn-element="reviews-viewAllLink" data-tn-link             function MM_goToURL(doc, loc) {
                document.MM_returnValue = false;
                eval(doc + ".location='" + loc + "'");
            }

            function fixSubmitClasses() {
                var inputElements = document.getElementsByTagName("input");

                for (var i = 0; i < inputElements.length; i++) {
                    if (inputElements[i].type == "submit") {
                        $(inputElements[i]).addClass("submitbutton");
                    }
                }
            }
        </script>

<SCRIPT language="Javascript">
var focusElement;
function setFocusElement(e) {
if (e != null) { 
focusElement = e; 
}
}
function setFocus() {
 try {
  if (focusElement != null) { 
    focusElement.focus(); 
    }
 }
 catch(ex) {
 }
}
addOnLoadFunction(setFocus,null);
</SCRIPT>

<article>
    <header class="pf-rc-pageheading clearfix">
    	
    	<span class="bread-crumbs"><span>Job Opportunity</span></span>
    </header>
	<section class="pf-rc-component">
            <div class="job"><div class="details"><div class="header"><h3 class="title">Electrical Engineer - CCA Designer</h3>&nbsp;<span class="other-info"><span>10/2/17</span><span>--Electrical</span><span>USA - CA - Van Nuys</span></span></div></div></div>
    </section>
    <section class="pf-rc-component">
            <div class="button-row fixed clearfix">
		
            	<div class="button">
                 	<A id='Refer__a' HREF='res_referafriend.html' title='Refer This Job to a Friend' class="btn" id="referafriend">Refer</A>
                </div>
		
		
                
	            
	                <div class="button">
	                	<A id='Save__a' HREF='res_savetosavedjoblist.html?page=er-res_viewjob&erjob=62532' class="btn" id="save">Save</A>
	                </div>
	            
            	
					<div class="button">
	                	<A id='Apply__a' HREF='startsubmission.html?erjob=62532' class="btn primary" id="apply">Apply</A>
	                </div>
	            
	            
	            
	            
            </div>
            <hr>
            
	        
            <h4><span>Job ID:</span>&nbsp;ES20170210-21131</h4>
            

            <h4>Description:</h4>
            <div>
            	<p><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;"><strong>Title:</strong>&nbsp;Electrical Engineer - CCA Designer</span><br /><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;"><strong>REQ ID:&nbsp;</strong>ES20170210-21131</span><br /><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;"><strong>Location:</strong> Van Nuys, California</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;"><strong>Job Description:</strong></span></p>
<ul type="disc">
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Responsible for the digital CCA design process including requirements generation, preliminary design, peer reviews, detailed design, test plan generation, and integration and test</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Understand the requirements and architect a digital CCA solution including the use of TI DSP processors, Freescale or Intel Processors, Microcontrollers, FPGA(Xilinx, Altera&hellip;), CPLD, and volatile/no-volatile memory (DDRx, SRAM, ROM, Flash&hellip;) components</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Design high speed memory interfaces (DDRx)</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">High speed serial designs and protocols (PCIe/Gen3 PCIe, SRIO&hellip;)</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Work with board technologies such as HDI, Meg6, and back drilling</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Utilize RF simulation tool ADS to characterize high speed board routing</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Utilize the Cadence software suite used to generate the circuit card designs (Schematic Capture, Constraint-Driven, Layout, Simulation, and Timing Analysis)</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Work in a team environment and negotiate solutions with Hardware / Software Engineering and Systems Engineering&nbsp;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Work independently with strong technical leadership in generating the digital CCA design solutions and support the complete testing and qualification of the deliverable system</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;"><strong>Qualifications:</strong></span></p>
<ul type="disc">
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">BS Degree in electrical/computer engineering and&nbsp;10+ years or related experience</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;"><strong>Preferred/Additional Skills</strong>:</span></p>
<ul type="disc">
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">DoD Secret security clearance</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Experience with Avionics designs</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Experience with high speed serial protocols Ethernet and Fibre Channel network protocols</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Experience designing 10G Ethernet based Network Interface or 10G Ethernet Switch designs</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Experience designing and understanding of IPV4 or IPV6</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Experience with design for test and design for manufacturability techniques</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Experience using Cadence Incisive Enterprise Simulator, Subversion, Python or Perl</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Understanding&nbsp;of efficiency metrics such as hours/schematic page (Productivity and Quality)</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">Ability to write C++ and use Microsoft Visual Studio</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;"><strong>Security Clearance: </strong></span></p>
<ul type="disc">
<li><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;">This position requires the candidate to possess or have the ability to obtain a DoD Secret security clearance. In order to obtain a clearance you need to be a US Citizen and show proof of citizenship.</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;"><em>Harris is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. We consider applicants without regard to race, color, religion, age, national origin, ancestry, ethnicity, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, veteran status, disability, genetic information, citizenship status, or membership in any other group protected by federal, state or local law.</em></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: verdana, geneva; font-size: 14px;"><em>By submitting your r&eacute;sum&eacute; for this position, you understand and agree that Harris Corporation may share your r&eacute;sum&eacute;, as well as any other related personal information or documentation you provide, with its subsidiaries and affiliated companies for the purpose of considering you for other available positions.</em></span></p>
            </div>
            <h4>Job Profile Matching Criteria:</h4>
            <table class="pf-rc-responsive-tbl" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0>
<tbody>  <TR>
      <TD>
Expertise      </TD>
      <TD class="res-col">
--Electrical      </TD>
  </TR>
  <TR>
      <TD>
Location      </TD>
      <TD class="res-col">
USA - CA - Van Nuys      </TD>
  </TR>
</tbody></TABLE>

    </section>

<script language="JavaScript">
  function handleSessions(status) {
    if (status.hasSession) {
    }
    else {
      // We were able to render this page, but we don't have an iPaaS Session
      jQuery.get("logout.html?defer=true");
      window.iPaaS.signOff();
    }
    window.iPaaS.sessionEnded = function () {
      // Make an ajax request to logout.html?defer=true
      jQuery.get("logout.html?defer=true");
      window.iPaaS.signOff();
    };

  }
  if ( window.iPaaS ) {
    window.iPaaS.ready(handleSessions);
  }
</script>

<div id="g_nav" data-tn-section="globalNav" role="navigation" class="left">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td nowrap><style type="text/css">

<div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

            <div id="social-network-button" class="pull-left">

			<script type="text/javascript">
				var addthis_config = {
					username:'addthisj2w'
					,ui_open_windows: true
					,ui_click: true
					,ui_508_compliant: true
					,data_track_clickback: false
					,ui_language: "en"
					,data_ga_property: "UA-81643606-1"
					,data_ga_social: true
				};
                var calledsfshorturl = false;
				$(function(){
					$('.addthis_toolbox').mouseover(function(e){
                        if (!calledsfshorturl) {
                            calledsfshorturl = true;
                            $(this).sfshorturl({
                                callback:addthisCallback
                                ,event:e
                                ,track: trackVars
                            });
                        }
					});

					function addthisCallback(data){
						$(data.event.target).attr('addthis:url',data.shorturl);
						addthis.update('share', 'url', data.shorturl);
					}

				});

			</script>

            <p lang="en_US" xml:lang="en_US" class="jobDate" id="job-date"><strong>Date: </strong>
                <span itemprop="datePosted">Oct 18, 2017
                </span>
            </p>
		    <p lang="en_US" xml:lang="en_US" class="jobLocation" id="job-location">
		    	<strong>Location: </strong>
		    	<span itemprop="jobLocation">El Segundo, CA, US, 90245</span>
		    </p>
            <p id="job-company" class="jobCompany" lang="en_US" xml:lang="en_US">
                <strong>Company: </strong>
                <span itemprop="hiringOrganization">The Aerospace Corporation</span>
            </p>
                <div class="job clearfix">
        <span itemprop="description"><p><span style="font-size:18.0px"><strong>Requisition ID: 34081</strong></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:16.0px"><strong>All Locations:</strong> El Segundo, CA (California)</span></p>

<p>A trusted partner. A national resource. A leader in national security space. We are THE Aerospace Corporation. A team that takes pride in our readiness to solve some of the most complex technical challenges in existence. With challenges spanning clandestine to commercial, youll have the unique opportunity to work on projects that are literally evolving our nation's space and launch capabilities. We all share a common passion and aspiration  to serve a mission much bigger than ourselves. When you join our team, youll be part of a rare collection of thought leaders and game-changing innovators. Are you ready to launch your career?</p>
<div><p style='padding: 10px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><p style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><b>Responsibilities</b>&#13;</p><p><p><strong>SUMMARY OF RESPONSIBILITIES</strong></p>

<p>The Aerospace Corporation is seeking a Digital Communications Graduate Intern for an internship opportunity. This position will be located&nbsp;in El Segundio, CA.&nbsp;<br />
<br />
The qualified candidate will become part of the Digital Communications Implementation Department.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>KEY FUNCTIONS</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Design and implement various real-time algorithms with applications to GPS / GNSS receivers and/or communication transceivers on multi-processor platforms consisted of microprocessors, FPGAs and software defined radios (SDRs).</li>
	<li>Develop real-time applications on Xilinx&#39;s Zynq ARM processor and/or other microcontrollers</li>
	<li>Research cutting edge embedded processing platforms to enhance product features, reliability, and performance.</li>
	<li>Document work products in briefings and/or technical reports to customers and colleagues.</li>
	<li>Candidate will work on a diverse set of projects. It is very important to be hands on, willing to learn and be comfortable in working in an environment with engineers of diverse backgrounds and expertise.</li>
	<li>Participates&nbsp;with an interdisciplinary team in ongoing research or technical programs with academic collaboration partners.</li>
	<li>Applies standard techniques and procedures to carry out a series of prescribed&nbsp;scientific and/or engineering tasks.</li>
	<li>Training and mentorship will be provided.</li>
</ul>
&#13;</p></p><p style='padding: 10px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><p style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><b>Qualifications</b>&#13;</p><p><p><strong>Performance standards to be successful in this internship position include:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Strong written and oral communication skills</li>
	<li>Must work well in a team environment</li>
	<li>Must possess strong organizational, time management and project management skills</li>
	<li>Demonstrated flexibility and ability to adapt to changing organizational need</li>
	<li>Effective interpersonal skills to coordinate efforts and work with other internal and external organizations</li>
	<li>Demonstrates behavior that is consistent with the company&rsquo;s values of Dedication to Mission Success, Technical Excellence, Commitment to Our People, Integrity and Objectivity</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Bachelor&rsquo;s degree completed and currently enrolled at an accredited college/university degree program pursuing a Master&#39;s or PhD in&nbsp;Electrical Engineering or Computer Science, or a related technical discipline</li>
	<li>Experience with Microsoft Office applications (Word, PowerPoint and Excel)</li>
	<li>Minimum GPA 3.0</li>
	<li>Must be able to obtain a security clearance</li>
	<li>US Citizenship required</li>
	<li>Active enrollment in a graduate program&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Familiarity with one or more of the following programming languages: C, C++, Java, Python and MATLAB.</li>
	<li>Understanding Digital Communications, Digital Signal Processing &nbsp;or Embedded System fundamentals&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Familiarity with laboratory tools such as oscilloscopes, power supplies and multi-meters</li>
	<li>Effective verbal, written and interpersonal communication skills are necessary.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>GPA 3.5 or higher</li>
	<li>Active security clearance</li>
	<li>Experience with embedded development and/or familiarity with ARM&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Experience with FPGA design and VHDL&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Familiarity with GNU Radio&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Experience with working with Linux, and development on a Linux platform&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Familiarity with Agile methodology</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Temporary housing assistance is not available.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>The Aerospace Corporation functions as the nation&rsquo;s independent testing, assessment, and research center for national security space systems, specializing in advanced military space systems.&nbsp; Aerospace offers summer internship positions at our headquarters in El Segundo, California, and our campuses in Chantilly, Virginia, Colorado and New Mexico to give students the opportunity to work in the scientific, technical, or administrative areas of the company.</p>
&#13;</p></p><p style='padding: 10px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><p style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><b>Transcript Requirement</b>&#13;</p><p><p>Transcripts are required for this position.</p>
&#13;</p></p></div><p></p>

<p><span style="font-size:16.0px"><strong>Additional Requisition Details</strong></span></p>

<p><strong>System Job Title:</strong><span style="font-family:arial, helvetica, sans-serif"><strong></strong><span>MTS INTERN REQ</span></span><font face="Times New Roman"></font></p>

<p><strong>Clearance Requirement: </strong>None</p>

<p><strong>Access: </strong><span>None</span></p>

<p><strong>Polygraph: </strong><span>None</span></p>

<p><strong><span>Employment Type: </span></strong><span><span>Temporary</span></span></p>

<p><strong><span>Work Schedule: </span></strong><span><span>Full Time</span></span></p>

<p></p>

<p><span style="font-size:16.0px"><strong>Company Statement</strong></span></p>

<p>The Aerospace Corporation has provided independent technical and scientific research, development, and advisory services to national security space programs since 1960. We operate a federally funded research and development center (FFRDC) for the United States Air Force and the National Reconnaissance Office, and support all national security space programs. We also apply more than 50 years of experience with space systems to provide critical solutions to technologically complex systems in such areas as communications, shipping, law enforcement, and cyber, among others.</p>

<p>From our inception, our highly skilled technical staff has focused on ensuring the success of every mission and developing the most effective and economic space-related hardware and software in the world. Our greatest asset is the technical expertise of our people. Our state-of-the-art laboratory facilities are staffed by some of the leading scientists in the world.</p>

<p></p>

<p><span style="font-size:16.0px"><strong>Equal Opportunity Commitment</strong></span></p>

<p>The Aerospace Corporation is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. We believe that a diverse workforce creates an environment in which unique ideas are developed and differing perspectives are valued, producing superior customer solutions. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment and will not be discriminated against on the basis of race, gender, gender identity or expression, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, or disability status.</p>

<p>You can also review <a href="https://www.eeoc.gov/employers/upload/poster_screen_reader_optimized.pdf" target="_blank"><font color="#0066cc">The Equal Employment Opportunity is the Law</font></a> poster and <a href="https://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/OFCCP_EEO_Supplement_Final_JRF_QA_508c.pdf" target="_blank"><font color="#0066cc">the supplement</font></a>, as well as the <a href="http://www.aerospace.org/wp-content/uploads/hrdocs/PAY-TRANSPARENCY-POLICY.pdf" target="_blank"><font color="#0066cc">Pay Transparency Policy Statement</font></a></p>
        </span>

					<script type="text/javascript" src="/platform/js/j2w/min/j2w.apply.min.js?h=78293032"></script>
					<script type="text/javascript" src="/platform/js/j2w/min/j2w.sso.min.js?h=78293032"></script>
            <script type="text/javascript">
                //<![CDATA[
                    j2w.SSO.init({
                        email    : '',
                        enabled  : false,
                        jobID    : 436991000,
                        locale   : 'en_US',
                        tcaction : 'job',
                        usingRD  : true
                    });

                    // This code is to deal with empty e-mail strings on back button clicks to the page when first logging in.
                    $(window).load(function () {
                        if (''.length && !j2w.SSO.getEmail().length) {
                            $.ajax({
                                type    : 'GET',
                                url     : '/services/security/email',
                                success : function (data) {
                                    if (data.email.length) {
                                        j2w.SSO.setEmail(data.email);
                                    }
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    });
                //]]>
            </script>
            <script type="text/javascript">
                //<![CDATA[
                j2w.Apply.init({
                    jobID                 : 436991000,
                    locale                : 'en_US',
                    relocateApplyURL      : '',
                    subscribeAtApply      : true,
                    useOnPageBusinessCard : true
                });
                //]]>
            </script>
        <script type="text/javascript">
            //<![CDATA[

            $(function() {
                $errorbox = $('#signin-error').hide();
                $errorboxmessage = $('#signin-error-message');
                $infobox = $('#signin-info').hide();
                $infoboxmessage = $('#signin-info-message');
                $successbox = $('#signin-success').hide();
                $successboxmessage = $('#signin-success-message');

                originalURI = "/job/El-Segundo-Digital-Communications-Grad-Intern-CA-90245/436991000/";
                enterEmailPrompt = 'Email';
                applyErrorMessage = 'There was an unexpected error processing your email. Please try again.';
                applySuccessMessage = '<p>Thank you. You should receive an email containing a link to this job along with details on how to apply.</p><p>A larger screen is required, so please open the email with a full-scale device.</p>';
                invalidEmailMessage = 'Please enter a valid email address.';
                pleaseWaitMessage = 'Please wait...';
                alreadyAUserMessage = 'You are already a user of this site. {0}';

                emailRegex = '^(?=([a-zA-Z0-9.+!_-])+[@]([a-zA-Z0-9.-])*[.]([a-zA-Z0-9]){1,63}$)(?!.*[-\\s,])(?!.*[.]{2})';
                jobLocale = "en_US";

                tcSignIn = 'Sign in';
                useSSL = 1;
                useMobileTC = 0;

                $message = $('#apply-message');
                $email = $('#email');
                $jobid = $('#jobid');
                $applyButton = $('#apply-button');

                // format is a jQuery validation built-in function. That library is not used on this page, so provide a similar format here.
                String.prototype.format = function() {
                    var s = this, i = arguments.length;
                    while (i--) {
                        s = s.replace(new RegExp('\\{' + i + '\\}', 'gm'), arguments[i]);
                    }
                    return s;
                };

                lastEmailSubmitted = ''; // Holds email address last submitted, to prevent multi-clicks

                if ( !$email.val().length ) {
                    $email.val(enterEmailPrompt.unescapeHTML()).one('focus',function(){
                        $(this)
                        .val('')
                        .css({
                            color:'#222222'
                        });
                    });
                }

                $('#email-job').submit(function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();

                    applyFormUrl = '/mobile/talentcommunity/apply/'+$jobid.val()+'/?email=' + encodeURIComponent($email.val()) + '&locale=' + jobLocale + "&slp=" + encodeURIComponent("/mobile/talentcommunity/thanks/");

                    loginFormUrl = '/mobile/talentcommunity/login/?email=' + encodeURIComponent($email.val()) + '&locale=' + jobLocale + '&returnurl=' + encodeURIComponent(originalURI);


                    if ( $email.val().match(emailRegex) ) {
                        if ( $email.val() != lastEmailSubmitted ) {
                            switch (useMobileTC) {
                                case 1: //useMobileTC
                                    infoMessage(pleaseWaitMessage);
                                    $.ajax({
                                        type:	'POST',
                                        url:	'/services/security/validateemail',
                                        data:	{ email : $email.val() },
                                        dataType: 'json',
                                        error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                                            errorMessage(applyErrorMessage);
                                        },
                                        success: function(data) {
                                            lastEmailSubmitted = $email.val();
                                            $email.unbind('keyup');

                                            if ( data.rmk8 && !data.emailMatchesSession ) {
                                                // The logged-in user is not a new user, and the e-mail address they provided to apply doesn't match -- they need to login.
                                                // Build a "sign in" link with return URL and locale information.
                                                msg  = '<a href="' + loginFormUrl + '">' + tcSignIn + '</a>';
                                                // Substitute the {0} placeholder in alreadyAUserMessage with msg.
                                                infoMessage(alreadyAUserMessage.format(msg));

                                                setReturnURL( null, document.location);
                                            } else if ( data.rmk8 && data.emailMatchesSession ) {
                                                // The user is valid and is logged in. Send the mobile apply e-mail and go to 'thanks'.
                                                sendMobileApplyEmail(finishDirectToThanks, $jobid.val(), $email.val());
                                            } else {
                                                // The user is a brand-new user. Send the mobile apply e-mail and go to mobile subscribe.
                                                $errorbox = $('#signin-error').hide();
                                                $errorbox.hide();
                                                // Empty submitted to allow for 'Back' pressing in mobile device
                                                lastEmailSubmitted = '';
                                                // Redirect the user to the subscribe page.
                                                setReturnURL( function(){ document.location.href = applyFormUrl; }, document.location);
                                                //document.location.href = applyFormUrl;
                                            }
                                        }
                                    });
                                    break;
                                case 0: //dontUseMobileTC
                                    sendMobileApplyEmail(finishDirectToThanks, $jobid.val(), $email.val());
                                    break;
                                default:
                                    break;
                            }
                        }
                    } else {
                        errorMessage(invalidEmailMessage);

                        $email
                        .keyup(function(){
                            if($(this).val().match(emailRegex)) {
                                $errorbox = $('#signin-error').hide();
                            } else {
                                errorMessage(invalidEmailMessage);
                            }
                        });
                    }
                });
            });

            // Finishes an apply action by showing the thanks message.
            function finishDirectToThanks() {
                successMessage(applySuccessMessage);
                // Reposition the screen so the thanks message is visible.
                window.scrollTo(0,0);
            }

            // Sends out the mobile apply e-mail, and optionally performs additional steps on success.
            function sendMobileApplyEmail(fCallback, jobid, email) {
                serviceUrl = '/services/mobileapply/sendemail?email='+email+'&jobid='+jobid;
                $.ajax({
                    type:	'GET',
                    url:        serviceUrl,
                    dataType:   'json',
                    error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                        errorMessage(applyErrorMessage);
                    },
                    success: function(data) {
                        if ( data == true ) {
                            if ( typeof fCallback == 'function' ) {
                                fCallback();
                            }
                        } else {
                            errorMessage(applyErrorMessage);
                        }
                    }
                });
            }

            function setReturnURL(fCallback, url){
                $.ajax({
                    type:	'GET',
                    url:        '/services/navigation/setredirect?url='+encodeURIComponent(url),
                    dataType:   'json',
                    error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                        errorMessage(applyErrorMessage);
                    },
                    success: function(data) {
                        if ( typeof fCallback == 'function' ) {
                            fCallback();
                        }
                    }
                });
            }

            function infoMessage(message){
                $infobox.show();
                $errorbox.hide();
                $successbox.hide();
                $infoboxmessage.html(message);
            }
            function errorMessage(message){
                $errorbox.show();
                $infobox.hide();
                $successbox.hide();
                $errorboxmessage.html(message);
            }
            function successMessage(message){
                $successbox.show();
                $errorbox.hide();
                $infobox.hide();
                $successboxmessage.html(message);
            }
            //]]>
        </script>

					<script type="text/javascript" src="/platform/js/j2w/min/socialApplyRD.min.js?h=78293032"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
function icims_stripIFrameParameter(url) {
url = url.replace(/\?in_iframe=1\&?/, '?');
url = url.replace(/\&in_iframe=1\&?/, '&');
url = url.replace(/(\?|&)$/, '');
return url;
}

document.cookie = "jsEnabled=true;path=/";
var icimsWindow = false;
try {
icimsWindow = window.top.location.href.indexOf('') >= 0;
} catch (e) {}

if (icimsWindow) {
try {

if (window.history.replaceState) {
parent.updateUrl(icims_stripIFrameParameter(window.location.href));
}
} catch (e) {}

try {

var windowUrl = window.top.location.href;
if (windowUrl.match(/\?in_iframe=1\&?/) || windowUrl.match(/\&in_iframe=1\&?/)) {
document.cookie = 'icims_iframeRedirReferer=' + encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) + ';path=/';
window.top.location.href = icims_stripIFrameParameter(windowUrl);
}
} catch (e) {}

}
</script>

(function () {
var initialize = function() {
// Require _c2a object
if(typeof _c2a === 'undefined') return;
// Prevent multiple initializations
if(typeof _c2a === 'object' && _c2a.initialized === true) return;
var pendingCommands = _c2a || [];
var i = 0;
var commandHandler = {
initialized: true,
push: function(arr) {
try {
if(typeof Click2Apply === 'object' && Object.prototype.toString.call(arr) === '[object Array]') {
var eventName = arr[0];
var s_jobId = arr[1];
var s_userId = arr[2];
var s_title = arr[3];
switch (eventName) {
case "View":
Click2Apply.analytics.View({
jobid: s_jobId,
title: s_title
});
break;
case "Start":
Click2Apply.analytics.Start({
jobid: s_jobId,
userId: s_userId
});
break;
case "Apply":
Click2Apply.analytics.Apply({
jobid: s_jobId,
userId: s_userId
});
break;
}
}
} catch (e){};
}
}
for(i=0; i < pendingCommands.length; i++) {
commandHandler.push(pendingCommands[i]);
}
_c2a = commandHandler;
}
var loadScript = function () {
var c2a = document.createElement('script'),
scriptElem = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],

atsId = '1043',
recruiterId = '';

if (c2a.readyState) { // IE.
c2a.onreadystatechange = function() {
if (c2a.readyState == "loaded" || c2a.readyState == "complete") {
c2a.onreadystatechange = null;
initialize();
};
};
} else { // Others.
c2a.onload = initialize;
}
scriptElem.parentNode.insertBefore(c2a, scriptElem);
};
if (window.addEventListener) {
window.addEventListener('load', loadScript, false);
} else if (window.attachEvent) {
window.attachEvent('onload', loadScript);
} else if (typeof window.onload === 'function'){
var originalOnload = window.onload;
window.onload = function() {
originalOnload();
loadScript();
}
} else {
window['onload'] = loadScript;
}
})();

<script type="text/javascript">

function ResourceBundle(lang) {
var messageFormat = new MessageFormat(lang);
var resourceBundle = new Array();
resourceBundle['utils.js.ErrorCannotOpenPopUpPleas_686'] = 'Error: Cannot open pop-up. Please make sure pop-up blockers are disabled.';
resourceBundle['utils.js.PleaseSpecifyAValidPageNu_691'] = 'Please specify a valid page number';
resourceBundle['utils.js.Loading_690'] = 'Loading';
resourceBundle['utils.js.Updating_689'] = 'Updating';
resourceBundle['utils.js.MsgtextPleaseWait_1153'] = '{msgText}, please wait...';
resourceBundle['handlebarshelpers.js.welcome-text'] = 'Welcome, {name}!';
resourceBundle['utils.js.Sending_688'] = 'Sending';
resourceBundle['utils.js.Saving_687'] = 'Saving';

ResourceBundle.prototype.get = function(message, variables) {
if (typeof(resourceBundle[message]) === 'undefined') {
return '';
}
if (typeof(resourceBundle[message]) === 'string') {
resourceBundle[message] = messageFormat.compile(resourceBundle[message]);
}
return resourceBundle[message](variables);
}
}
var resourceBundle = new ResourceBundle('');
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
function icims_resizeIFrameHeight() {

icims_resizeIFrame('https://careers-appliedminds.icims.com');

}
function icims_scroll(x, y) {
icims_scrollIFrame(x, y, 'https://careers-appliedminds.icims.com');
}
if (window.attachEvent) {
window.attachEvent('onresize', icims_resizeIFrameHeight);
} else if (window.addEventListener) {
window.addEventListener('resize', icims_resizeIFrameHeight, true);
}
icimsAddOnload(function() {
icimsCheckCookie();
icims_resizeIFrameHeight();

if (document.querySelectorAll) {
var errorMsg = document.querySelectorAll('.iCIMS_ErrorMessage');
if (errorMsg && errorMsg.length > 0) {
for (var i = 0; i < errorMsg.length; i++) {
if (errorMsg[i].offsetHeight > 0) {
try {
errorMsg[i].focus();
} catch (e) {}
break;
}
}
}
}

if (icimsWindow) {
var bodyTag = window.parent.document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];
var skipLink = window.parent.document.getElementById('icims_skiplink');
if (bodyTag && !skipLink) {
skipLink = document.createElement('a');
skipLink.textContent = 'Skip to Content';
skipLink.setAttribute('id', 'icims_skiplink');
skipLink.setAttribute('style', 'left: -9999px; position: absolute; top: -1px;');
skipLink.setAttribute('href', '#icims_content_iframe');
if (bodyTag.firstElementChild) {
bodyTag.insertBefore(skipLink, bodyTag.firstElementChild);
} else {
bodyTag.appendChild(skipLink);
}
}
}

var messages = document.getElementsByClassName('iCIMS_GenericMessage');
var primaryMessage, secondaryMessage, focusMessage;
if (messages) {
for (var index = 0; index < messages.length; index++) {
if (ICIMS.hasClass(messages[index], 'iCIMS_SuccessMessage') || (ICIMS.hasClass(messages[index], 'iCIMS_ErrorMessage') && !ICIMS.hasClass(messages[index], 'iCIMS_FieldError'))) {

primaryMessage = primaryMessage || messages[index];
} else if (ICIMS.hasClass(messages[index], 'iCIMS_SystemMessage')) {
secondaryMessage = secondaryMessage || messages[index];
}
if (primaryMessage) {
break;
}
}
focusMessage = primaryMessage || secondaryMessage;
if (focusMessage) {
focusMessage.focus();
}
}

});
var icimsIframeResizeTimer = setInterval(icims_resizeIFrameHeight, 500);

try {
if (window.orientation) {
window.addEventListener("orientationchange", icims_resizeIFrameHeight, false);
}
} catch (e) {}

var isHub = false;
if (!window.history.replaceState || isHub) {
icimsAddOnload(function() {
var links = document.getElementsByTagName("a");
for (var i = 0; i < links.length; i++) {
if (!links[i].target) {
var href = links[i].getAttribute('href')
if (href) {
var prevInnerHTML = links[i].innerHTML;
links[i].setAttribute('href', icims_stripIFrameParameter(href));

links[i].innerHTML = prevInnerHTML;
}
if (href && href != '#') {
links[i].target = icimsWindow ? "_top" : "_parent";
}
}
}
});
}

icimsAddOnload(function() {
try {
if (icimsWindow && parent) {
parent.document.title = document.title;
}
} catch (e) {}
});

experience preferred<\/li>\n <li>Expertise in design of embedded software systems language<\/li>\n <li>Knowledge of device drivers for interfacing control systems and sensing hardware<\/li>\n <li>Strong programming skills in C and C++ for real-time control and sensor processing<\/li>\n <li>Experience with broad bringup and programming and debugging microcontroller based systems<\/li>\n <li>Familiarity with debugging tools such as bus analyzers and oscilloscopes<\/li>\n <li>Knowledge of peripheral buses like I2C and SPI<\/li>\n <li>Experience in networking and peripheral interfaces<\/li>\n <li>Demonstrated knowledge of rapid prototyping, debugging and problem solving skills<\/li>\n <li>Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to create strong working relationships with cross-functional teams<\/li>\n <li>Robotics background is a plus<\/li>\n<\/ul>","@id":"1283","datePosted":"2017-04-13T04:00:00.000Z","title":"Embedded Systems Programmer <div class="container-fluid iCIMS_JobsTable">
<div class="row">
<div class="col-xs-12 title">
<h1 class="iCIMS_Header">
Embedded Systems Programmer (Top Secret Clearance Required)</h1>
</div>
<div class="col-xs-6 header left">
<dl class="" >
<dt class="">
<span class="glyphicons glyphicons-map-marker"></span>
<label class="sr-only">Job Location</label>
</dt>
<dd class="">
US-CA-Burbank</dd>
</dl></div>
<div class="col-xs-6 header right">
</div>
</div>
</div>




























<h2 class="iCIMS_InfoMsg iCIMS_InfoField_Job">



Overview


</h2>



<div class="iCIMS_InfoMsg iCIMS_InfoMsg_Job" >
<div class="iCIMS_Expandable_Container">
<div class="iCIMS_Expandable_Text">
<p style="margin: 0px;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; color: #888888; font-size: small;">The <strong>Embedded Systems Programmer</strong> will work as a key member of our multi-disciplinary team.&nbsp; The ideal candidate will be responsible for system design, rapid prototype development, and implementation and will have a balance between analytical ability and practical implementation on hardware systems.</span></p>
<div id="iCIMS_Expandable_Button"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>





<h2 class="iCIMS_InfoMsg iCIMS_InfoField_Job">



Responsibilities


</h2>



<div class="iCIMS_InfoMsg iCIMS_InfoMsg_Job" >
<div class="iCIMS_Expandable_Container">
<div class="iCIMS_Expandable_Text">
<ul><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: small; color: #888888;">Collaborate with electrical and mechanical engineers on the hardware design and implementation process</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: small; color: #888888;">Troubleshoot, performance tune, and optimize embedded systems in a production environment</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: small; color: #888888;">Understand hardware and software interactions</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: small; color: #888888;">Perform all phases of software development: requirements, design, implementation, verification, and release, which includes testing and support</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: small; color: #888888;">Develop embedded C/C++ applications/firmware</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: small; color: #888888;">Develop and execute test procedures</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: small; color: #888888;">Develop supporting design documentation</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: small; color: #888888;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: small; color: #888888;">All other duties as assigned </span></span></li></ul>
<div id="iCIMS_Expandable_Button"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>





<h2 class="iCIMS_InfoMsg iCIMS_InfoField_Job">



Qualifications


</h2>



<div class="iCIMS_InfoMsg iCIMS_InfoMsg_Job" >
<div class="iCIMS_Expandable_Container">
<div class="iCIMS_Expandable_Text">
<ul><li><span style="color: #808080; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Active Top Secret Clearance required</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #888888;">BS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics or equivalent and 3+ years of experience preferred</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #888888;">Expertise in design of embedded software systems language</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #888888;">Knowledge of device drivers for interfacing control systems and sensing hardware</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #888888;">Strong programming skills in C and C++ for real-time control and sensor processing</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #888888;">Experience with broad bringup and programming and debugging microcontroller based systems</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #888888;">Familiarity with debugging tools such as bus analyzers and oscilloscopes</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #888888;">Knowledge of peripheral buses like I2C and SPI</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #888888;">Experience in networking and peripheral interfaces</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #888888;">Demonstrated knowledge of rapid prototyping, debugging and problem solving skills</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #888888;">Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to create strong working relationships with cross-functional teams</span></li><li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #888888;">Robotics background is a plus</span></li></ul>
<div id="iCIMS_Expandable_Button"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
function loadJSAsync( ) {
for ( var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
var url = arguments[i];
(function() {
var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.async = true;
s.src = url;
el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
})();
}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

if (typeof window['closureReadyCallbacks'] == 'undefined') {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'] = [];
}

function call_when_jsall_loaded(cb) {
if (window['closureReady']) {
cb();
} else {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'].push(cb);
}
}
</script>

<div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

<table id="job-content" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" role="main">
<tr valign="top"><td style="padding:20px;padding-left:23px;">

<a tabindex="-1" id="job_header"></a>
<div data-tn-component="jobHeader">
<b class="jobtitle"><font size="+1">Electrical Engineer Intern</font></b>

<br>
<span class="company">MGA Entertainment</span>
 -
<span class="location">Van Nuys, CA</span>
<div>
<span class="no-wrap">Internship</span>
</div>
</div>
<table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0><tr><td class="snip">
<span id="job_summary" class="summary"><p><b>Company Summary: </b></p><p>MGA Entertainment, a consumer entertainment Products Company headquartered in Van Nuys, California, manufactures innovative lines of proprietary products for the toy and consumer electronics market. The company also licenses its IP in such areas as home dcor, stationery and sporting goods. The MGA family includes award-winning brands such as Little Tikes, Lalaloopsy, Moxie Girlz, Mooshka, Num Noms, Project Mc2, Bratz, and Zapf Creation. For more information please visit www.mgae.com.</p><p><b><i>Job Overview: </i></b></p><p>We are seeking an Electrical Engineering Intern to lead the electronics development of global consumer toy products and provide expertise throughout all stages of product development. Reporting to the Senior Product Development Engineer, the Engineering Intern will work with Marketing and Design to help evaluate the feasibility of new product concepts. This role will shape the electronics and programming of our toys in accordance with functional definitions set forth by Marketing and Design. In addition to feature and performance objectives, the Engineering Intern must also keep in mind safety, product integrity, costing, and scheduling.</p><p><b>KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: </b></p><ul><li>Responsible for preliminary design of electronics systems including hardware, schematics, flowcharts, Electronic Bill of Materials (EBOM), and other electronic design documents.</li><li>Maintain cost estimates of all projects and make recommendations to the team to steer the product towards target cost, without eliminating key features.</li><li>Participate in new product brainstorming with design and marketing.</li><li>Achieve "proof of concept" on unproven features by building early prototypes and further ideating with the Engineering team</li><li>Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure system designs are cohesive, on-time and on-cost.</li><li>Manage electronic projects with a customer-oriented mindset and provide detailed feedback using solid engineering principles.</li><li>Effectively communicate project status to necessary team members and elevate critical issues to Senior Product Development Engineer and team.</li><li>Research new technologies and create cost-effective applications for existing technologies.</li><li>Review engineering pilot samples at various stages with all responsible departments and communicate comments to Engineers and vendors overseas.</li><li>Debug samples that do not function according to spec and make modifications in order to properly communicate revisions.</li><li>Collaborate with manufacturing and Quality Assurance teams on reliability and safety.</li><li>Work effectively with external software / app vendors to ensure final performance of hardware and software.</li></ul><p><b>QUALIFICATIONS: </b></p><ul><li>Bachelor's degree or graduate degree in Electrical Engineering, Mechatronics, Computer Science or related field in progress.</li><li>Toy or consumer goods experience an asset</li><li>Strong skills with firmware and software development. Proficiency in C, C++, Assembly, etc.</li><li>Organized and systematic troubleshooting / debugging skills required.</li><li>Familiar with Altium or similar schematic software and PCB Layout skills.</li><li>Familiar with Microsoft Visio, Word, Excel, etc.</li><li>Experience with microcontrollers / microprocessors (such as ARM Cortex M0, General Plus, Nuvoton, Winbond, Nyquest, Sensory, etc.) is an asset but not required.</li><li>App development skills would be an asset but not required.</li><li>Strong interest in robotics industry, robotic technologies, and consumer electronics.</li><li>Ability to thrive in a dynamic, multifaceted, and fun environment.</li><li>Strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills.</li><li>Highly organized and able to multitask and prioritize competing demands.</li><li>Demonstrates a hands-on team approach to solving problems.</li><li>You are a "tinkerer" and a creative, dynamic, well-rounded individual.</li><li>Availability for international travel from time to time to support product development needs.</li></ul><p>Job Type: Internship</p><p>Required education:</p><ul><li>Bachelor's</li></ul><p>Required experience:</p><ul><li>Electrical Engineering: 1 year</li></ul></span><br><div id="p_0a044de1de180440">
<div class="result-link-bar-container result-link-bar-viewjob">
<div class="result-link-bar"><span class="date">30+ days ago</span> <span id="tt_set_0" class="tt_set">  -  <a id="sj_0a044de1de180440" href="#" class="sl resultLink save-job-link " onclick="changeJobState('0a044de1de180440', 'save', 'linkbar', false, ''); return false;" title="Save this job to my.indeed">save job</a></span><div id="editsaved2_0a044de1de180440" class="edit_note_content" style="display:none;"></div><script>if (!window['result_0a044de1de180440']) {window['result_0a044de1de180440'] = {};}window['result_0a044de1de180440']['showSource'] = false; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['source'] = "Indeed"; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['loggedIn'] = false; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['showMyJobsLinks'] = false;window['result_0a044de1de180440']['undoAction'] = "unsave";window['result_0a044de1de180440']['relativeJobAge'] = "30+ days ago";window['result_0a044de1de180440']['jobKey'] = "0a044de1de180440"; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['myIndeedAvailable'] = true; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['showMoreActionsLink'] = false; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['resultNumber'] = 0; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['jobStateChangedToSaved'] = false; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['searchState'] = ""; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['basicPermaLink'] = "https://www.indeed.com"; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['saveJobFailed'] = false; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['removeJobFailed'] = false; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['requestPending'] = false; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['notesEnabled'] = true; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['currentPage'] = "viewjob"; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['sponsored'] = false;window['result_0a044de1de180440']['reportJobButtonEnabled'] = false; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['showMyJobsHired'] = false; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['showSaveForSponsored'] = false; window['result_0a044de1de180440']['showJobAge'] = true;</script></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
function loadJSAsync( ) {
for ( var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
var url = arguments[i];
(function() {
var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.async = true;
s.src = url;
el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
})();
}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

if (typeof window['closureReadyCallbacks'] == 'undefined') {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'] = [];
}

function call_when_jsall_loaded(cb) {
if (window['closureReady']) {
cb();
} else {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'].push(cb);
}
}
</script>

<div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

<table id="job-content" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" role="main">
<tr valign="top"><td style="padding:20px;padding-left:23px;">

<a tabindex="-1" id="job_header"></a>
<div data-tn-component="jobHeader">
<b class="jobtitle"><font size="+1">Programmer / Puzzle Game Designer</font></b>

<br>
<span class="company">Interactive Adventures Play</span>
 -
<span class="location">Torrance, CA 90505</span>
<div>
<span class="no-wrap">Contract</span>
</div>
</div>
<table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0><tr><td class="snip">
<span id="job_summary" class="summary"><p>New live interactive game arena located in South Bay looking for creatively talented and passionate computer programmer to join our team on a multi-project contract basis.</p><p>The creative programmer is responsible for developing fun and creative interlinked games that are sequence triggered using Arduino or other micro-controllers with various components for a wide range of applications.</p><p>Please see this link for a taste of what this project entails:</p><p>https://create.arduino.cc/projecthub</p><p>Please read thoroughly on the requirements below.</p><p><b>Required: </b></p><ul><li>Full knowledge of all versions of Arduino & Genuino coding</li><li>Microcontroller and object-oriented programming experience</li><li>Excellent analytical skills to transform specifications into logical solutions</li><li>Programming experience with sensors and APIs</li><li>User interface and design experience</li><li>Understanding of the importance of established deadlines and milestones. Excellent time management skills</li><li>Experience in game programming, haunted house tech design, or a similar field preferred but not required</li><li>Strong technical communication skills</li><li>Proven record of writing clean, well-documented, maintainable code</li><li>Ability to receive and respond to feedback appropriately</li><li>Basic computer troubleshooting</li><li>Minor server experience in Windows</li><li>Have the legal right to work in the United States and a valid drivers license</li><li>1099</li><li>Must live within a reasonable driving distance from zip code 90717 as this job requires regular meetings, installation, and testing of games!! You will have the option of having a dedicated office/work space on premises if you desire</li></ul><p><b>Responsibilities: </b></p><ul><li>Concept design, build, and install user interactive game systems inside Arduino & Genuino using following components but not limited to: Adafruit, robot servo, linear actuator, solderless breadboard, various input/output sensors including slider and rotation knob for direct control, segment displays, audio fx board, speaker, on/off button with led, potentiometer, LED display drivers, sparkfun pushbutton switch, buzzer, jumper wires, resistor, reed switch, centipede shield, MP3 / WAV trigger, touch panel TFT display, push buttons, tactile switch, capacitor, IC base, PCB board, dot matrix display, rotary potentiometer, stackable headers, DC step-down converter, etc.</li><li>Create and install game user interfaces for a wide variety of applications that is centrally connected to a relay switch and controlled with 3rd party software</li><li>Physically install and connect all hardwares and components, including all wiring</li><li>Develop efficient, well-performing, object-oriented code that is robust and maintainable</li><li>Work closely with our design team to come up with fresh ideas and offer insight on the programming side to integrate project components, which includes assisting design team in fabrication and install of programmed game components, e.g. wiring, soldering, drilling, etc.</li><li>Perform creative work under very tight deadlines, working independently and collaboratively to successfully launch the games</li></ul><p>There are a total of 4 sets.</p><p>Estimated compensation is $9,000 for all 4 sets plus bonus.</p><p>Job Type: Contract</p><p>Salary: $8,000.00 to $10,000.00 /hour</p><p>Job Location:</p><ul><li>Torrance, CA 90505</li></ul><p>Required experience:</p><ul><li>Programming: 3 years</li></ul><p>Required license or certification:</p><ul><li>Driver's License</li></ul></span><br><div id="p_dceb892b3998dd52">
<div class="result-link-bar-container result-link-bar-viewjob">

var timer;
var calendarArray = new Array ();
function startSessionTimer(){
	timer=setTimeout("sessionAboutToEnd()", 86100000);
}
function sessionAboutToEnd(){
	var oHead = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
	loadScript(oHead, 'https://staticchm.tbe.taleo.net/chm03/ats/cacheable/R17-10-24-06-15-52-17.B2_prod/js/UIv8/engine.js',  function() {
		var answer = confirm("Your session is about to expire. Would you like to continue your session?");

			dwr.engine.setErrorHandler( function(errorString, exception) {
				window.location = "https://chm.tbe.taleo.net/chm03/ats/sessionTimedOut.jsp?locale=enUS"
			});
			CwsDWRFacade.refreshSession();
			clearTimeout(timer);
			startSessionTimer();
		} else {

		}
	});
}
