<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=2 width='100%' role='presentation'>
<tr>
<td colspan=2><hr width='100%' size='1' color='silver'></td></tr><tr><td colspan=2><h1>Applications Engineer</h1></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class='nowrapFormLabel width160 top'>Location:</td>
<td class='formFieldNormal top' colspan=1 style='width: 100%'><b>CA-Hawthorne</b></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<tr><td colspan=2><hr width='100%' size='1' color='silver'></td></tr>
<tr><td colspan=2><h1>Description</h1></td></tr>
<tr><td colspan=2><p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>

<p><u>About our company</u></p>

<p>Founded in 1998, Symmetry Electronics is a technical distributor specializing in the latest solutions for Wireless, IoT, Video and Embedded applications.</p>

<p>Symmetry Electronics is looking for a full-time engineer to help provide technical design support to engineers evaluating and designing with the latest wireless and RF products from our suppliers. The position is an exciting mix of design engineering, marketing, and customer support.<br />
<br />
<u>Job Qualifications</u><br />
2-5 years experience working as an applications engineer, design/support engineer, or technical marketing engineer.&nbsp; Experience with wireless technologies including designing with wireless SoCs and modules.&nbsp; BSEE, CE, or equivalent degree required.&nbsp;</p>

<p>Must be detail oriented and capable of multi-tasking. &nbsp;Familiar with wireless technologies, electronic components, hardware design engineering, and technical support.</p>

<p><u>Job description</u></p>

<p style="margin-left: 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in;">-Work with customers designing the latest and most advanced products around wireless technologies.&nbsp; Be a part of bringing these new products to market.</p>

<p style="margin-left: 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in;">-Promote and support products offered by our suppliers including technologies such as Bluetooth 5.0, Wi-Fi, LTE, Sensors, Microcontrollers, and others.</p>

<p style="margin-left: 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in;">-Become familiar with product development kits and SDKs to help customers evaluate technologies and start their designs</p>

<p style="margin-left: 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in;">-Install software drivers and help troubleshoot</p>

<p style="margin-left: 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in;">-Answer technical questions from design engineers</p>

<p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;-Check datasheets, documentation, and presentation material</p>

<p style="margin-left: 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in;">-Assist in training sales staff on new products and technologies and create appropriate sales tools</p>

<p style="margin-left: 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in;">-Create reference designs and kits using products from multiple suppliers</p>

<p style="margin-left: 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in;">-Communicate with internal and external resources (Semiconductor companies, Manufacturer Reps, Sales, &amp; Management)</p>

<p style="margin-left: 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in;">-Create application notes, white papers, and other publications</p>

<p>The most successful people in our organization possesses a can-do attitude and can work independently to do what needs to be done without being asked.&nbsp; Busy, but friendly work environment.&nbsp;405 Freeway convenient.&nbsp; Full Benefits package.</p>

<p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: sans-serif, Arial, Verdana, &quot;Trebuchet MS&quot;; font-size: 13px; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 12px;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><em>This is a summary of the primary accountabilities and requirements for this position.&nbsp; The company reserves the right to modify or amend accountabilities and requirements at anytime at its sole discretion based on business needs.&nbsp; Any part of this job description is subject to possible modification to reasonably accommodate individuals with disabilities.&nbsp;</em></span></span></p>

<p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: sans-serif, Arial, Verdana, &quot;Trebuchet MS&quot;; font-size: 13px; text-align: justify;"><span style="color: rgb(31, 73, 125);"><font face="Calibri" size="3">View this video to see what it&#39;s like working at Symmetry!&nbsp;</font></span><span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;"><a href="https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=https-3A__youtu.be_i9eIOFtecxw&amp;d=DwMFAg&amp;c=03vu6jtmBLnSLFHPW7mKsg&amp;r=sEstrgZGxJQsWdzr-u7YBGn4RsF2jKCtBXjcvAnn5uc&amp;m=9r9ZIxD9TsPnthl7TtgRCWErtLylP8ohqmF15fZtQUk&amp;s=OyBRv7u0H7vTBzMVsh3k7kZEKmHX8CAX8fO3QXcb1mc&amp;e=" style="color: rgb(7, 130, 193);"><font color="#0563c1">https://youtu.be/i9eIOFtecxw</font></a></span></p></td></tr>
</tr>
<tr>
<td colspan=2 width='100%'><p><span style="font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><span style="background:white;"><span style="font-size:10pt;">TTI, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to providing equal opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, religion, physical or mental disability, veterans&rsquo; status, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by law.</span></span></span></p></td>
</tr>

<script type="text/javascript">
function loadJSAsync( ) {
for ( var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
var url = arguments[i];
(function() {
var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.async = true;
s.src = url;
el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
})();
}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

if (typeof window['closureReadyCallbacks'] == 'undefined') {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'] = [];
}

function call_when_jsall_loaded(cb) {
if (window['closureReady']) {
cb();
} else {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'].push(cb);
}
}
</script>

<div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

</span>
</span>

<table id="job-content" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" role="main">
<tr valign="top"><td style="padding:20px;padding-left:23px;">

<a tabindex="-1" id="job_header"></a>
<div data-tn-component="jobHeader">
<b class="jobtitle"><font size="+1">Senior Electrical Design Engineer - IoT / Robotics / Consumer Electronics</font></b>

<br>
<span class="company">Happiest Baby, Inc.</span>
 -
<span class="location">Santa Monica, CA</span>
</div>
<table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0><tr><td class="snip">
<span id="job_summary" class="summary"><p>Happiest Baby, Inc. is a mission-driven technology company, developing science-based products and solutions to improve the health, safety and emotional well-being of children and parents around the world.</p><p>As the Senior Electrical Design Engineer you would be spearheading the electronic system design and architecture for our innovative IoT & robotics consumer products. You would be working with a dynamic and collaborative team where your work makes an impact, designing electronic systems for trail-blazing new technology, leaving a foot-print in the industry of smart IoT, robotics, and mobile products.</p><p>Your Mission</p><ul><li>Lead the hardware design and development of cutting-edge consumer electronic products</li><li>Research new ways of doing things; from sensors to chipsets</li><li>Work with technology suppliers to select the most optimal solutions</li><li>Develop proof-of-concepts to validate ideas</li><li>Drive the hardware architecture for new products</li><li>Lead board bring-up, driver integration, system validation and detailed testing</li><li>Work cross-functionally with Embedded, Mechanical, Software, Quality and Program Management</li><li>Perform system simulations, detailed circuit design and PCB layout</li></ul><p>Desired Experience & Skills</p><ul><li>5+ years of electrical/electronic design experience</li><li>Experience designing and developing consumer electronics, IoT, or robotics products</li><li>Solid working knowledge of analog, digital and mix-signal design methods and best practices</li><li>Know embedded SoC designs, microcontrollers; PMIC, SPI, I2C, UART, USB, etc.</li><li>Have taken a number of products from start to mass production</li><li>Schematic capture, PCB layout, EMI and ESD strategies</li><li>Familiar with world-wide certification requirements and testing.</li><li>Experience with WiFi, BLE and other RF technologies in the ISM band. Antenna selection and tuning.</li><li>Experience with video, audio processing, microphones or biometric sensors is a plus</li><li>Great if you know Linux, Python or other scripting languages and C/C++</li><li>Bachelors or Masters in Electrical Engineering or related field</li></ul><p>Job Type: Full-time</p><p>Required education:</p><ul><li>Bachelor's</li></ul><p>Required experience:</p><ul><li>IoT / Robotics / Consumer Electronics: 4 years</li><li>PCB layout: 4 years</li><li>Electrical Design: 3 years</li></ul></span><br><div id="p_16c95c2858835c5f">
<div class="result-link-bar-container result-link-bar-viewjob">
<div class="result-link-bar"><span class="date">20 days ago</span> <span id="tt_set_0" class="tt_set">  -  <a id="sj_16c95c2858835c5f" href="#" class="sl resultLink save-job-link " onclick="changeJobState('16c95c2858835c5f', 'save', 'linkbar', false, ''); return false;" title="Save this job to my.indeed">save job</a></span><div id="editsaved2_16c95c2858835c5f" class="edit_note_content" style="display:none;"></div><script>if (!window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']) {window['result_16c95c2858835c5f'] = {};}window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['showSource'] = false; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['source'] = "Indeed"; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['loggedIn'] = false; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['showMyJobsLinks'] = false;window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['undoAction'] = "unsave";window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['relativeJobAge'] = "20 days ago";window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['jobKey'] = "16c95c2858835c5f"; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['myIndeedAvailable'] = true; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['showMoreActionsLink'] = false; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['resultNumber'] = 0; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['jobStateChangedToSaved'] = false; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['searchState'] = ""; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['basicPermaLink'] = "https://www.indeed.com"; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['saveJobFailed'] = false; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['removeJobFailed'] = false; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['requestPending'] = false; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['notesEnabled'] = true; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['currentPage'] = "viewjob"; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['sponsored'] = false;window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['reportJobButtonEnabled'] = false; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['showMyJobsHired'] = false; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['showSaveForSponsored'] = false; window['result_16c95c2858835c5f']['showJobAge'] = true;</script></div></div>

</tr>
</table>

<script type="text/javascript">
//save job selected by user before registration/login
var jobKeyToSave = getCookie('toSave');
if (jobKeyToSave !== '' && loggedIn === true) {
changeJobState(jobKeyToSave, 'save', 'linkbar');
delCookie('toSave');
}
</script>

<script>
(function IIFE(dataLayer) {
	var mySearchExperience = isSearch() ? "" : window.localStorage.getItem('search_algorithm');
    var searchAlgorithm = isSearchRelatedPage() ? mySearchExperience || 'none' : 'none';
    dataLayer.push({
            "talentNetworkDID": "TNHM73P6D703XC001NP1",
            "companyName": "GPAC",
            "clientCountry": "US",
            "template_ID": "bravo",
            "search_experience": searchAlgorithm
    });
})(window.dataLayer);


function isSearch() {
    return window.location.href.match(/\/search/g)
}
function isSearchRelatedPage() {
    if(window.location.href.match(/\/job\//g)) {
        return document.referrer.match(/\/search/g);
    }

    return window.location.href.match(/\/search|\/ApplyFinish\//g)
}
</script>

    <!-- Left Column -->
    <div class="jdp-left-column col-md-8 col-md-pull-4">
        <!-- Job Description -->
        <div id="jdp-job-description-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-description-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Description</h2>
    <p>As a <strong>Controls Engineer,</strong> join an exceptional company looking for talented electrical engineers who are ready to meet aggressive goals in a high-technology company constantly developing new marketing-leading products and prototypes. Skilled people are critical to other team's success and, in return, the opportunities for personal and professional growth, competitive compensation, and excellent benefits for our diverse, global workforce are very relevant.</p><p></p><p>Summary of Position: <strong>Controls Engineer </strong></p><p>The <strong>Controls Engineer</strong> is responsible for the design and support of new electronic products up to and including full production. This includes specification reviews, development program timelines and reports, design reviews, documentation packages, pre-production builds and transfers to production. This position will also be responsible for technical support of mature products currently in production. </p><p></p><p>Responsibilities: <strong>Controls Engineer </strong></p><p>Participates in and/or directs the product design efforts including defining product specifications, performing detailed electrical and electromechanical designs, evaluating and selecting components, and constructing and evaluating the performance of engineering prototypes. </p><ul><li>Defines test procedures and performs tests of components and systems to insure that they meet performance goals. </li><li>Generates documentation necessary for the design, assembly and testing of products. </li><li>Uses computer assisted engineering and design software and equipment to perform engineering duties. </li><li>Supports manufacturing with all engineering and testing related matters. </li><li>Works effectively in Product Teams and Product Development Teams as a responsible <strong>member and leader</strong>. Utilizes team skills and problem solving skills as appropriate. </li><li>Supports existing products by investigating and finding solutions to problems, developing product improvements, and finding cost savings. </li><li>Writes engineering change notices. </li><li>Provides technical support to Sales and Marketing.</li></ul><p></p><p>Qualifications: Controls Engineer</p><ul><li>10+ years experience as an Controls Engineer</li><li>Allen Bradley</li><li>Siemens</li><li>Must be familiar with Analogs, power supply design, RF work, and use of microcontrollers</li><li>This person must be comfortable in a leadership role, someone who can motivate a team and build one around them</li><li>Experience in circuit board design, PCB layout tools and schematic generation</li><li>Experience doing detailed design work and product development</li></ul><p></p><p><strong>Take the next step in your Controls Engineering career. APPLY NOW! </strong></p><p></p><p><strong>All qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin or protected veteran status.</strong></p><p><strong> </strong></p><p><strong>GPAC (Growing People and Companies) is an award-winning search firm specializing in placing quality professionals within multiple industries across the United States for the past 27 years. We are extremely competitive, client-focused and realize that our value is in our ability to deliver the right solutions at the right time.</strong></p>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Job Requirements -->
        <div id="jdp-job-requirements-section">

<script type="text/javascript">
function loadJSAsync( ) {
for ( var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
var url = arguments[i];
(function() {
var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.async = true;
s.src = url;
el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
})();
}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

if (typeof window['closureReadyCallbacks'] == 'undefined') {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'] = [];
}

function call_when_jsall_loaded(cb) {
if (window['closureReady']) {
cb();
} else {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'].push(cb);
}
}
</script>

<div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

<table id="job-content" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" role="main">
<tr valign="top"><td style="padding:20px;padding-left:23px;">

<a tabindex="-1" id="job_header"></a>
<div data-tn-component="jobHeader">
<b class="jobtitle"><font size="+1">Senior Software Engineer</font></b>

<br>
<span class="company">Applied Minds, LLC</span>
 -
<span class="location">Burbank, CA 91504</span>
</div>
<table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0><tr><td class="snip">
<span id="job_summary" class="summary"><p>Founded in 2000, Applied Minds draws on the talents of nearly 150 employees and a network of subject matter experts to innovate by melding art, design, science, and engineering. We help organizations ask the right questions and then provide unexpected, yet powerful solutions. With a passion for inventing the future for our clients, we bring together brilliant and creative people from numerous disciplines into multidisciplinary teams to work on projects such as autonomous systems, command centers, modeling and simulation systems, robotics, spacecraft, UAVs, user experiences, vehicles, and more.</p><p>Equipped with outstanding tools and technology, collaborative spaces, an art department, and advanced fabrication and prototyping facilities, we work in an informal, creative environment that blurs the lines between disciplines.</p><p>If you have exceptional talent and passion, join Applied Minds and help us create for the ages.</p><p>The <b>Senior Software Engineer</b> applies their software development expertise to develop software programs for Applied Minds and our clients. Work closely with engineers, designers, and artists to analyze, build and test software.</p><p>Responsibilities</p><ul><li>Develop efficient, well-performing code that is robust and maintainable.</li><li>Develop algorithms across a broad spectrum of disciplines, including machine learning, computer vision, 3D animation platforms, mobile platforms, human-machine interfaces, object-oriented design, and compelling user interfaces.</li><li>Complete significant development tasks on schedule and with high quality.</li><li>Analyze software requirements to determine feasibility of design within time and cost constraints.</li><li>Code, document, test, and continue to develop knowledge in creating gaming programs.</li><li>Consult with hardware engineers and other engineering staff to evaluate interface between hardware and software and operational/performance requirements of overall system.</li><li>Formulate and design software systems, using scientific analysis and mathematical models to predict and measure outcome and consequences of design.</li><li>Debug and diligently troubleshoot program as needed.</li></ul><p>Qualifications</p><p>Required:</p><ul><li>5+ years of user-facing software development/programming experience</li><li>Demonstrated knowledge of software development and debugging in a Windows and Linux environment</li><li>Demonstrated software design, programming and debugging experience in C++, Python, Java, and/or JavaScript</li></ul><p>Desired:</p><ul><li>Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Software Engineering, Mathematics or a similar field</li><li>Embedded and mobile device development, including 3D user interfaces, hardware drivers and device management</li><li>Experience with geo-spatial data processing, Shader development, Android mobile gaming, development, microcontroller/Arduino programming and/or experience designing and developing multi-threaded software systems</li></ul><p><b>***Qualified and interested candidates, please apply online to be considered for this position***</b></p><p><b>https://careers-appliedminds.icims.com/jobs/1302/senior-software-engineer/job</b></p><p><i>Applied Minds is committed to hiring and retaining a diverse workforce. We are an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer and as such make all employment related decisions without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, age, veteran status, disability, or any other protected class. U.S. Citizenship is required for most positions.</i></p><p>Job Type: Full-time</p></span><br><div id="p_0df8f20c88c08d91">
<div class="result-link-bar-container result-link-bar-viewjob">

<script type="text/javascript">
function loadJSAsync( ) {
for ( var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
var url = arguments[i];
(function() {
var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.async = true;
s.src = url;
el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
})();
}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

if (typeof window['closureReadyCallbacks'] == 'undefined') {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'] = [];
}

function call_when_jsall_loaded(cb) {
if (window['closureReady']) {
cb();
} else {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'].push(cb);
}
}
</script>

<div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

<table id="job-content" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" role="main">
<tr valign="top"><td style="padding:20px;padding-left:23px;">

<a tabindex="-1" id="job_header"></a>
<div data-tn-component="jobHeader">
<b class="jobtitle"><font size="+1">Embedded Software Engineer</font></b>

<br>
<span class="company">Extron Electronics</span>
<a data-tn-element="reviewStars" data-tn-variant="vjreviews" class="turnstileLink slNoUnderline " href="/cmp/Extron-Electronics/reviews"  class="ratingsLabel" onmousedown="this.href = appendParamsOnce(this.href, '?campaignid=vjreviews&from=viewjob&jt=Embedded+Software+Engineer&fromjk=871ffadb9c71ec3e');" target="_blank"
rel="noopener">
<span class="ratings"><span class="rating" style="width:40.2px"><!-- --></span></span>
<span class="slNoUnderline">59 reviews</span></a>
 -
<span class="location">Anaheim, CA</span>
</div>
<table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0><tr><td class="snip">
<span id="job_summary" class="summary"><p>Responsibilities include architecture, design, test and documentation of software for embedded high-speed digital communications products for the AV industry. Qualified Candidates will have:</p><ul><li>BSEE, BSCS or equivalent (transcripts required)</li><li>1 year experience as a software engineer within a manufacturing environment</li><li>5+ yrs experience in embedded software development</li><li>Experience programming in C/C++</li><li>Experience with 8/16-bit microcontrollers</li><li>Experience with USB, SPI, I2C, TCP/IP</li><li>Experience debugging embedded products in a lab environment</li><li>Excellent communication skills (written and verbal)</li><li>Strong attention to detail, highly organized, computer literate</li><li>Ability to work well in a fast-paced professional office environment</li></ul><p>CB#</p><p>For 34 years, Extron Electronics, headquartered in Anaheim, California, has been a leading developer and manufacturer of professional AV system products. Extron products are used to integrate video and audio into presentation systems for today's high tech boardrooms, presentation/training centers, university lecture halls, and other applications. Our corporate philosophy is founded on three concepts: Service, Support, and Solutions - S3. By following this standard, Extron has become one of the leading providers of products and training to the professional AV industry.</p><p>As an industry leader, Extron Electronics is committed to maintaining the outstanding level of quality services our customers expect. We strive to continually provide Service, Support, and Solutions - S3 to our customers. Our customers are our most important asset, and our employees are essential in maintaining that asset.</p><p>We are currently seeking quality individuals who can help us grow, and who desire to achieve a professional and rewarding career opportunity. Extron offers top industry salaries, and a competitive benefits package that includes medical, dental, vision, a 401k program with employer match, tuition reimbursement, and much more!</p><p>Extron Electronics is an Equal Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex including sexual orientation and gender identity, national origin, disability, protected Veteran Status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law.</p><p>Job Type: Full-time</p></span><br><div id="p_871ffadb9c71ec3e">
<div class="result-link-bar-container result-link-bar-viewjob">

<script type="text/javascript">
function loadJSAsync( ) {
for ( var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
var url = arguments[i];
(function() {
var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.async = true;
s.src = url;
el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
})();
}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

if (typeof window['closureReadyCallbacks'] == 'undefined') {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'] = [];
}

function call_when_jsall_loaded(cb) {
if (window['closureReady']) {
cb();
} else {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'].push(cb);
}
}
</script>

<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

<table id="job-content" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" role="main">
<tr valign="top"><td style="padding:20px;padding-left:23px;">

<a tabindex="-1" id="job_header"></a>
<div data-tn-component="jobHeader">
<b class="jobtitle"><font size="+1">3D Graphics Software Engineer</font></b>

<br>
<span class="company">Applied Minds, LLC</span>
 -
<span class="location">Burbank, CA 91504</span>
</div>
<table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0><tr><td class="snip">
<span id="job_summary" class="summary"><p>Founded in 2000, Applied Minds draws on the talents of nearly 150 employees and a network of subject matter experts to innovate by melding art, design, science, and engineering. We help organizations ask the right questions and then provide unexpected, yet powerful solutions. With a passion for inventing the future for our clients, we bring together brilliant and creative people from numerous disciplines into multidisciplinary teams to work on projects such as autonomous systems, command centers, modeling and simulation systems, robotics, spacecraft, UAVs, user experiences, vehicles, and more.</p><p>Equipped with outstanding tools and technology, collaborative spaces, an art department, and advanced fabrication and prototyping facilities, we work in an informal, creative environment that blurs the lines between disciplines.</p><p>If you have exceptional talent and passion, join Applied Minds and help us create for the ages.</p><p>The <b>3D Graphics Software Engineer</b> is responsible for developing state-of-the art 3D Graphics based software for a wide range of applications, using a variety of technologies. They will work closely with UI/UX designers, graphic designers, scientists and subject matter experts.</p><p>Responsibilities:</p><ul><li>Build software products based on original IP and prototypes</li><li>Create game-like user interfaces for a wide variety of applications</li><li>Develop efficient, well-performing, object oriented code that is robust and maintainable</li><li>Work with next-gen technology including virtual reality, head mounted displays, stereo vision, LIDAR, etc.</li><li>Develop algorithms across a broad spectrum of disciplines, including computer vision, geospatial information, robotics, image processing, human-machine interfaces and machine learning</li><li>All other duties as assigned</li></ul><p>Qualifications:</p><p>Required:</p><ul><li>5+ years of game development/programming experience</li><li>Demonstrated knowledge of C++, OpenGL, and/or DirectX</li><li>Experience with one or more major game engines (Unity, Unreal, Havoc, etc).</li><li>Strong mathematics knowledge and ability to apply to 3D graphics software development</li><li>Demonstrated knowledge of software development and debugging in a Windows environment</li><li>Demonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced environment in a highly creative development team working on multiple development projects with quick turnaround times</li></ul><p>Preferred:</p><ul><li>User interface and design experience</li><li>Cross-platform / Embedded / mobile device development experience</li><li>Shader development experience</li><li>Software development experience for mobile gaming (Android)</li><li>Microcontroller/Arduino programming experience</li></ul><p><b>***Qualified and interested candidates, please apply online to be considered for this position***</b></p><p><b>https://careers-appliedminds.icims.com/jobs/1288/3d-graphics-software-engineer/job</b></p><p><i>Applied Minds is committed to hiring and retaining a diverse workforce. We are an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer and as such make all employment related decisions without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, age, veteran status, disability, or any other protected class. U.S. Citizenship is required for most positions.</i></p><p>Job Type: Full-time</p></span><br><div id="p_849f8e956d6aaa5c">
<div class="result-link-bar-container result-link-bar-viewjob">

<div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

class="cmp-inline-block"><div id="cmp-about" class="cmp-section cmp-with-border cmp-chapter" data-tn-section="about"><h1 class="cmp-section-first-header">About The Aerospace Corporation</h1><div class="cmp-section clearfix cmp-about-description" data-tn-component="about-description"><p class="cmp-body-text"><span id="cmp-short-description">The Aerospace Corporation is an independent, non-profit company that provides objective technical analyses and assessments for national security space programs and selected civil and commercial space programs in the national interest. The company&#39;s assessment of the Iridium constellation is an objective, scientific analysis of orbital and spacecraft</span><span id="cmp-more-link-container">&nbsp;&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="javascript:void(0);" id="cmp-more-link" data-tn-action-click data-tn-element="more-link">more...</a></span>&nbsp;<span id="cmp-more-description" class="hidden">data and operational assumptions provided by Iridium Satellite LLC. It does not constitute an endorsement of any commercial product or service provided by Iridium Satellite LLC.&nbsp;&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="javascript:void(0);" id="cmp-less-link">less</a></span></p></div></div><div id="cmp-reviews" class="cmp-section cmp-with-border cmp-chapter" data-tn-section="reviews"><h2>Reviews</h2><div id="cmp-featured-review" class="cmp-section" data-tn-component="featuredReview"><h3 class="cmp-featured-review-header">Featured Review</h3><div class="cmp-section cmp-review-entry"><div class="cmp-Rating cmp-Rating--normal cmp-Rating--middle"><span class="cmp-Rating-on" style="width: 80.0%;"></span></div><div class="cmp-strong"><a data-tn-element="featuredReviewLink" class="cmp-featured-review" data-tn-link href="/cmp/The-Aerospace-Corporation/reviews?id=9c4e738f8c6155c5" rel="nofollow">Stability with highly rewarding technical work but limited advancement potential</a></div><div class="cmp-note">Systems Director, Chantilly, VA - <span>October 14, 2017</span></div><div class="cmp-review-text cmp-body-text">The company provides a stable career where you can make an impact that is extremely meaningful. If you want to do technical work for very good, though not outstanding, compensation, this could be the place for you. However, the organization is very flat and managers tend to stay in place for a long time so, there is extremely limited potential to move up the ladder.</div></div></div><div class="cmp-section-footer" data-tn-component="reviewLinksSummary"><div class="cmp-chevron-link"><a data-tn-element="reviews-viewAllLink" data-tn-link href="/cmp/The-Aerospace-Corporation/reviews">See 				    function RadWindowprompt_detectenter(id, ev, input)
				    {							
					    if (!ev) ev = window.event;                
					    if (ev.keyCode == 13)
					    {															        
					        var but = input.parentNode.parentNode.getElementsByTagName("A")[0];					        
					        if (but)
						    {							
							    if (but.click) but.click();
							    else if (but.onclick)
							    {
							        but.focus(); var click = but.onclick; but.onclick = null; if (click) click.call(but);							 
							    }
						    }
					       return false;
					    } 
					    else return true;
				    }	 
				    </script>

								<script type="text/javascript" src="/CP/WebResource.axd?d=Y5sGsqBTSC8TNHuVXGbT-iA9ps9L8Ebv-7d0MPYTXbwc7VSmpkx0rLtGv0XJHphwAJGt3VHW28Y203WAXoHKU9tc67Jl7YRu-j24CWW4Ep4dLCIfJ4KfGpjPGxuspffqO2H5AyDL89Jb4yvuhQn-uki7ssYD8PclBt4y1scO-gIab3S6ON-u4GhoVBvsTR2_I7440A2&amp;t=635592671260000000"></script><span id="ctl00_NavigationControl_MenuPanelStyleSheetHolder" style="display:none"></span><script type="text/javascript">RadPanelbarAppendStyleSheet('ctl00_NavigationControl_MenuPanel', '');</script><table id="ctl00_NavigationControl_MenuPanel" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width:189px;visibility: hidden">

<div id="ctl00_NavigationControl_NavigationPanelRadAjaxManagerSU">
					<span id="ctl00_NavigationControl_NavigationPanelRadAjaxManager" style="display:none;"></span>

                </div><input id="ctl00_paneNavigationPanel_ClientState" name="ctl00_paneNavigationPanel_ClientState" type="hidden" /></td><td id="ctl00_paneMiddleSeparator" valign="top" class="rspPane" style="border-right-width:1px;"><div id="RAD_SPLITTER_PANE_CONTENT_ctl00_paneMiddleSeparator"  class='paneseparator'  style="width:2px;height:299px;overflow:hidden;">
                </div><input id="ctl00_paneMiddleSeparator_ClientState" name="ctl00_paneMiddleSeparator_ClientState" type="hidden" /></td><td id="ctl00_paneContentTemplate" valign="top" class="rspPane rspLastItem" style="border-right-width:1px;"><div id="RAD_SPLITTER_PANE_CONTENT_ctl00_paneContentTemplate"  style="width:169px;height:299px;overflow:hidden;">

                    

    <!-- Page modified on 30-12-08 to include new splitter control -->
    
    <script type="text/javascript">
		/*<![CDATA[*/
		    var grid = null;
		    var timer = null;
		    var gridpaneloaded = false;
		    var splitter = null;
		    var splitterresizing = false;
		    //This value indicates the description pane is resized for the first time or not
		    var firsttime = true;
		    
		    //Variable setting the expiry days of the cookie stored
		    var m_expire_days = 30; 
		    
		    var ShowMenuFlag = true;
		    
            var pageCount = 0;
		    
		    var bKeyDown  = true;
		    
		    var lastScrollPosition = 0;
		    
		    var bFirst = true;
		    
		    var bShowGridUpdateProgress  = false;
		    var bShowReadingPaneProgress = false;
		    
		    var bAddToBasketClicked = false;
		    
		    var m_nSelectedIndex = 0;
		    
            var GridCreated = function( sender )
            {          
                grid = "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid";
                
                var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
                
                pageCount = parseInt( masterTable.get_pageCount() );
                if( pageCount > 1 )
                    ResizeAfterResponse();
                else
                    Resize();
                //timer = window.setInterval("RefreshSelectedRow()", 300);
                RefreshSelectedRow();
                //Fix the size of the grid after it is created. Added to fix grid resizing issue after sorting and grouping
                if( document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_GridData" ) != null )
                {
                    document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_GridData" ).className = "SearchResultsGridGridData";
                }
                
                //Set the expand-collapse column width in mozilla firefox 3.0.5 and above to fix the widening of grid columns
                if( navigator.userAgent.indexOf( "Firefox/3" ) != ( -1 ) )
                {
                    var arr = navigator.userAgent.split( "/" );
                    if( ( arr[arr.length-1].length == 3 ) && ( arr[arr.length-1] == '3.0' ) )
                    {
                        //Browser is firefox 3.0 not apply the fix
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        try
                        {
                            grid.MasterTableView.ColGroup.Cols[0].style.width = "10px";
                            var x = document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_ctl01_Header" );
                            x.getElementsByTagName( 'colgroup' )[0].Cols[0].style.width = "10px";
                        }
                        catch( e )
                        {/*alert("catch");*/}
                    }
                } 
                setscrollbar();
            }
            
	    	var GridKeyDown = function( e )
	    	{
	    	    var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
	    	    m_nSelectedIndex = masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0]._itemIndexHierarchical;
	    	    //alert(masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("ID"));
	    	    
                var retValue = true;
                var key      = window.event ? e.keyCode : e.which;

                if( key == 38 || key == 40 )
                {	    	        
	    	        bShowReadingPaneProgress = true;
                    bShowGridUpdateProgress  = false;
                    bKeyDown = true;
                
                    if( key == 40 )
                    {
                        if( m_nSelectedIndex != masterTable.get_dataItems().length - 1 )
                        {
                            masterTable.get_dataItems()[m_nSelectedIndex].set_selected(false);
                            m_nSelectedIndex = parseInt(m_nSelectedIndex) + 1;
                            
                            masterTable.get_dataItems()[m_nSelectedIndex].set_selected(true); 
                            SetCookie( "SelectedIndex", m_nSelectedIndex, m_expire_days );
                            __doPostBack( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid", m_nSelectedIndex );
                            //To implement Google Analytics Event Tracking for Job 'View' When user selects the Job with the KeyBoard shortcuts.
                             if(typeof _gaq != 'undefined')
                             {
                                
                                var jobID=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("ID");
                                var jobTitle=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("JobTitle");
                                
                                _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Job', 'View', jobID +' - '+ jobTitle]);
                             }
                             
                            retValue = false;
                       }
                    }

                    if( key == 38 )
                    {
                        if( m_nSelectedIndex != 0 ) 
                        {
                           masterTable.get_dataItems()[m_nSelectedIndex].set_selected(false);
                           m_nSelectedIndex = parseInt(m_nSelectedIndex) - 1;
                           masterTable.get_dataItems()[m_nSelectedIndex].set_selected(true); 
                           SetCookie( "SelectedIndex", m_nSelectedIndex, m_expire_days );
                           __doPostBack( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid", m_nSelectedIndex );
                            //To implement Google Analytics Event Tracking for Job 'View' When user selects the Job with the KeyBoard shortcuts.
                           if(typeof _gaq != 'undefined')
                           {
                                var jobID=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("ID");
                                var jobTitle=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("JobTitle");
                                
                                _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Job', 'View', jobID +' - '+ jobTitle]);
                           }
                           
                           retValue = false;
                        }
                    }
                    setscrollbar();
                    SetLastScrollPosition();
                    return false;
                }
                return true;
            }
            
            function setscrollbar()
            {
                //Setting scroll position
                var grid = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" );
                var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
                if ( masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0] )
                {
                    var rowElement = masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].get_element();
                    //get the main table scrollArea HTML element
                    var scrollArea = grid.GridDataDiv;
                    if( scrollArea )
                    {
                        if( bKeyDown )
                        {
                            //check if the selected row is below the viewable grid area
                            if( ( rowElement.offsetTop - scrollArea.scrollTop ) + rowElement.offsetHeight + 20 > scrollArea.offsetHeight )
                            {
                                //scroll down to selected row
                                scrollArea.scrollTop = scrollArea.scrollTop + ( rowElement.offsetTop - scrollArea.scrollTop ) + ( rowElement.offsetHeight - scrollArea.offsetHeight ) ;
                                lastScrollPosition = scrollArea.scrollTop + ( rowElement.offsetTop - scrollArea.scrollTop ) + ( rowElement.offsetHeight - scrollArea.offsetHeight ) ;
                                                
                            }
                            //chck if the selected row is above the viewable grid area
                            else if( ( rowElement.offsetTop - scrollArea.scrollTop ) < 0 )
                            {
                                //scroll the selected row to the top
                                scrollArea.scrollTop = rowElement.offsetTop;
                                lastScrollPosition = rowElement.offsetTop;
                            }
                            bKeyDown = false;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            scrollArea.scrollTop = lastScrollPosition;
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                SetFocusToGrid();
            }
            
            
	    		    
            var RefreshSelectedRow = function()
            {
                try
                {
                    var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
                    
                    if( ( masterTable.get_dataItems().length > 0 ) )
                    {
                        var nSelectedIndex = getCookie( "SelectedIndex" );
                        if( nSelectedIndex )
                        {
                            m_nSelectedIndex = nSelectedIndex;
                            
                            if( parseInt( m_nSelectedIndex ) <= parseInt( masterTable.get_dataItems().length ) )
                            {
                                if( 0 != masterTable.get_selectedItems().length )
                                {
                                    masterTable.get_dataItems()[ masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0]._itemIndexHierarchical ].set_selected( false );
                                }
                                masterTable.get_dataItems()[ m_nSelectedIndex ].set_selected( true );
                            }
                            else
                            {
                                if( 0 != masterTable.get_selectedItems().length )
                                {
                                    masterTable.get_dataItems()[ masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0]._itemIndexHierarchical ].set_selected( false );
                                }
                                m_nSelectedIndex = 0;
                                masterTable.get_dataItems()[ m_nSelectedIndex ].set_selected( true );
                                SetCookie( "SelectedIndex", m_nSelectedIndex, m_expire_days );
                            }
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            masterTable.get_dataItems()[m_nSelectedIndex].set_selected( true );
                            SetCookie( "SelectedIndex", m_nSelectedIndex, m_expire_days );
                        }
                    }
                    setscrollbar();
                }
                catch(err)
                {
                    setTimeout( "RefreshSelectedRow()", 300 );
                }
            }
	    		    
            var RowCreated = function( row )
            {
//               if(row.Index == 0)
//                {
//                    selectedRow = row;
//                }
                //Resize();
            }

            var RowClicked = function( sender, args )
            {
                SetLastScrollPosition();
                            
                m_nSelectedIndex = args.get_itemIndexHierarchical();
                //alert(m_nSelectedIndex);
                SetCookie( "SelectedIndex", m_nSelectedIndex ,m_expire_days );
                
                bShowReadingPaneProgress = true;
                bShowGridUpdateProgress = false;
                __doPostBack( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid", m_nSelectedIndex );
                //To implement Google Analytics Event Tracking for Job 'View' When user click the job.
                if(typeof _gaq != 'undefined')
                {
                    var jobID=args.getDataKeyValue("ID");
                    var jobTitle=args.getDataKeyValue("JobTitle");
                    _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Job', 'View', jobID +' - '+ jobTitle]);
                }
            }   

            var RowContextMenu = function ( sender, e )
            {
                if( ShowMenuFlag == true )
                {                    
                    var evt = e.get_domEvent();
                    
                    var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();

                    var menu = ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_GridContextMenu;
                    menu.Items[0].SetValue( 'GridContext' );
                    menu.Items[1].SetValue( 'GridContext' );
                    menu.Items[2].SetValue(' GridContext' );
                    menu.Show( evt );
                }              
            }

            var ShowMenu = function ()
            {
                var menu = ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_GridContextMenu;
                menu.Items[0].SetValue( 'ReadingPaneContext' );
                menu.Items[1].SetValue( 'ReadingPaneContext' );
                menu.Items[2].SetValue( 'ReadingPaneContext' );
                
                var Flag = "False";
                if( Flag == "True" )
                {
                    menu.ShowAt( document.body.clientWidth - 165, WindowHeight() - GetNeededBodyHeight() - 7 );
                }
                else
                {
                    menu.ShowAt( document.body.clientWidth - 165, WindowHeight() - GetNeededBodyHeight() + 30 );    
                }
            }

            var gridpaneresized = function( sender )
            {
                //fix sizing again
                Resize();
                if( gridpaneloaded )
                {
                    //Store the width of the pane in cookie when it is resized.
                    SetCookie( sender.get_id(), sender.get_width(), m_expire_days );
                }
                gridpaneloaded = true;             
            }
            
            //The following two functions prevent the gridpane from resizing while resizing the window.
            //Before resizing the splitter set the minimum and maximum width of gridpane as current width and height
            var splitterbeforeresize = function( sender, eventArgs )
            {
                splitterresizing = true;
                if ( eventArgs.get_newWidth() != null )
                {
                    var middlePaneWidth = sender.getStartPane().get_width();
                    var middlePane = sender.getStartPane(); //retrieve the middle pane
                    middlePane.set_minWidth( middlePaneWidth ); //set minWidth = current Width --> no decrease
                    middlePane.set_maxWidth( middlePaneWidth ); //set maxWidth = current Width --> no increase
                }
                
            }
            
            //After the splitter is resized, set the minimum and maximum width to defaults to enable resizing
            var splitterresized = function( sender, eventArgs )
            {
                var middlePane = sender.getStartPane();
                middlePane.set_minWidth( 200 ); //set to minimum value: minWidth = 200
                middlePane.set_maxWidth( 10000 ); //set to default value: maxWidth = 10.000
                splitterresizing = false;
                if( !firsttime )
                {
                    adjustlastpanewidth( 1 );
                }
            }
            
             //Setting the width of the panes after the splitter is loaded
            var SplitterLoaded = function( sender )
            {
                if( sender )
                {
                    splitter = sender;
                }
                
                if( bFirst )
                {
                    var prm = Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManager.getInstance();
                    prm.add_initializeRequest( InitializeRequest );
                    prm.add_endRequest( EndRequest );
                    bShowGridUpdateProgress = true;
                    bShowReadingPaneProgress = true;
                    document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlReadingPane" ).style.display = "none";
                    document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlGrid" ).style.display = "none";
                    bFirst = false;
                }
                
                SetApplyViaEmailLink();
                SetFocusToGrid();
            }
            
            function sendajaxrequest()
            {
                __doPostBack( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid", "" );
            }
            
            var DescriptionPaneResized = function( sender )
            {
                if( !splitterresizing )
                {
                    if( firsttime )
                    {
                        adjustlastpanewidth( 2 );
                        firsttime = false;
                    }
                }
                
                if( pageCount > 1)
                    ResizeAfterResponse();
                else
                    Resize();
            }
            
            var adjustlastpanewidth = function( addtowidth )
            {
                if( splitter )
                {   
                    var endpane = splitter.getPaneByIndex( 2 );
                    var secondpane = splitter.getPaneByIndex( 1 );
                    try
                    {
                        secondpane.setVarSize( secondpane.getVarSize() + addtowidth );
                    }
                    catch( err )
                    {
                    }
                }
            }
            
            //This function is for closing the radmenu while resizing the splitter
            var panegridbeforeresize = function()
            {
                var menu = ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_GridContextMenu;
                menu.Show( false );
                menu.Hide();
            }
            
            var MenuItemClick = function( sender, args )
            {
                bShowGridUpdateProgress = false;
                
				//Added on 10-02-2009 
                //When the 'Apply Now' menu item is clicked it shows an alert -
                //only if the Apply Via Email is configured for the portal.
                if( ( args.Item.Text == "Apply Now" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "FR-Apply Now" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "Postulez ds maintenant" ) )
                {
                    var Flag = "False";
                    if( Flag == "True" )
                    {
                    
                        ShowSendMailMessage();

                    }
                    else
                    {
                        
                    }
                }
				//Modified on 10\02\09
                //openradwindow() function is used for open a radwindow while clicking "Tell a Friend" menu
                 if( ( args.Item.Text == "Share this Job" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "FR-Share this Job" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "En parler  un ami" ) ||(args.Item.Text == "(F)Share this Job") )           
                {
                     openradwindow('radwindow','#286FAC','SharethisJob.aspx',490,185,'Tell_a_friend.gif',args.Item.Text);
                     //OpenPopupWindow( 'SendToFriend.aspx', 695, 460 );
                     ///OpenPopupWindow( 'SharethisJob.aspx', 500, 180 );
                }
                 //openradwindow() function is used for open a radwindow while clicking "Printable View" menu
                if( ( args.Item.Text == "Printable View" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "FR-Printable View" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "Aperu avant impression" ) )
                {
                    //openradwindow('radwindow','#286FAC','JobPrintPreview.aspx',890,600,'job16_info.gif','Job Details');
                    OpenPopupWindow( 'JobPrintPreview.aspx', 750, 550 );
                }
                
                if( ( args.Item.Text == "Add to Basket" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "FR-Add to Basket" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "Ajouter au panier" ) )
                {
                    bAddToBasketClicked = true;
                }
            }
			
			function ShowSendMailMessage()
            {
               alert( 'If you have an email client like Outlook installed on your computer, an email will now open automatically so you can apply with your current resume. If you are using a web mail client, see the detailed instructions at the bottom of the job description with information on how to apply by email.' );
               //To Implement Google Analytics Script When Apply Via Email Without Registering Checked.
                var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
                        if(typeof _gaq != 'undefined')
                             {
                                
                                var jobID=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("ID");
                                var jobTitle=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("JobTitle");
                                
                                _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Job', 'Apply', jobID +' - '+ jobTitle]);
                             }
            }
            
            function InitializeRequest( sender, args ) 
            {   
                try
                {
                    ShowMenuFlag = false;
                    
                    RefreshSelectedRow();
                    setscrollbar();
                    
                    if( bShowReadingPaneProgress )
                        document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlReadingPane" ).style.display = "none";
                    
                    if( bShowGridUpdateProgress )
                        document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlGrid" ).style.display = "none";
                }
                catch(err)
                {
                }
            }
            
            function EndRequest( sender, args )
            {
                RefreshSelectedRow();
                if( args._response._aborted )
                {
                    return;
                }
                else
                {
                    SetApplyViaEmailLink();
                    
                    if( bShowReadingPaneProgress )
                    {
                        document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlReadingPane" ).style.display = "block";
                        bShowReadingPaneProgress = false;
                    }
                    
                    if( bShowGridUpdateProgress )
                    {
                        document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlGrid" ).style.display = "block";
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        bShowGridUpdateProgress = true;
                    }
                    
                    //fix sizing again
                    if( pageCount > 1)
                        ResizeAfterResponse();
                    else
                        Resize();
                    
                    setscrollbar();
                    
                    try
                    {
                        var err = args.get_error();
                        if ( err != null && ( ( err.name == 'Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManagerTimeoutException' )||( err.name == "Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManagerServerErrorException" ) ) )
                        {
                            args.set_errorHandled( true );
                        }
                    }
                    catch( eeee )
                    {
                    }
                }
                SetFocusToGrid();
                
                if( bAddToBasketClicked == true )
                {
                    bAddToBasketClicked = false;
                    bShowGridUpdateProgress = false;
                    window[ "ctl00_NavigationControl_NavigationPanelRadAjaxManager" ].ajaxRequest( "" );                    
                }
                
                ShowMenuFlag = true;
            }
            
            function ColumnResized()
            {
                if( pageCount > 1 )
                    ResizeAfterResponse();
                else
                    Resize();
            }
            
            function SetFocusToGrid()
            {
                try
		        {
	                var griddata = document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" );
	                
	                if( griddata != null )
	                {
	                    document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).focus();
	                }
	                
		            var element = document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_GroupPanel" );
		            if( element != null )
		            {
		                document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_GroupPanel" ).focus();
		            }
		        }
		        catch(e)
		        {
		        }
            }
            
            function SetApplyViaEmailLink()
            {
                try
                {
                    var Flag = "False";

                    if( Flag == "True" )
                    {
                        
                        document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_GridContextMenu_m0" ).href = document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_hiddenlabel" ).value;
                    }
                }
                catch(e)
                {
                }
            }
            
            function SetLastScrollPosition()
            {
                try
                {
                    var grid = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" );
                    var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
                    if ( masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0] )
                    {
                        //get the main table scrollArea HTML element
                        var scrollArea = grid.GridDataDiv;
                        if( scrollArea )
                        {
                            lastScrollPosition = scrollArea.scrollTop;
                        }
                    }
                }
                catch(e)
                {
                }
            }
            
            function SetScrollAfterGrouping()
            {
                bKeyDown  = true;                        
                setscrollbar();
            }
            
            function SetAddToBasketStatus()
            {
                bAddToBasketClicked = true;
                bShowGridUpdateProgress = false;
            }
            
            function SetGridUpdateProgressStatus()
            {
                bShowGridUpdateProgress = false;
            }
            
		/*]]>*/
    </script>

		<div id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_GridContextMenu" class="menu RadMenu_Outlook  contextMenu RadMenu_Outlook_Context">

                <span id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_ReadingPaneContainer_VacancyText" style="text-align:justify;color:Black"><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt" align=center><STRONG>Sr. Electronics Sustaining Engineer</STRONG></P><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><STRONG></STRONG>&nbsp;</P><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><STRONG>Our client is looking for&nbsp;a Senior Electronics Sustaining Engineering to join&nbsp;their San Fernando Valley facility.&nbsp; </STRONG> </P><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><STRONG></STRONG> &nbsp;</P><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><STRONG>Required Experience:</STRONG> </P><UL>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">4 Year Degree in Electronic Engineering&nbsp;</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Aerospace Electronic product design, electronic manufacturing, planning, testing and fabrication.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Electronic product design incorporating Software.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Assembly, C++ and high level software languages</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Microcontroller based Electronic products.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Aerospace product qualifications, FAA, Military certification requirements.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Labview, test equipment design, Oscilloscope, DMMs, Spectrum analyzers.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Component and system level troubleshooting for digital, analog and micro-processor based electronic products.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Project Management, Project Manager, Project Lead, Project Engineering preferred.</DIV></LI></UL><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">&nbsp;</P><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><STRONG>Position Summary:</STRONG> </P><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">The Senior Electronics Sustaining Engineer plans, coordinates and guides electronics engineering manufacturing functions through production and repair and overhaul. Works from engineering design documents, specifications, prototypes and/or change orders to determine equipment, tooling, materials and methods of manufacture to produce quality products within cost and specifications.&nbsp; Troubleshoots, writes and tests firmware and software testing equipment.&nbsp;</P><UL>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Manufacturing plans,   BOM, ECR, ECN, Engineering Change Orders</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Embedded firmware.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Design assembly/test tooling.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Troubleshoot, repair, modify and upgrade electronics test stands and test boxes.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Technical support to customers.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Engineering Estimating.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">Outside processing.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">RFQs and purchase orders.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">MRB.</DIV></LI>  <LI><DIV style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">RMA's, corrective actions.</DIV></LI></UL><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">&nbsp;</P><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">&nbsp;</P><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">&nbsp;</P><P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt">&nbsp;</P><P>&nbsp;</P></span></td>

    <meta property="og:title" content="Electrical Engineer at Motivo Engineering"/>
    <meta property="og:url" content="https://motivo.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk06538/"/>
    <meta property="og:type" content="website" />
    <meta property="og:image" content="https://d1zx4fn8ox8446.cloudfront.net/filemanager.rboxfile/c6bb61caf6c4434a8848841896360dfd/Motivo_BrandIdentity_JPG.jpg"/>
    <meta property="og:image:secure_url" content="https://d1zx4fn8ox8446.cloudfront.net/filemanager.rboxfile/c6bb61caf6c4434a8848841896360dfd/Motivo_BrandIdentity_JPG.jpg"/>
    <meta property="og:description" content="We are looking for a passionate, enthusiastic Electrical Engineer who enjoys being part of a tight-knit multidisciplinary team. Motivo is a project-based small business focused on mechanical and electrical system design and prototype builds with an emphasis on integrated electro-mechanical assemblies with embedded electronics.  We develop products in diverse market segments including mobility/automotive, medical/health, robotics, and clean energy.  Motivo specializes in taking concepts and designs through the conceptual and detailed engineering phases, solving complex engineering challenges along the way, and transitioning the initial concept/idea to a fully engineered solution.
Motivo is a nimble, creative engineering organization with diverse opportunities for growth where each employee gets to experience a wide variety of fast paced projects. We are passionate about our work and strive for excellence within each project's unique constraints. We work on challenging, fast-paced projects and we have fun doing it!
The ideal candidate should have many of the following (but feel free to apply if you have at least a few):

At least one year of professional engineering experience or multiple internships during college
Solid understanding of motion / control systems theory and physics
Design experience with motors, motor controllers, power supplies, inverters / converters, and/or power electronics
Must have demonstrated interest in embedded electronics:

Examples: professional or personal projects interfacing a smart device with some other piece of hardware (i.e. using an Android, iOS, R/C, etc device to control a car, microwave, lamp, lawnmower, etc)
Examples: professional or personal projects using an TI LaunchPad, Raspberry Pi, BeagleBone, MSP430, Nanode, Pinguino, STM32 Discovery, or similar microcontroller kit
Examples: professional or personal projects involving wireless control of something via Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Zigbee, wireless USB, or similar


Strong ability to handle concurrent fast-paced projects with minimal direction
Development and editing of top level system architectures
Wire harness design, fabrication, and test
Programming experience especially with embedded C, real time operating systems (RTOS), and/or Matlab Simulink Coder (formerly Real-Time Workshop)
Familiarity with communication protocols like Controller Area Network (CAN), USB, SPI, I2C, Ethernet, etc
Electrical test and debug with industry standard tools (oscilloscope, in-circuit debug, digital multimeter, etc)
Custom PCB design experience from schematic entry and board layout through fabrication, assembly, and test 
Familiarity and experience with high performance vehicles (electric vehicles (EV), hybrid electric, race vehicles, Solar Car, Formula SAE, etc) including the design process and components
Experience in design and fabrication for automotive environments (extreme temperature, shock, vibration, etc)
Generate technical drawings of systems, components, and interfaces
Presentation of results and recommendations to internal team and external customers
Experience with various battery chemistries and related battery management systems
Experience with R&amp;D, Small Business Innovative Research (SBIR), venture capital (VC), or similarly funded projects and work effort
"/>

        <script type="text/javascript">
    window.addEventListener("message", receiveMessage, false);

    function receiveMessage(event)
    {
        if (event.origin !== "https://app.recruiterbox.com")
            return;

        var data = event.data;

        if (data === 'FINISHED_LOADING_LINKEDIN_JS') {
            $('.js-apply-with-linkedin').removeClass('hide');
        } else if (data === 'PROFILE_DATA_BEING_FETCHED') {
            show_application_form();
            show_loading_overlay();
        } else if (data.message == 'ERROR_WHILE_FETCHING_PROFILE_DATA') {
            hide_loading_overlay();
            show_application_form();
            _RB.logToRollbar(data.error);
        } else if (data.message == 'LINKEDIN_PROFILE_DATA') {
            populateFields(data.firstName, data.lastName, data.emailAddress, data.summary, data.publicProfileUrl)
        }
    }

    function populateFields(first_name, last_name, email, summary, linkedin_public_profile_url) {
        hide_loading_overlay();
        show_application_form();
        var first_name_field = $('#id_candidate_first_name');
        var last_name_field = $('#id_candidate_last_name');
        var email_field = $('#id_candidate_email');
        var summary_field = $('#id_linkedin_profile_summary');
        var linkedin_public_profile_url_field = $('#id_linkedin_public_profile_url');

        first_name_field.val(first_name);
        last_name_field.val(last_name);
        email_field.val(email);
        summary_field.val(summary);
        linkedin_public_profile_url_field.val(linkedin_public_profile_url);
    }

    function clickOnLinkedinButton() {
        var iframe = document.querySelector("#js-linkedin-btn-iframe");
        var iframeWindow = iframe.contentWindow;
        iframeWindow.postMessage("CLICK_ON_LINKEDIN_BUTTON", "*");
    }
</script>

    (function (d, s, id) {
        var js, iajs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
        if (d.getElementById(id)) {
            return;

        <header class="job-header">
            <h1 class="jobtitle meta-job-detail-title">Electrical Engineer</h1>
            <p class="opening-info">
                <span class="meta-job-location-city">Gardena</span>, <span class="meta-job-location-state">California</span>, <span class="meta-job-location-country">United States</span>
                
                <small class="badge-opening-meta">Full-time</small>
                

                
            </p>
        </header>
    
    <div class=" row ">
        <div class=" col-md-9 ">

            
              
              <div class="jobdesciption">
              <p>We are looking for a passionate, enthusiastic<strong>Electrical Engineer</strong>who enjoys being part of a tight-knit multidisciplinary team. Motivo is a project-based small business focused on mechanical and electrical system design and prototype builds with an emphasis on integrated electro-mechanical assemblieswith embedded electronics. We develop products in diverse market segments including mobility/automotive, medical/health, robotics, and clean energy. Motivo specializes in taking concepts and designs through the conceptual and detailed engineering phases, solving complex engineering challenges along the way, and transitioning the initial concept/idea to a fully engineered solution.</p>
<p>Motivo is a nimble, creative engineering organization with diverse opportunities for growth where each employee gets to experience a wide variety of fast paced projects. We are passionate about our work and strive for excellence within each project's unique constraints. We work on challenging, fast-paced projects and we have fun doing it!</p>
<p>The ideal candidate should have many of the following (but feel free to apply if you have at least a few):</p>
<ul>
<li>At least one year of professional engineering experience or multiple internships during college</li>
<li>Solid understanding of motion / control systems theory and physics</li>
<li>Design experience with motors, motor controllers, power supplies, inverters / converters, and/or power electronics</li>
<li>Must have demonstrated interest in embedded electronics:<br>
<ul>
<li>Examples: professional or personal projects interfacing a smart device with some other piece of hardware (i.e. using an Android, iOS, R/C, etc device to control a car, microwave, lamp, lawnmower, etc)</li>
<li>Examples: professional or personal projects using an TI LaunchPad, Raspberry Pi, BeagleBone, MSP430, Nanode, Pinguino, STM32 Discovery, or similar microcontroller kit</li>
<li>Examples: professional or personal projects involving wireless control of something via Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Zigbee, wireless USB, or similar</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Strong ability to handle concurrent fast-paced projects with minimal direction</li>
<li>Development and editing of top level system architectures</li>
<li>Wire harness design, fabrication, and test</li>
<li>Programming experience especially with embedded C, real time operating systems (RTOS), and/or Matlab Simulink Coder (formerly Real-Time Workshop)</li>
<li>Familiarity with communication protocols like Controller Area Network (CAN), USB, SPI, I2C, Ethernet, etc</li>
<li>Electrical test and debug with industry standard tools (oscilloscope, in-circuit debug, digital multimeter, etc)</li>
<li>Custom PCB design experience from schematic entry and board layout through fabrication, assembly, and test</li>
<li>Familiarity and experience with high performance vehicles (electric vehicles (EV), hybrid electric, race vehicles, Solar Car, Formula SAE, etc) including the design process and components</li>
<li>Experience in design and fabrication for automotive environments (extreme temperature, shock, vibration, etc)</li>
<li>Generate technical drawings of systems, components, and interfaces</li>
<li>Presentation of results and recommendations to internal team and external customers</li>
<li>Experience with various battery chemistries and related battery management systems</li>
<li>Experience with R&amp;D, Small Business Innovative Research (SBIR), venture capital (VC), or similarly funded projects and work effort</li>
</ul>
              </div>
