    <script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.8.3/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://netdna.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.0.3/js/bootstrap.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <script src="//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/bootstrap-datepicker/1.3.0/js/bootstrap-datepicker.min.js"></script>
    <script>window.jQuery || document.write('<script src="/static/lib/jquery/jquery-1.8.3.min.js"><\/script>')</script>
<script>
    focus_first_field_application_form();
    $.fn.scrollView = function () {
        return this.each(function () {
        $('html, body').animate({
            scrollTop: $(this).offset().top
        }, 400);
        });
    }

    $(window).on('ready',function() {
        $("#application_form_holder").scrollView();
        $('.eeoc-form-description')
        .popover()
        .on('shown.bs.popover', function () {
            var span = $('#super-user-email');
            if (span) {
                var a = document.createElement('a');
                a.href = 'mailto:banks@motivoengineering.com';
                a.target = '_blank';
                a.text = 'banks@motivoengineering.com';
                span[0].appendChild(a);
            }
        });
        
        $('[data-toggle="popover"]').popover()
        

        $( '#div_apply_to_job a.btn-apply' ).click( show_application_form );
        $( '.js-apply-for-job' ).click( show_application_form );

        $('.date_input_box').datepicker({ dateFormat: 'dd M yy' });

        

        $('[data-loading-text]').button();
        $('[data-loading-text]').on('click', function(){
            $(this).button('loading');
        });

        $('.js-apply-with-indeed').click(function () {
            var new_url = getApplyWithIndeedUrl();
            window.location.href = new_url;
        });
    });

    function getApplyWithIndeedUrl() {
        var indeed_fragment = "apply_with_indeed=true";
        var current_url = window.location.href;

        if (current_url.indexOf(indeed_fragment) !== -1) {
            return current_url;
        }

        if (current_url.indexOf('?') !== -1) {
            return current_url + '&' + indeed_fragment;
        }

        return current_url + '?' + indeed_fragment;
    }

    function focus_first_field_application_form(e) {
        e && e.preventDefault();
        $('#job_application_form').find(':input:not(:hidden):first').focus();
    }

    function handleCancelButtonClick() {
            $('#application_form_holder').hide();
            $('#eeoc_cancel_message').show();
    }

    function indeedApplySuccess(elem) {
        $('#indeed_application_form').submit()
    }

    function show_application_form(e) {
        if ( e ) {
            e.preventDefault();
        }
        $('#div_apply_to_job').hide();
        $('#application_form_holder').slideDown(function() {
            $('#application_holder').scrollView();
            focus_first_field_application_form();
        });
    }

    function show_loading_overlay() {
        $('#application_holder').addClass('application-form-loading');
        $('#loading-overlay').removeClass('hide');
    }

    function hide_loading_overlay() {
        $('#application_holder').removeClass('application-form-loading');
        $('#loading-overlay').addClass('hide');
    }

    (function handle_character_limit_on_paragraph() {
        var show_limit_message = function(e) {
            var $target = $(e.currentTarget);
            var max_character = Number($target.data('maxlength'));
            var current_length = $target.val().length;
            var remaining_length = max_character - current_length;
            var message_text = 'Not more than ' + max_character + ' characters';

            if(remaining_length <= 0) {
                $target.val($target.val().substring(0, max_character));
                remaining_length = 0;
            }

            if(current_length > 0) {
                message_text = remaining_length + ' characters remaining';
            }

            var message = $('<em/>', {
                class: 'js-max-length-message text-muted',
                text: ' ('+ message_text +')'
            });
            $target.siblings('.js-max-length-message').remove();
            $target.siblings('label').after(message);
        };

        var handle_keydown = function(e) {
            var $target = $(e.currentTarget);
            var max_character = Number($target.data('maxlength'));
            var current_length = $target.val().length;

            if ([8, 13, 27, 38, 40, 9, 39, 37].indexOf(e.keyCode) > -1) {
                return true;
            }

            if (current_length >= max_character) {
                return false;
            }
        }

        $('textarea[maxlength]')
            .each(function(idx, item){
                var $target = $(item);
                var maxlength = $target.attr('maxlength');
                $target.removeAttr('maxlength').data('maxlength', maxlength);
            })
                .on('keyup', show_limit_message)
                .on('keydown', handle_keydown)
                .on('input', show_limit_message)
                .trigger('keyup');
    })();


    
</script>




    </body>




</html>

<script type="text/javascript">
function loadJSAsync( ) {
for ( var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
var url = arguments[i];
(function() {
var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.async = true;
s.src = url;
el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
})();
}
}
</script>

if (typeof window['closureReadyCallbacks'] == 'undefined') {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'] = [];
}

function call_when_jsall_loaded(cb) {
if (window['closureReady']) {
cb();
} else {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'].push(cb);
}
}
</script>

<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

<table id="job-content" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" role="main">
<tr valign="top"><td style="padding:20px;padding-left:23px;">

<a tabindex="-1" id="job_header"></a>
<div data-tn-component="jobHeader">
<b class="jobtitle"><font size="+1">Sr. Linux Kernel Driver Engineer</font></b>

<br>
<span class="company">Kumbaya, Inc.</span>
 -
<span class="location">Rancho Palos Verdes, CA</span>
</div>
<table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0><tr><td class="snip">
<span id="job_summary" class="summary"><p>We are a well-funded startup in Rancho Palos Verdes, CA with a mission to bring solar electricity, IoT internet connectivity, and knowledge/education to remote areas in South Africa. Our software team has an open position for a Senior Embedded Software Engineer experienced in customizing Linux u-boot and kernel, implementing device drivers, and creating custom builds using Yocto. Diligence, extensive experience in software development, and willingness to collaborate with other team members are a must. <b>This is a full-time salaried position with full company benefits.</b> <b>Local candidates only please. Principals only.</b></p><p><b>Primary Responsibilities</b></p><ul><li>Customize U-Boot, Kernel for custom hardware/ memory mappings</li><li>Cross-compile Ubuntu kernel using Yocto, Bitbake for i.MX6, ARM</li><li>Implement device drivers for audio, video, TV, USB, Ethernet, Wi-Fi modules</li><li>Investigate existing device drivers issues</li><li>Implement middleware</li><li>Implement firmware (microcontrollers etc)</li><li>Lead OS level architectural design, contribute to technical discussions</li><li>Work closely with electrical, hardware engineers</li></ul><p><b>Position Qualifications</b></p><ul><li>8 years of experience as Linux, Ubuntu kernel engineer</li><li>2 years of experience with Yocto, Bitbake</li><li>8 years of experience implementing device drivers</li><li>10 years of experience in C</li><li>Experience configuring U-Boot, Kernel</li><li>Expert knowledge of Ubuntu</li><li>Experience with Freescale, NXP boards i.MX6, ARM</li><li>Cross-compile tool chains</li><li>Experience integrating with device middleware on Linux, Ubuntu</li><li>Experience building packages/tools from C, C++ source code</li><li>Excellent work ethic and good reading, writing, and communication skills</li></ul><p><b>Pluses: </b> Qt, QtWebEngine, embedded databases experience</p><p>Interested in this position? Submit a cover letter, detailing your experience with above technologies. If this position is not exactly what you had in mind, perhaps you have a friend, family member or business associate who would be a perfect fit. If so, let us know, or send them this link. Thanks!</p><p>Job Type: Full-time</p><p>Job Location:</p><ul><li>Rancho Palos Verdes, CA</li></ul><p>Required experience:</p><ul><li>Device Drivers: 8 years</li><li>Linux Kernel: 8 years</li><li>Yocto: 2 years</li></ul></span><br><div id="p_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2">
<div class="result-link-bar-container result-link-bar-viewjob">
<div class="result-link-bar"><span class="date">8 days ago</span> <span id="tt_set_0" class="tt_set">  -  <a id="sj_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2" href="#" class="sl resultLink save-job-link " onclick="changeJobState('bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2', 'save', 'linkbar', false, ''); return false;" title="Save this job to my.indeed">save job</a></span><div id="editsaved2_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2" class="edit_note_content" style="display:none;"></div><script>if (!window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']) {window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2'] = {};}window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['showSource'] = false; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['source'] = "Indeed"; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['loggedIn'] = false; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['showMyJobsLinks'] = false;window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['undoAction'] = "unsave";window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['relativeJobAge'] = "8 days ago";window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['jobKey'] = "bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2"; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['myIndeedAvailable'] = true; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['showMoreActionsLink'] = false; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['resultNumber'] = 0; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['jobStateChangedToSaved'] = false; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['searchState'] = ""; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['basicPermaLink'] = "https://www.indeed.com"; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['saveJobFailed'] = false; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['removeJobFailed'] = false; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['requestPending'] = false; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['notesEnabled'] = true; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['currentPage'] = "viewjob"; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['sponsored'] = false;window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['reportJobButtonEnabled'] = false; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['showMyJobsHired'] = false; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['showSaveForSponsored'] = false; window['result_bb3cfc64ab4d6cb2']['showJobAge'] = true;</script></div></div>

    <meta property="og:title" content="Senior Electrical Engineer at Motivo Engineering"/>
    <meta property="og:url" content="https://motivo.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk06k88/"/>
    <meta property="og:type" content="website" />
    <meta property="og:image" content="https://d1zx4fn8ox8446.cloudfront.net/filemanager.rboxfile/c6bb61caf6c4434a8848841896360dfd/Motivo_BrandIdentity_JPG.jpg"/>
    <meta property="og:image:secure_url" content="https://d1zx4fn8ox8446.cloudfront.net/filemanager.rboxfile/c6bb61caf6c4434a8848841896360dfd/Motivo_BrandIdentity_JPG.jpg"/>
    <meta property="og:description" content="We are looking for a passionate, enthusiastic Senior Electrical Engineer who enjoys being part of a tight-knit multidisciplinary team. Motivo is a project-based small business focused on mechanical and electrical system design and prototype builds with an emphasis on integrated electro-mechanical assemblies with embedded electronics. We develop products in diverse market segments including mobility/automotive, medical/health, robotics, and clean energy.  Motivo specializes in taking concepts and designs through the conceptual and detailed engineering phases, solving complex engineering challenges along the way, and transitioning the initial concept/idea to a fully engineered solution.
Motivo is a nimble, creative engineering organization with diverse opportunities for growth where each employee gets to experience a wide variety of fast paced projects. We are passionate about our work and strive for excellence within each project's unique constraints. We work on challenging, fast-paced projects and we have fun doing it!
The ideal candidate will exhibit most of the following:

Three to seven years of professional engineering experience
Direct technical involvement on multiple prior electro-mechanical projects with embedded electronics resulting in deep understanding of motion / control systems theory and physics
Exceptional communication skills; able to present results and recommendations to internal and external customers
Strong ability to mentor less experienced colleagues
Desired work split: ~80% hands-on engineering and ~20% mentoring/similar
Design experience with motors, motor controllers, power supplies, inverters / converters, and/or power electronics
Prior professional experience with embedded electronics design containing microcontrollers, DSPs, programmable logic devices (FPGA, CPLD), memory, high speed signaling, MEMS sensors, etc
Strong ability to handle concurrent fast-paced projects with minimal direction
Development and editing of top level system architectures
Experience with a plethora of different sensor types and technologies
Programming experience especially with embedded C, real time operating systems (RTOS), and/or Matlab Simulink Coder (formerly Real-Time Workshop)
Familiarity with communication protocols like Controller Area Network (CAN), USB, SPI, I2C, Ethernet, etc
Electrical test and debug with industry standard tools (oscilloscope, in-circuit debug, digital multimeter, etc)
Custom PCB design experience from schematic entry and board layout through fabrication, assembly, and test 
Familiarity and experience with high performance vehicles (electric vehicles (EV), hybrid electric, race vehicles, Solar Car, Formula SAE, etc) including the design process and components
Experience in design and fabrication for automotive environments (extreme temperature, shock, vibration, etc)
Generate technical drawings of systems, components, and interfaces
Experience with various battery chemistries and related battery management systems
Experience with R&amp;D, Small Business Innovative Research (SBIR), venture capital (VC), or similarly funded projects and work effort
"/>

We develop products in diverse market segments including mobility/automotive, medical/health, robotics, and clean energy. &amp;nbsp;Motivo specializes in taking concepts and designs through the conceptual and detailed engineering phases, solving complex engineering challenges along the way, and transitioning the initial concept/idea to a fully engineered solution.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;li&gt;Electrical test and debug with industry standard tools (oscilloscope, in-circuit debug, digital multimeter, etc)&lt;/li&gt;

        <script type="text/javascript">
    window.addEventListener("message", receiveMessage, false);

    function receiveMessage(event)
    {
        if (event.origin !== "https://app.recruiterbox.com")
            return;

        var data = event.data;

        if (data === 'FINISHED_LOADING_LINKEDIN_JS') {
            $('.js-apply-with-linkedin').removeClass('hide');
        } else if (data === 'PROFILE_DATA_BEING_FETCHED') {
            show_application_form();
            show_loading_overlay();
        } else if (data.message == 'ERROR_WHILE_FETCHING_PROFILE_DATA') {
            hide_loading_overlay();
            show_application_form();
            _RB.logToRollbar(data.error);
        } else if (data.message == 'LINKEDIN_PROFILE_DATA') {
            populateFields(data.firstName, data.lastName, data.emailAddress, data.summary, data.publicProfileUrl)
        }
    }

    function populateFields(first_name, last_name, email, summary, linkedin_public_profile_url) {
        hide_loading_overlay();
        show_application_form();
        var first_name_field = $('#id_candidate_first_name');
        var last_name_field = $('#id_candidate_last_name');
        var email_field = $('#id_candidate_email');
        var summary_field = $('#id_linkedin_profile_summary');
        var linkedin_public_profile_url_field = $('#id_linkedin_public_profile_url');

        first_name_field.val(first_name);
        last_name_field.val(last_name);
        email_field.val(email);
        summary_field.val(summary);
        linkedin_public_profile_url_field.val(linkedin_public_profile_url);
    }

    function clickOnLinkedinButton() {
        var iframe = document.querySelector("#js-linkedin-btn-iframe");
        var iframeWindow = iframe.contentWindow;
        iframeWindow.postMessage("CLICK_ON_LINKEDIN_BUTTON", "*");
    }
</script>

      role="form"
      action="/jobs/fk06k88"

    (function (d, s, id) {
        var js, iajs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
        if (d.getElementById(id)) {
            return;
        }
        js = d.createElement(s);
        js.id = id;
        js.async = true;
        js.src = "https://apply.indeed.com/indeedapply/static/scripts/app/bootstrap.js";

        <header class="job-header">
            <h1 class="jobtitle meta-job-detail-title">Senior Electrical Engineer</h1>
            <p class="opening-info">
                <span class="meta-job-location-city">Gardena</span>, <span class="meta-job-location-state">California</span>, <span class="meta-job-location-country">United States</span>
                
                <small class="badge-opening-meta">Full-time</small>
                

                
            </p>
        </header>
    
    <div class=" row ">
        <div class=" col-md-9 ">

            
              
              <div class="jobdesciption">
              <p>We are looking for a passionate, enthusiastic<strong>Senior Electrical Engineer</strong>who enjoys being part of a tight-knit multidisciplinary team. Motivo is a project-based small business focused on mechanical and electrical system design and prototype builds with an emphasis on integrated electro-mechanical assemblies with embedded electronics. We develop products in diverse market segments including mobility/automotive, medical/health, robotics, and clean energy. Motivo specializes in taking concepts and designs through the conceptual and detailed engineering phases, solving complex engineering challenges along the way, and transitioning the initial concept/idea to a fully engineered solution.</p>
<p>Motivo is a nimble, creative engineering organization with diverse opportunities for growth where each employee gets to experience a wide variety of fast paced projects. We are passionate about our work and strive for excellence within each project's unique constraints. We work on challenging, fast-paced projects and we have fun doing it!</p>
<p>The ideal candidate will exhibit most of the following:</p>
<ul>
<li>Three to seven years of professional engineering experience</li>
<li>Direct technical involvement on multiple prior electro-mechanical projects with embedded electronics resulting in deep understanding of motion / control systems theory and physics</li>
<li>Exceptional communication skills; able to present results and recommendations to internal and external customers</li>
<li>Strong ability to mentor less experienced colleagues</li>
<li>Desired work split: ~80% hands-on engineering and ~20% mentoring/similar</li>
<li>Design experience with motors, motor controllers, power supplies, inverters / converters, and/or power electronics</li>
<li>Prior professional experience with embedded electronics design containing microcontrollers, DSPs, programmable logic devices (FPGA, CPLD), memory, high speed signaling, MEMS sensors, etc</li>
<li>Strong ability to handle concurrent fast-paced projects with minimal direction</li>
<li>Development and editing of top level system architectures</li>
<li>Experience with a plethora of different sensor types and technologies</li>
<li>Programming experience especially with embedded C, real time operating systems (RTOS), and/or Matlab Simulink Coder (formerly Real-Time Workshop)</li>
<li>Familiarity with communication protocols like Controller Area Network (CAN), USB, SPI, I2C, Ethernet, etc</li>
<li>Electrical test and debug with industry standard tools (oscilloscope, in-circuit debug, digital multimeter, etc)</li>
<li>Custom PCB design experience from schematic entry and board layout through fabrication, assembly, and test</li>
<li>Familiarity and experience with high performance vehicles (electric vehicles (EV), hybrid electric, race vehicles, Solar Car, Formula SAE, etc) including the design process and components</li>
<li>Experience in design and fabrication for automotive environments (extreme temperature, shock, vibration, etc)</li>
<li>Generate technical drawings of systems, components, and interfaces</li>
<li>Experience with various battery chemistries and related battery management systems</li>
<li>Experience with R&amp;D, Small Business Innovative Research (SBIR), venture capital (VC), or similarly funded projects and work effort</li>
</ul>
              </div>

    <script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.8.3/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://netdna.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.0.3/js/bootstrap.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <script src="//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/bootstrap-datepicker/1.3.0/js/bootstrap-datepicker.min.js"></script>
    <script>window.jQuery || document.write('<script src="/static/lib/jquery/jquery-1.8.3.min.js"><\/script>')</script>
<script>
    focus_first_field_application_form();
    $.fn.scrollView = function () {
        return this.each(function () {
        $('html, body').animate({
            scrollTop: $(this).offset().top
        }, 400);
        });
    }

    $(window).on('ready',function() {
        $("#application_form_holder").scrollView();
        $('.eeoc-form-description')
        .popover()
        .on('shown.bs.popover', function () {
            var span = $('#super-user-email');
            if (span) {
                var a = document.createElement('a');
                a.href = 'mailto:banks@motivoengineering.com';
                a.target = '_blank';
                a.text = 'banks@motivoengineering.com';
                span[0].appendChild(a);
            }
        });
        
        $('[data-toggle="popover"]').popover()
        

        $( '#div_apply_to_job a.btn-apply' ).click( show_application_form );
        $( '.js-apply-for-job' ).click( show_application_form );

        $('.date_input_box').datepicker({ dateFormat: 'dd M yy' });

        

        $('[data-loading-text]').button();
        $('[data-loading-text]').on('click', function(){
            $(this).button('loading');
        });

        $('.js-apply-with-indeed').click(function () {
            var new_url = getApplyWithIndeedUrl();
            window.location.href = new_url;
        });
    });

    function getApplyWithIndeedUrl() {
        var indeed_fragment = "apply_with_indeed=true";
        var current_url = window.location.href;

        if (current_url.indexOf(indeed_fragment) !== -1) {
            return current_url;
        }

        if (current_url.indexOf('?') !== -1) {
            return current_url + '&' + indeed_fragment;
        }

        return current_url + '?' + indeed_fragment;
    }

    function focus_first_field_application_form(e) {
        e && e.preventDefault();
        $('#job_application_form').find(':input:not(:hidden):first').focus();
    }

    function handleCancelButtonClick() {
            $('#application_form_holder').hide();
            $('#eeoc_cancel_message').show();
    }

    function indeedApplySuccess(elem) {
        $('#indeed_application_form').submit()
    }

    function show_application_form(e) {
        if ( e ) {
            e.preventDefault();
        }
        $('#div_apply_to_job').hide();
        $('#application_form_holder').slideDown(function() {
            $('#application_holder').scrollView();
            focus_first_field_application_form();
        });
    }

    function show_loading_overlay() {
        $('#application_holder').addClass('application-form-loading');
        $('#loading-overlay').removeClass('hide');
    }

    function hide_loading_overlay() {
        $('#application_holder').removeClass('application-form-loading');
        $('#loading-overlay').addClass('hide');
    }

    (function handle_character_limit_on_paragraph() {
        var show_limit_message = function(e) {
            var $target = $(e.currentTarget);
            var max_character = Number($target.data('maxlength'));
            var current_length = $target.val().length;
            var remaining_length = max_character - current_length;
            var message_text = 'Not more than ' + max_character + ' characters';

            if(remaining_length <= 0) {
                $target.val($target.val().substring(0, max_character));
                remaining_length = 0;
            }

            if(current_length > 0) {
                message_text = remaining_length + ' characters remaining';
            }

            var message = $('<em/>', {
                class: 'js-max-length-message text-muted',
                text: ' ('+ message_text +')'
            });
            $target.siblings('.js-max-length-message').remove();
            $target.siblings('label').after(message);
        };

        var handle_keydown = function(e) {
            var $target = $(e.currentTarget);
            var max_character = Number($target.data('maxlength'));
            var current_length = $target.val().length;

            if ([8, 13, 27, 38, 40, 9, 39, 37].indexOf(e.keyCode) > -1) {
                return true;
            }

            if (current_length >= max_character) {
                return false;
            }
        }

        $('textarea[maxlength]')
            .each(function(idx, item){
                var $target = $(item);
                var maxlength = $target.attr('maxlength');
                $target.removeAttr('maxlength').data('maxlength', maxlength);
            })
                .on('keyup', show_limit_message)
                .on('keydown', handle_keydown)
                .on('input', show_limit_message)
                .trigger('keyup');
    })();


    
</script>




    </body>




</html>

class="section-wrapper accent-section page-full-width"><div class="section section page-centered posting-header"><div class="posting-headline"><h2>Embedded Software Engineer | Bootloader</h2><div class="posting-categories"><div href="#" class="sort-by-time posting-category medium-category-label"></div><div href="#" class="sort-by-team posting-category medium-category-label">Product Development And Engineering</div><div href="#" class="sort-by-commitment posting-category medium-category-label">Full-time</div></div></div><div class="postings-btn-wrapper"><a class="postings-btn template-btn-submit cerulean" href="https://jobs.lever.co/faradayfuture/fff060ce-806c-4078-aff7-ec9084fc6a13/apply">Apply for this job</a></div></div></div><div class="section-wrapper page-full-width"><div class="section section page-centered"><p><div><b>The Company:</b></div><div>Faraday Future is a California mobility company bringing a tech approach to clean transportation. At FF, we believe that by placing equal emphasis on automotive and technology disciplines, our team of experts is uniquely positioned to take a user-centric, technology-first approach to vehicle design with the ultimate aim of connecting the automotive experience with the rest of your life.</div><div><br></div><div><b style="font-size: 10pt">Your Role: </b></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Development of ECU firmware to facilitate vehicle software updates</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Implementation of software tools to allow for over-the-air update of vehicle systems</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Help create the system that will allow FFs vehicles to be upgraded on the fly</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Responsible for firmware development, system development, and coordination with suppliers and departments within FF&nbsp; </span></div><div><br></div><div><b style="font-size: 10pt">Basic Requirements:</b></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Strong experience in embedded development</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Practical experience with C, preferably focused on targeting embedded systems</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Knowledge of microcontroller fundamentals</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Experience in development of desktop or mobile applications</span></div><div><b style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</b></div><div><b style="font-size: 10pt">Preferred Requirements:</b></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Experience with automotive systems</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Experience with Controller Area Network (CAN) networking</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Experience with Ethernet network stacks</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Knowledge of ISO 14229 (Unified Diagnostic Services)</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 10pt">Practical experience in bootloader development</span></div><div><br></div></p></div><div class="section page-centered last-section-apply"><a class="postings-btn template-btn-submit cerulean" href="https://jobs.lever.co/faradayfuture/fff060ce-806c-4078-aff7-ec9084fc6a13/apply">Apply for this job</a></div></div></div></div><div class="main-footer page-full-width"><div class="main-footer-text page-centered"><p><a href="http://www.faradayfuture.com">Faraday Future Home Page</a></p><a href="https://lever.co/" class="image-link"><span>Jobs powered by </span><img src="/img/lever-logo-full.png"></a></div></div></body><script src="/js/bug-snag.js" data-apikey="6a247c6ff13012d02fde17377f0b857b" data-appversion="0.0.1508193857" data-endpoint="https://bugs.lever.co/js" data-releasestage="production"></script><script>var gaCode = ""</script><script>(function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){(i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)})(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');ga('create', 'UA-42424051-2', 'lever.co');if(gaCode){ga('create', gaCode, {name:"customer"});}ga('require', 'linkid', 'linkid.js');ga('send', 'pageview');if(gaCode){ga('customer.send', 'pageview')}</script> TOPANGO ['Faraday Future - Embedded Software Engineer | Bootloader'] TOPANGO 0.0126470216264 TOPANGO 1300 TOPANGO  TOPANGA http://indeed.com/cmp/Tti,-Inc. <script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

cmp-with-border cmp-chapter" data-tn-section="about"><h1 class="cmp-section-first-header">About TTI, Inc.</h1><div class="cmp-section clearfix cmp-about-description" data-tn-component="about-description"><p class="cmp-body-text"><span id="cmp-short-description">TTI, Inc. is a distributor of passive, interconnect and electromechanical components. The company was founded by Paul Andrews in 1971. As a former parts buyer for General Dynamics, a military aircraft manufacturer, Andrews developed a specialized inventory with emphasis on capacitors, resistors and connectors and combined it with supply chain management</span><span id="cmp-more-link-container">&nbsp;&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="javascript:void(0);" id="cmp-more-link" data-tn-action-click data-tn-element="more-link">more...</a></span>&nbsp;<span id="cmp-more-description" class="hidden">systems.Originally named Tex-Tronics, Inc., Andrews changed the name to TTI, Inc.&nbsp;&ndash;&nbsp;<a href="javascript:void(0);" id="cmp-less-link">less</a>&ndash;<a href="/url?q=https%3A%2F%2Fen.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FTTI%2C_Inc.&amp;h=bea8d98b" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Wikipedia</a></span></p></div></div><div id="cmp-reviews" class="cmp-section cmp-with-border cmp-chapter" data-tn-section="reviews"><h2>Reviews</h2><div id="cmp-review-overview"><div MSGS['MessageFormatter'] = {
  paramRegExpArray: new Array(),
  getParamRegExp: function(paramIdx) {
    var re = this.paramRegExpArray[paramIdx];
    if (!re) {
      re = new RegExp('\\{' + paramIdx + '\\}', 'g');
      this.paramRegExpArray[paramIdx] = re;
    }
    return re;
  },
  format: function(pattern) {
    var result = pattern,
        paramIdx = 0,
        i;
    if (result && result.replace) {
      for (i = 1; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        result = result.replace(this.getParamRegExp(paramIdx++), arguments[i]);
      }
    }
    return result;
  }
};
MSGS['get'] = function(key) {
  if (arguments.length > 1) {
    var data = new Array(arguments.length),
        i,
        mf = this.MessageFormatter;
    for (i = 1; i < arguments.length; i++) {
      data[i] = arguments[i];
    }
    data[0] = this[key];
    return mf.format.apply(mf, data);
  } else {
    return this[key];
  }
};

//--></script><script src="/ui/dpcs/js/dpcsAckStatementModel_5d3e1feebd2778e2cb4087c4163429af.js" type="text/javascript"></script><script src="/ui/juic/js/components/rteditor_80cfd470f0bfb0ff555dcd25cf34d739.js" type="text/javascript"></script><script src="/ui/dpcs/js/dpcsComponent_4d62148f6ef261c51d8138d1ae0fa79c.js" type="text/javascript"></script><link href="/ui/dpcs/css/dpcs_style_814cfbf51882ba3e90499b6727748161.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" /><script src="/ui/dpcs/js/dpcsAckStatementPage_0b3ac46be5aaac013ef67537867aee0f.js" type="text/javascript"></script><script src="/ui/dpcs/js/dpcsAckStatementController_f12811710d5dd24646350e513bfa21e3.js" type="text/javascript"></script><script src="/ui/dpcs/js/dpcsKickOffBox_be3db77482c4721bf9964a8d89ee9b25.js" type="text/javascript"></script><link href="/ui/rcmdataprivacy/css/rcmDpcs2_7c98334b33aa363d54a77d464e8ec106.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" /><script src="/ui/rcmdataprivacy/js/RcmDpcs2_c201fb41acd40ebb1f1696ebe44082ea.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

<script type="text/javascript"><!--


  // set the current state so when the form is submit for lang changed, it keep  the same state.
  setField('career_ns', 'job_listing');



  chain(window, "onload", function() {
    var saveRedirected = document.getElementById('joblist_jobSaveRedirect').value;
	var applyRedirected = document.getElementById('joblist_jobApplyRedirect').value;
    var isApplyViaLinkedIn = false;
    isApplyViaLinkedIn = document.getElementById('isApplyWithLinkedIn').value;
    if (saveRedirected == 'saveRedirected') {
      var url = "/rcmcjsup?m=saveJobReq&company=drs&sr=true&";
      url += "career_job_req_id=" + 76927;
	  url += "&career_job_req_sec_key=" + document.getElementById('career_job_req_sec_key').value;

      if (submitExternalAjaxQuery(url, '/career?company=drs&loginFlowRequired=true&lang=en_US')) {
        alert(items.update_msg);
        return true;
      }
      setField('joblist_jobSaveRedirect', 'joblist_' + 'jobSaveRedirect');
    }
    if (applyRedirected =='applyRedirected') {
	  var popup = new RCMExtDraftAppDialog('76927', '', isApplyViaLinkedIn);
    }

  })

  function applyJobReq(isUserLoggedIn, jobReqId, jobReqSecKey, isApplyWithLinkedIn, elementId){
    if (isUserLoggedIn == true || isUserLoggedIn == 'true') {
      var popup = new RCMExtDraftAppDialog(jobReqId, jobReqSecKey, isApplyWithLinkedIn, elementId);
    } else {
      setField('joblist_jobApplyRedirect', 'applyRedirected');
      setField('career_job_req_sec_key', jobReqSecKey);
      setField('career_job_req_id', '76927');
      setField('navBarLevel', 'JOB_SEARCH');
      setField('career_os', 'job_listing');
	  setField('isApplyWithLinkedIn', isApplyWithLinkedIn);
      setFieldAndSubmit('career_ns','job_save');
   }
  }

  function saveJobReq(isUserLoggedIn, jobReqId, jobReqSecKey) {
    var form = document.forms[0];

    if (isUserLoggedIn == 'true') {
      var url = "/rcmcjsup?m=saveJobReq&company=drs&sr=true&";
      url += "career_job_req_id=" + jobReqId;
      url = url + "&rcm_site_locale=" + "en_US";
      url += "&career_job_req_sec_key=" + jobReqSecKey;

      if (submitExternalAjaxQuery(url)) {
        alert(items.update_msg);
        return true;
      }
    }
    else {
      setField('joblist_jobSaveRedirect', 'saveRedirected');
      setField('career_job_req_id', '76927');
      setField('navBarLevel', 'JOB_SEARCH');
      setField('career_os', 'job_listing');
      setField('career_ns', 'job_save');
      setField('pvt_hash_key', '');
      setField('pvt_hash_value', '');
      form.submit();
    }
  }
   
  function JobListingDpcs2Handler(config) {
    RCMDpcs2Handler.call(this, config);
  }
  extend(JobListingDpcs2Handler, RCMDpcs2Handler, {
    accept: function(acceptJson) {
       var params = this.getConfig().params;
       proceedWithSaveApply(params);
    }     
  });
        
  function checkDpcs2AndProceed(params) {
      var isPublicIntranet = false;
      if(params.isUserLoggedIn){
        checkDpcs2AcceptanceBeforeProceeding({
          createDpcs2Handler: function(dpcs2AcceptedOrDeclinedStatusFromServer) {
            return new JobListingDpcs2Handler(
                   {dpcs2AcceptedOrDeclinedStatusFromServer: dpcs2AcceptedOrDeclinedStatusFromServer, 
                   params: params});
          }
        }, isPublicIntranet);
      } else {
        proceedWithSaveApply(params);
      }
  } 
        
  function proceedWithSaveApply(params){    
      if(params.evtSrc == 'Apply') {
        applyJobReq(params.isUserLoggedIn,params.jobReqId, params.jobSecKey, params.isApplyWithLinkedIn, params.elementId);
        
      } else if(params.evtSrc == 'SaveJob') {
        saveJobReq(params.isUserLoggedIn,params.jobReqId, params.jobSecKey, params.saveRedirect);
      }
  }
        
  function showMFieldDialog(contextId,values, config){
      if(!this._valueBubble){
        this._valueBubble = new MultipleValueBubble(values);
      }else{
        this._valueBubble.setValues(values);
      }
      
      if(!config) {
        // default values 
        config = { refocusId : contextId, closeOnEsc : true };
      }
      
      SFInfoInContext.show(this._valueBubble,contextId, config);
      var focusElement = SFDom.getElementsByClassName("content", "", "sfOverlayMgr");
      if(focusElement[0]) {
        focusElement[0].setAttribute("tabindex", "0");
        focusElement[0].setAttribute("role", "note");
        SFDom.setFocus(focusElement[0].id);
      }
  }
  
  function hideMFieldDialog(contextId){
      SFInfoInContext.hide(contextId);
  }   

  function handleKeyDown(contextId, values, evt){
    var key = SFDOMEvent.getKeyName(evt);

    switch (key) {
    case "RETURN":
    case "SPACEBAR":	
        SFDOMEvent.preventDefault(evt);
        showMFieldDialog(contextId, values, { refocusId : contextId, closeOnEsc : true });
        break;
    }
  }

//--></script>

      <div class="content">
      
       <div class="joqReqDescription" tabindex="0" role="note">
        
        
        <p><b>Leonardo DRS, Inc.</b></p>

<p>Leonardo DRS is a leading supplier of integrated products, services and support to military forces, intelligence agencies and prime contractors worldwide. Focused on defense technology, we develop, manufacture and support a broad range of systems for mission critical and military sustainment requirements, as well as homeland security.<br>
<br>
Headquartered in Arlington, VA, the Company is a wholly owned subsidiary of Leonardo S.p.A. which employs more than 47,000 people worldwide. We offer a competitive compensation package and a business culture which rewards performance. Leonardo DRS is committed to being an employer of choice of a highly qualified, diverse, effective, and productive workforce.<br>
<br>
For additional information on Leonardo DRS, please visit our website at www.leonardodrs.com.<br>
<br>
<b>Company Overview</b><br>
DRS Network &amp; Imaging Systems, LLC in Cypress is part of the Electro-Optical and Imaging Systems Group of DRS and has over 30 years of experience in designing and developing electro-optical/infrared systems for surveillance and targeting applications for military customers which includes the United States Army, Marine Corps and Air Force. These systems feature a stabilized turret with laser range finders/ designators, television cameras, bore sighting tools, and other capabilities the customer may desire. The Company is also involved in the development of strategic space systems.</p>

<p><br>
<b>Job Location</b><br>
Cypress, CA</p>

<p><br>
<b>Position Summary</b></p>

<p>Seeking an Engineering Intern familiar with programmable logic design tools (Altera, Xilinx, Actel, etc) as well as the applicable design languages (VHDL, Verilog). Must have working knowledge of A-D/D-A converters, microcontroller/DSP interface design and associated firmware development (C/C++, Assembly, Scripting Languages), as well as, possess a working knowledge of the Linux Operating System.</p>

<p></p>

<p>Familiarity with schematic capture and printed circuit board layout tools (such as Mentor Graphics and Cadence) is a plus. Familiarity with Apache, MySQL, and Python/Perl along with Linux administration skills is also a plus.</p>

<p><br>
<b><b>Duties and Responsibilities</b></b></p>

<ul>
	<li>Firmware and script development</li>
	<li>FPGA Design</li>
	<li>VHDL Design</li>
	<li>Linux scripting &amp; MySQL</li>
	<li>Work closely with and assist engineers in the conduct of various engineering assignments</li>
	<li>Perform a wide variety of tasks to gain familiarity with the engineering staff, methods, programs and practices</li>
	<li>Complete assigned tasks on time</li>
	<li>Support, communicate, reinforce and defend the mission, values and culture of the organization</li>
</ul>

<p><br>
<b><b>Basic Qualifications</b></b></p>

<p>Degree(s) Required: Associates Degree or 3rd Year status minimum in an Engineering curriculum. 3.0 min GPA </p>

<p>Degree(s) Preferred: Electrical Engineering or Computer Engineering</p>

<p>Minimum Years of Experience: None</p>

<p>U.S. Citizenship required</p>

<p><br>
<b><b>Additional Desirable Qualifications Skills and Knowledge</b></b></p>

<p>VHDL Design</p>

<p>FPGA Design</p>

<p>Linux OS</p>

<p>Proficient in Microsoft Office Software</p>

<p>Must be diligent, hardworking, and quick to learn</p>

<p><br>
<b><b>Physical Requirements</b></b></p>

<p><i>Lifting</i> - 10 -20 lbs - % of time - 10% -25%<i>Bending</i> - 10% - 25%</p>

<p><i>Walking </i>- 10% - 25% <i>Kneeling</i> - 0% - 10%</p>

<p><i>Sitting</i> - 25%  50%                           S<i>tanding</i> - 10% - 25%</p>

<p></p>

<p><strong>Working Conditions</strong></p>

<p>Normal for an office environment. Work may require occasional weekend and/or evening work and local travel.</p>

<p></p>

<p>In Accordance with the Americans with Disabilities Act, it is possible that requirements may be modified to reasonably accommodate disabled individuals. However, no accommodations will be made which may pose serious health or safety risks to the employee or others or which impose undue hardships on the organization.</p>

<p></p>

<p>Leonardo DRS, Inc. and its subsidiaries and affiliates are equal opportunity employers and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by by federal, state or local law. #EOIS</p>

        <th>Verification code:
        </th>
        <td>
        <div id="captchaImg" class="recapBorderAccessible"></div>
    	</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <th><label for="recaptcha_response_field"  title="Required"><span class="required requiredAccessible">*</span>Please enter the verification code here:
        </label></th>
        <td>
        	<div id="captchaText"></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      
      
    </table>
    <input type="hidden" id="mailjob_email_locale" name="mailjob_email_locale" />
  </div>
</div>

<div class="ft">
  <div class="bl"></div>
  <div class="button_row">
    <div class="right">
        <span class="aquabtn active activeAccessible">
          <span>
            <button id="sendbutton" type="button" onclick="sendHandler(this); return false;">Send
            </button>
          </span>
        </span>
        <span class="aquabtn inactiveAccessible">
          <span>
            <button id="closeAbout" type="button"
                    onclick="emailDailogBox.hide(emailSourceButton);reFocus(); return false;" onblur="document.getElementById('emailTitleText').focus();">Cancel
            </button>
          </span>
        </span>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>


</div>

<script type="text/javascript"><!--

var emailDailogBox = null;
var captcha = null;
var emailJobReqId = null;
var emailSourceButton = null;
var jobReqEmailLocale;
var sendButton = null;
var isCaptchaDisable = gebi('isCaptchaDisable').value;
var isOldCaptchaEnabled = gebi('isOldCaptchaEnabled').value;
var refocusElementId = null;

function emailJobReq(jobReqId, sourceButton, title, emailLocale, refocusId) {
  emailJobReqId = jobReqId;
  emailSourceButton = sourceButton;
  jobReqEmailLocale = emailLocale;
  refocusElementId = refocusId;

  //gebi('jobtitlediv').innerHTML = title;
  juic.$('jobtitlediv').innerHTML = '<div tabindex="0"><span class="hiddenAriaContent">Job title:</span>' + title + '</div>';

  if (emailDailogBox == null) {
  var height = '510px';
    if(isCaptchaDisable == true || isCaptchaDisable == 'true'){
	    height = '400px';
    }
    emailDailogBox = new BasicDialog('emailBox', '522px', height, true, {focusId:"emailTitleText", xbutton:"closeAbout", enterkey:true, useIconFonts:true});
  }
  emailDailogBox.show(sourceButton);
  
  gebi(emailBox.id).style.overflow = 'visible';

	
  var xbutton = SFDom.getElementsByClassName("container-close");
  if(xbutton[0]){
     xbutton[0].setAttribute("id","xbuttonId");
     xbutton[0].setAttribute("tabindex","0");
	 //xbutton[0].setAttribute("onblur","setFocus(event);");
	 xbutton[0].setAttribute('title','Close Button');
  
  		// adding event listener
  		 SFDOMEvent.addListener(xbutton[0], "keypress", function closeButtonHandler(e) {
           if (e.keyCode === 13 || e.keyCode === 0 || e.keyCode === 32) {
			    SFDOMEvent.preventDefault(e);
	    	   	emailDailogBox.hide(emailSourceButton);
				if(refocusElementId) {
					SFDom.setFocus(refocusElementId);
				//	SFDOMEvent.removeListener(xbutton[0],'keypress',xyz);
				}
            }
         }, false);
       }

  // clear error message string
  gebi('emailerrorstr').innerHTML = '';

  hide('emailerrors');
  hide('emailsuccess');

  gebi('mailjob_message').value='I saw this job and thought you might be interested in this opportunity.';

  if (sendButton) {
    sendButton.disabled = false;
    Element.addClassName(sendButton.parentNode.parentNode, 'active');
    gebi('closeAbout').innerHTML = 'Cancel';
  }
	if(isCaptchaDisable == 'false' || isCaptchaDisable == false){
     if (isOldCaptchaEnabled == 'false' || isOldCaptchaEnabled == false) {
	  if(!captcha ){
			setTimeout(function(){
				document.getElementById('captchaImg').innerHTML = SFreCAPTCHA.renderCaptchaImage();
				SFreCAPTCHA.setRequired(true);
				document.getElementById('captchaText').innerHTML = SFreCAPTCHA.renderCaptchaText();
				SFreCAPTCHA.create("6LcCg8wSAAAAANPY_SYuAMe7l_dObfxYaukMvFhy","en");
			},500);
			captcha=true;
		} else {
			setTimeout(function(){
			SFreCAPTCHA.reload();},500);
		}
	}
	if (isOldCaptchaEnabled == 'true' || isOldCaptchaEnabled == true) {
		getNewCaptcha();
	}
	}
}


function sendHandler(_sendButton) {
  sendButton = _sendButton
  sendButton.disabled = true;
  Element.removeClassName(sendButton.parentNode.parentNode, 'active');

  var params = [];

  // here build JSON object with 7 parameters and send it to cjsup
  params.push('?m=FBEMailJobReq');
  params.push('&', 'company', '=', 'drs');
  params.push('&', 'site', '=', 
    encodeURIComponent(gebi('site').value));
  params.push('&', 'rcm_site_locale', '=', 'en_US');
  params.push('&', 'mailjob_job_req_id', '=', emailJobReqId);
  params.push('&', 'mailjob_friend_email', '=', encodeURIComponent(gebi('mailjob_friend_email').value));
  params.push('&', 'mailjob_email_locale','=', jobReqEmailLocale);
  if(isCaptchaDisable == 'false' || isCaptchaDisable == false){
  if (isOldCaptchaEnabled == 'true' || isOldCaptchaEnabled == true) {
      params.push('&', 'mailjob_captcha_value', '=', encodeURIComponent(gebi('mailjob_captcha_value').value));
      params.push('&', 'mailjob_user_captcha_value', '=', encodeURIComponent(gebi('mailjob_user_captcha_value').value));
  } else {
	  params.push('&', 'recaptcha_challenge_field', '=', encodeURIComponent(gebi('recaptcha_challenge_field').value));
	  params.push('&', 'recaptcha_response_field', '=', encodeURIComponent(gebi('recaptcha_response_field').value));
  }
  }
  params.push('&', 'mailjob_user_email', '=', encodeURIComponent(gebi('mailjob_user_email').value));
  params.push('&', 'mailjob_message', '=', encodeURIComponent(gebi('mailjob_message').value));
  params.push('&', 'mailjob_is_public_intranet', '=', 'false');
  params.push('&', '_s.crb', '=', 'eLZ1ShSYjEHh9ioJL4T8SBLe%2fOA%3d');

  // recruiting.js should be included by now..
  var url = "/rcmcjsup" + params.join("");

  var errorFree = true;

  if (url.length > 2048) {
    errorFree = false;
    var params_length = [];
    
    // here build JSON object with 4 parameters, including a parameter specifying the url exceedance and send it to cjsup
    params_length.push('?m=FBEMailJobReq');
    params_length.push('&', 'company', '=', 'drs');
    params_length.push('&', 'rcm_site_locale', '=', 'en_US');
    params_length.push('&', 'mailjob_job_req_id', '=', emailJobReqId);
    params_length.push('&', '_s.crb', '=', 'eLZ1ShSYjEHh9ioJL4T8SBLe%2fOA%3d');
    params_length.push('&', 'mailjob_beyond_length', '=', encodeURIComponent(url.length - 2048));
    url = "/rcmcjsup" + params_length.join("");
    
    // Send ajax query to get a message of how much characters need to be removed.
    submitExternalAjaxQuery(url);
    gebi('emailerrorstr').innerHTML = items[0];
    show('emailerrors');
    hide('emailsuccess');
	gebi('emailerrorstr').focus();
  }

  if (errorFree && submitExternalAjaxQuery(url)) {
    if ("undefined" != typeof items) {
      for (var i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
        if (errorFree) {
          gebi('emailerrorstr').innerHTML = '';
          show('emailerrors');
        }
        errorFree = false;
        gebi('emailerrorstr').innerHTML += (i == 0 ? '' : '<br>') + items[i]['error'];
        hide('emailsuccess');
		gebi('emailerrorstr').focus();
      }
	  if(isCaptchaDisable == 'false' || isCaptchaDisable == false){
      if(!errorFree && (isOldCaptchaEnabled == 'true' || isOldCaptchaEnabled == true)) {
    	  getNewCaptcha();
    	  gebi('mailjob_user_captcha_value').value = '';
      }
	}
    }
  }

  if (errorFree) {
    gebi('closeAbout').innerHTML = 'Close';
    //gebi('closeAbout').focus();
    show('emailsuccess');
    var emailId = '';
    if(req && req.responseText) {
      var responseObject = JSON.parse(req.responseText);
      if ("undefined" != typeof responseObject) {
        emailId = responseObject.friendEmail;
      }
    }
    gebi('confirmmessage').innerHTML = 'The job has been sent to' + ' '
        + emailId + '.';
    hide('emailerrors');
	gebi('mailjob_friend_email').value = '';
    gebi('mailjob_message').value='I saw this job and thought you might be interested in this opportunity.';
	if(isCaptchaDisable == 'false' || isCaptchaDisable == false){
    if (isOldCaptchaEnabled == 'true' || isOldCaptchaEnabled == true) {
        gebi('mailjob_user_captcha_value').value = '';
    	getNewCaptcha();
    }
  if (isOldCaptchaEnabled == 'false' || isOldCaptchaEnabled == false) {
	gebi('recaptcha_response_field').value = '';
	SFreCAPTCHA.reload();
  }
  }
  gebi('emailsuccess').focus();
  }
  sendButton.disabled = false;
  Element.addClassName(sendButton.parentNode.parentNode, 'active');
}

function getNewCaptcha() {
  if (submitExternalAjaxQuery("/rcmcjsup?m=createCaptchaString&company=drs&tstamp=" + (new Date()).getTime())) {
    if ("undefined" != typeof items) {
      gebi('mailjob_captcha_value').value = items;
      var refreshImgURL = "/imgsource?imgStr=" + items + "&_s.crb=" + ajaxSecKey;
      gebi('captcha_image').src = refreshImgURL;
    }
  }
}

function reFocus(){
if(gebi(refocusElementId)){
   document.getElementById(refocusElementId).focus();
   }
}

//--></script>




</div>

<META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE">
</HEAD>
            

            </div>
    
    
    

</div>

.icl-Button{padding:0.5rem 1.125rem;text-align:center;background-repeat:repeat-x;border:1px solid;border-radius:6px;box-shadow:0 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);cursor:pointer}[dir=ltr] <script type="text/javascript">
function loadJSAsync( ) {
for ( var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
var url = arguments[i];
(function() {
var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.async = true;
s.src = url;
el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
})();
}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

if (typeof window['closureReadyCallbacks'] == 'undefined') {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'] = [];
}

function call_when_jsall_loaded(cb) {
if (window['closureReady']) {
cb();
} else {
window['closureReadyCallbacks'].push(cb);
}
}
</script>

<div id="u_nav">
<script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
}
return url;
}

</script>

<tr valign="top"><td style="padding:20px;padding-left:23px;">

<a tabindex="-1" id="job_header"></a>
<div data-tn-component="jobHeader">
<b class="jobtitle"><font size="+1">SENIOR TEST TECHNICIAN/ENGINEER bhjob8853_776</font></b>

<br>
<span class="company">Great Hire, Inc</span>
 -
<span class="location">Los Angeles, CA 90045</span>
<div>
<span class="no-wrap">
$30 an hour</span>
</div>
</div>
<table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0><tr><td class="snip">
<span id="job_summary" class="summary"><p>This is a unique opportunity for a skilled test technician/engineer to help drive the growth of an innovative, highly entrepreneurial and successful company. You will develop intriguing technology solutions to diverse industries. We are committed to offering a valuable experience to our staff and to identifying the type of individuals who can make a lasting contribution to our organization.</p><p><b>We are looking for highly talented Test Tech/Engineers that </b></p><ul><li>Are quick learners, enjoy working on broad range of projects and know how to use both hand tools and a hand-soldering iron.</li><li>Have experience in electro-mechanical testing in a High-Tech manufacturing environment.</li></ul><p>Preferred industry experience would be Medical, Aerospace, Automotive, or Automation.</p><ul><li>Experts at hardware testing and troubleshooting. Integrating hardware with firmware and software programming.</li><li>Possess computer proficiency.</li><li>Has a Bachelor or Associates degree in Electrical Engineering with at least 5 years of work experience.</li></ul><p><b>Job Description</b></p><ul><li>Hands-on testing and calibration of electronics and mechanical systems that are complex.</li><li>Building and validation of new test chambers and fixtures</li></ul><p>Troubleshooting hardware with firmware and software integration. Programming microchip sets with firmware</p><ul><li>Familiarity with common chipsets including microcontrollers, analog and digital circuits, and various communications protocols (BlueTooth, UART, I2C, and SPI).</li><li>Writes test reports and manufacturing process documentation.</li><li>Also will support the Quality Control function on the production line.</li></ul><p>Job Type: Full-time</p><p>Salary: $30.00 /hour</p></span><br><div id="p_6c67bcfee898e06d">
<div class="result-link-bar-container result-link-bar-viewjob">

src="https://lever-client-logos.s3.amazonaws.com/84963f7c-5208-4789-813f-59b515174479-1441842243319.png"></a></div></div></div><div class="content-wrapper posting-page"><div class="content"><div class="section-wrapper accent-section page-full-width"><div class="section section page-centered posting-header"><div class="posting-headline"><h2>Vehicle Infotainment Systems Networking Engineer</h2><div class="posting-categories"><div href="#" class="sort-by-time posting-category medium-category-label"></div><div href="#" class="sort-by-team posting-category medium-category-label">Infotainment / Internet of Vehicle (IOV)</div><div href="#" class="sort-by-commitment posting-category medium-category-label">Full-time</div></div></div><div class="postings-btn-wrapper"><a class="postings-btn template-btn-submit cerulean" href="https://jobs.lever.co/faradayfuture/48d8ec61-c687-4f75-974d-0b9ec82de05a/apply">Apply for this job</a></div></div></div><div class="section-wrapper page-full-width"><div class="section section page-centered"><p><div><u style="font-size: 12pt"><i><b>Vehicle Infotainment Systems Networking Engineer</b></i></u></div><div><br></div><div><span style="font-size: 12pt">The field of vehicle communication engineer encompasses network development, communication file development and release, electrical network specification development, bandwidth studies, and system validation.</span></div><div><br></div><div><b style="font-size: 12pt">Responsibilities:</b></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Work closely with the Infotainment team to understand, and help develop, the Infotainment system electrical network.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Responsible for creating, maintaining, and releasing the official communication files (CAN .dbc files, LIN .ldf files, Ethernet .fibex files, LVDS backchannel files, etc.)</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Performs bandwidth analyses for particular networks to help optimize the network communication.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Research next generation vehicle electrical architecture and protocols.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Create specifications for various communication protocols.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Help define the network management for the electrical communication networks.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Perform system validation for the Infotainment electrical communication networks.</span></div><div><br></div><div><b style="font-size: 12pt">Basic Qualifications:</b></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Minimum of a Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related field.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Minimum of 5 years of related experience to vehicle electrical communication networks.&nbsp; Position level will be dependent on level of education, years of experience, knowledge, skills and abilities</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Familiar with CAN networks, LIN networks, Ethernet networks</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Strong technical, communication and analytical abilities</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Ability to produce timely, logical and concise work products</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Ability to handle concurrent programs</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Ability to work effectively independently, in a team or collaborative environment</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Knowledge of basic ECU/microcontroller hardware architecture</span></div><div><br></div><div><b style="font-size: 12pt">Preferred Qualifications:</b></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Master of Science degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related field.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Experience with secure embedded architecture designs</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Experience authoring electrical communication specifications</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Experience with LVDS/FPD-LINK protocols.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">In depth knowledge of automotive Ethernet hardware and software</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 10pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 12pt">Ability to learn new technologies or concepts quickly</span></div><div><br></div><div><b><u style="font-size: 11pt">Perks + Benefits:</u></b></div><div><span style="font-size: 11pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 11pt">Snacks and coffee available 24-7.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 11pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 11pt">Health, dental, and vision benefits, 401(k).</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 11pt"></span><span style="font-size: 7pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="font-size: 11pt">15 days of (PTO) Paid Time Off per year, 10 days of paid holidays, plus a full week of paid time off between Christmas and New Years</span></div><div>&nbsp;</div></p></div><div class="section page-centered last-section-apply"><a class="postings-btn 	<html xmlns:fb="http://www.facebook.com/2008/fbml" xmlns:og="http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/">
	<head>
	<title>Job Information: Senior Embedded Systems Engineer Job</title>
   <meta name="description" content="BRIEF DESCRIPTION 

This mid level position in the Engineering department involves developing digital embedded system designs complying with existing requirements documentation, as well as creating new requirements based on the conceptual input. This role creates hardware and firmware designs for microcontrollers capable of interfacing with most standard data transfer protocols for communications with auxiliary hardware: SPI, I2C, Serial, CAN, Ethernet, USB, etc. Standard test equipment is utilized to troubleshoot and proof the design.

 PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES 

 
 Hardware and firmware design per requirements documentation for embedded systems in C/C++ (familiarity with Atmel Studio is a must) 
 Creates the requirements documentation based on conceptual input 
 Responsible for design review, testing, and design validation processes 
 Standard product support and customer interaction 
 Managing the existing library of LabVIEW software for external and internal customers 
 
" />
   <meta http-equiv="x-ua-compatible" content="IE=10" />

		<meta itemprop="description" content="BRIEF DESCRIPTION 

This mid level position in the Engineering department involves developing digital embedded system designs complying with existing requirements documentation, as well as creating new requirements based on the conceptual input. This role creates hardware and firmware designs for microcontrollers capable of interfacing with most standard data transfer protocols for communications with auxiliary hardware: SPI, I2C, Serial, CAN, Ethernet, USB, etc. Standard test equipment is utilized to troubleshoot and proof the design.

 PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES 

 
 Hardware and firmware design per requirements documentation for embedded systems in C/C++ (familiarity with Atmel Studio is a must) 
 Creates the requirements documentation based on conceptual input 
 Responsible for design review, testing, and design validation processes 
 Standard product support and customer interaction 
 Managing the existing library of LabVIEW software for external and internal customers

<script type="text/javascript">
	function jsNewWindow(jsTarget, jsWidth, jsHeight) {
		var winWidth = jsWidth;
		var winHeight = jsHeight;
		var winleft = 0;
		var winTop = 0;
		if (((winWidth == null) && (winHeight == null)) || ((winWidth == 0) && (winHeight == 0))) {
   		if (screen) {
      		winWidth = (screen.width - 100);
      		winHeight = (screen.height - 150);
      		winleft = (screen.width/2)-winWidth/2;
      		winTop = (screen.height/2)-(winHeight+50)/2;
   		}
		}
		window.open(jsTarget,"","top="+winTop+",left="+winleft+",width=" + winWidth + ",height=" + winHeight + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,location=no,scrollbars=yes,resizable=yes");
	}
</script>

						<!-- end top toolbar -->
						<table width="100%">
							<tr>
								<td valign="top">
									<!-- begin job description -->
									<table width="100%" cellpadding="3" id="JobDescription">

										<tr>
											<td class="smallheader" width="15%" align="right">Title</td>
											<td><H1 class="title">Senior Embedded Systems Engineer&nbsp;</H1></td>
										</tr>
<form name='ThisForm' action='Main.asp?JID=102539&B_ID=44&Lo_ID=152194&R_ID=1594615&FID=&Ad=449105&Refer=&PositionID=237889&ssbgcolor=&SearchScreenID=3353&CountryID=3'><span id='mspfocus' /><tr>
	<td class='smallheader' width='15%' align='right' valign='top'>Req Number	</td>
	<td>ENG-17-00004	&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
	<td class='smallheader' width='15%' align='right' valign='top'>Position	</td>
	<td>Senior Embedded Systems Engineer	&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
	<td class='smallheader' width='15%' align='right' valign='top'>About the Organization	</td>
	<td>Dytran Instruments is a leading global manufacturer and marketer of Dynamic Sensors for measurement of vibration, force, and pressure. We serve global customers in the Aerospace, Automotive, and Test and Measurement markets. Headquartered in Chatsworth, CA we are currently certified to AS9100 / ISO-17025. Our lead products include accelerometers, force and pressure sensors, and impulse hammers.<br />
<br />
This immediate opening is an exciting and challenging opportunity to work with a company that has highly engineered products in a diverse  and international market. <br />
<br />
	&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
	<td class='smallheader' width='15%' align='right' valign='top'>Description	</td>
	<td><p><strong>BRIEF DESCRIPTION</strong></p>

<p>This mid level position in the Engineering department involves developing digital embedded system designs complying with existing requirements documentation, as well as creating new requirements based on the conceptual input. This role creates hardware and firmware designs for microcontrollers capable of interfacing with most standard data transfer protocols for communications with auxiliary hardware: SPI, I2C, Serial, CAN, Ethernet, USB, etc. Standard test equipment is utilized to troubleshoot and proof the design.</p>

<p><strong>PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Hardware and firmware design per requirements documentation for embedded systems in C/C++ (familiarity with Atmel Studio is a must)</li>
	<li>Creates the requirements documentation based on conceptual input</li>
	<li>Responsible for design review, testing, and design validation processes</li>
	<li>Standard product support and customer interaction</li>
	<li>Managing the existing library of LabVIEW software for external and internal customers</li>
</ul>
	&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
	<td class='smallheader' width='15%' align='right' valign='top'>Position Requirements	</td>
	<td><p><strong>KNOWLEDGE AND SKILL REQUIREMENTS</strong></p><ul>	<li>BSEE </li>	<li>Mechanical engineering background a plus</li>	<li>Digital electronics knowledge</li>	<li>LabVIEW skills required</li>	<li>National Instruments certification a plus</li>	<li>Multisim/Ultiboard  (or any other schematic capture/PCB layout software) is preferred</li>	<li>Knowledge of Atmel Developer Studio and general familiarity with Atmel products a must</li>	<li>General knowledge of electrical test equipment and test principles</li>	<li>Must be a local candidate</li>	<li>Microsoft Office Suites</li></ul><p><strong> WORKING CONDITIONS</strong></p><p>Working conditions are normal for a manufacturing environment. </p><p><strong> REWARDS</strong></p><p>Competitive Base Salary </p><p>401(k)</p><p><strong> BENEFITS</strong></p><p>        Medical Insurance</p><p>        Dental Insurance</p><p>        Vision Insurance</p><p>        Accidental Death</p><p>        Life Insurance</p><p>        Flexible Spending Accounts</p><p>         Educational Reimbursement</p><p> <strong>PAID TIME OFF</strong></p><p>        Vacation</p><p>        Holidays</p><p>        Sick pay </p>	&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
	<td class='smallheader' width='15%' align='right' valign='top'>Category	</td>
	<td>Engineering	&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
	<td class='smallheader' width='15%' align='right' valign='top'>Exempt/Non-Exempt	</td>
	<td>Exempt	&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
	<td class='smallheader' width='15%' align='right' valign='top'>Full-Time/Part-Time	</td>
	<td>Full-Time	&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
	<td class='smallheader' width='15%' align='right' valign='top'>Location	</td>
	<td>Dytran Instruments, Inc - 21592 Marilla Street,Chatsworth, CA 91311    	&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
	<td class='smallheader' width='15%' align='right' valign='top'>EOE Statement	</td>
	<td><br>Equal Employment Opportunity<br> <br>Female / Sexual Orientation / Gender Identity / Minority / Veteran/Disability<br> <br>Dytran Instruments, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All decisions regarding recruiting, screening, hiring, training, promotion, transfer, pay, training, benefits and other conditions of employment will be made based on valid job qualifications and business reasons. All such decisions will be made  without regard to race, color, religion, religious dress practice, religious grooming practice, creed, sex, national origin, age, disability, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, citizenship, gender identity, veteran status or any other protected class by federal, state, or local law. This includes consideration of qualified applicants with criminal histories consistent with City Of Los Angeles Fair Chance Hiring Ordinance. <br>	&nbsp;</td>
</tr>

<!-- Begin
function popUp(url) {
	sealWin=window.open(url,"win",'toolbar=0,location=0,directories=0,status=1,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=800,height=600');
	self.name = "mainWin"; 
}

function jsNewWindow2(jsTarget, jsWidth, jsHeight) {
	if (jsWidth == null) {
		jsWidth = 600;
	}
	if (jsHeight == null) {
		jsHeight = 400;
	}
	window.open(jsTarget,"","width=" + jsWidth + ",height=" + jsHeight + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,location=no,scrollbars=yes,resizable=yes");
}

function setFocus(aForm) { 
	if (aForm.elements[0]!=null) { 
		var i; 
		var max = aForm.length; 
		for(i=0; i<max; i++) { 
			if( aForm.elements[ i ].type != "hidden"
				&& aForm.elements[ i ].type != "radio"
				&& aForm.elements[ i ].type != "checkbox"
				&& !aForm.elements[ i ].disabled
				&& !aForm.elements[ i ].readOnly ) { 
				try {
					aForm.elements[ i ].focus(); 
					break; 
				}
				catch(e) {
					// element isn't visible, causes error in ie8
				}
			} 
		} 
	} 
} 

if (document.forms[0] != null) {
	if (document.getElementById("mspfocus")) {
		try {
			document.getElementById("mspfocus").focus();
		}
		catch (e) {
			//not visible for focus
		}
	}
	else {
		setFocus(document.forms[0]);
	}
}
// End -->
</script>

  var initialDeviceWidth = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth || document.body.clientWidth;

  if (sessionStorage['switchViewportWidth'] >= 1024 && initialDeviceWidth < 1024) {
    var switchViewport = 1024;
  } else if (sessionStorage['switchViewportWidth'] < 1024 && initialDeviceWidth >= 1024) {

			<h1 class="imageheader-contentWrapper-headline">Senior System Application Engineer - Automotive Power</h1>
			
			<div class="imageheader-contentWrapper-link hidden-print visible-xxs visible-xs visible-sm"><span class="btn btn-icon btn-white white-link">Apply now!</span></div>

      <div class="breadcrumb breadcrumb--top stickyElement">
        <div class="centered">

  <li><a href="/cms/en/">Home</a></li>
