    <li><span class="folder">Senior System Application Engineer - Automotive Power</span></li>
  
  
</ul>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  


      <div class="centered">
        
        
          <div class="row">
            <div class="stickyButton-wrapper col-xxs-12 col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-4 hidden-print pull-right">
              <div class="stickyButton">
                <a href="https&#x3a;&#x2f;&#x2f;recruitingapp-2721.de.umantis.com&#x2f;Vacancies&#x2f;20692&#x2f;Application&#x2f;CheckLogin&#x2f;2&#x3f;lang&#x3d;eng" class="btn btn-icon btn-blue blue-link btn-lg umantis-link btn-apply" target="_blank">Apply now!</a>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        
        

        <div class="row">
          
          <div class="col-md-8 content">
            <p class="h2 hidden-xxs hidden-xs">Senior System Application Engineer - Automotive Power</p>
            
            <section>
              <h2 class="h3">At a glance</h2>
              <div class="copy">
                  Do you want to make a difference and be challenged every day?  If you also enjoy working with people and helping bring brilliant designs to market, this may be the right opportunity for you!  As a system application engineer, you will work closely with the Business Development team and customers to drive revenue by providing high quality technical support, applications collateral, training, and ensuring successful design wins for Infineon Technologies.
              </div>
            </section>
            
            
            
              <section class="u-borderBottom">
                <h2 class="h3">Quick info</h2>
                <div class="row">
                  <div class="col-sm-6">
                    <table class="simpleTable simpleTable--quickFacts simpleTable--hightlightLastCol">
                      
                        <tr>
                          <td>Location</td>
                          <td class="bold">El Segundo | CA</td>
                        </tr>
                      
                      
                        <tr>
                          <td>Entry level</td>
                          <td class="bold">Professionals / experienced</td>
                        </tr>
                      
                      <tr>
                        <td>Job ID</td>
                        <td class="bold">20692</td>
                      </tr>
                      
                        <tr>
                          <td>Start</td>
                          <td class="bold">
                            
                              
                                immediately
                              
                              
                            
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                      
                    </table>
                  </div>
                  <div class="col-sm-6">
                    
                      <table class="simpleTable simpleTable--quickFacts simpleTable--quickFacts-right simpleTable--hightlightLastCol">
                        
                          <tr>
                            <td>Type</td>
                            <td class="bold">Full time</td>
                          </tr>
                        
                        
                          <tr>
                            <td>Contract</td>
                            <td class="bold">Permanent</td>
                          </tr>
                        
                        
                      </table>
                    
                  </div>
                </div>
              </section>
              
                <section>
                  <h2 class="h3">Job description</h2>
                  <div class="copy">
                      Infineon has a broad range of automotive and industrial products used in multiple applications that vary in features and complexity. Your technical knowledge of electronic systems combined with strong communication skills and analytical ability, will shape how new and existing business grows. Our solutions include microcontrollers, sensors and market leading power and networking semiconductors that are used in Automotive, Transportation and Industrial Market applications. <br><br><strong>In your new role you will:<br><br></strong><ul><li>Provide Power and/or Magnetic Sensor product expertise into a wide range of electronics applications such as Body, Safety, Powertrain and Electric Vehicles </li><li>Understand customer application needs and translate them into technical value proposition</li><li>Design-in activities, product promotion, technical training, presentations</li><li>Contribute to the product road mapping process by proposing new features and functions</li></ul>
                  </div>
                </section>
              
              
                <section>
                  <h2 class="h3">Profile</h2>
                  <div class="copy">
                      <strong>You are best equipped for this task if you have:<br></strong><br><ul><ul><li>Degree in MSEE or equivalent with 3 years of application engineering experience and/or 5 years designing experience</li><li>Extensive automotive semiconductor/electronics background</li><li>Strong technical knowledge, competence, design experience on a system level</li><li>Thermal design, modeling and analysis experience</li><li>Excellent problem solving and electrical correlation skills desired.</li><li>Experience managing and leading a team effectively</li><li>Business acumen to assess technical viability of solutions provided</li><li>Excellent written and verbal communication skills and MS Office skills including effective presentation ability</li><li>Cultural awareness and ability to work within a global team structure</li><li>Domestic and Global travel required +30%</li></ul></ul>
                  </div>
                </section>
              
              
                <section>
                  <h2 class="h3">About Us</h2>
                  <div class="copy">
                      <strong>Part of your life. Part of tomorrow.</strong><br><br>We make life easier, safer and greener  with technology that achieves more, consumes less and is accessible to everyone. Microelectronics from Infineon is the key to a better future. Efficient use of energy, environmentally-friendly mobility and security in a connected world  we solve some of the most critical challenges that our society faces while taking a conscientious approach to the use of natural resources.<br><br>The Automotive Division (ATV) designs, develops and produces innovative semiconductor solutions for the cars powertrain, safety management as well as body and convenience.<br><br><em>Infineon Technologies Americas Corp. is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), gender identity, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, physical or mental disability, legally protected medical condition, family care status, military or veteran status, marital status, domestic partner status, sexual orientation, or any other basis protected by local, state, or federal laws.<br><br>#LI-EM1</em><br><br>
                  </div>
                </section>
              
              
              








	
	
		
			
			<section>
				<h2 class="h3">What we offer you in El Segundo, CA</h2>
				<div class="copy"></div>
				
				







	


<div class="icon-wrap clearfix">
	
		<div data-toggle="tooltip" data-container="#tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-0" id="tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-0" title="Coaching, mentoring networking possibilities">
			<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-hr-1"></span>
		</div>
	
		<div data-toggle="tooltip" data-container="#tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-1" id="tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-1" title="Wide range of training offers & planning of career development">
			<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-hr-2"></span>
		</div>
	
		<div data-toggle="tooltip" data-container="#tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-2" id="tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-2" title="International assignments">
			<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-hr-3"></span>
		</div>
	
		<div data-toggle="tooltip" data-container="#tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-3" id="tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-3" title="Different career paths: Technical Ladder, Management & Individual Contributor">
			<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-hr-4"></span>
		</div>
	
		<div data-toggle="tooltip" data-container="#tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-4" id="tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-4" title="Flexible working conditions">
			<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-hr-5"></span>
		</div>
	
		<div data-toggle="tooltip" data-container="#tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-5" id="tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-5" title="Health Benefits">
			<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-hr-11"></span>
		</div>
	
		<div data-toggle="tooltip" data-container="#tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-6" id="tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-6" title="Health promotion programs">
			<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-hr-13"></span>
		</div>
	
		<div data-toggle="tooltip" data-container="#tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-7" id="tt-cf70fe05-7184-11e7-854c-40f2e90e8d04-7" title="401K">

			<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-hr-22"></span>
		</div>
	
</div>
				
					<a href="&#x2f;cms&#x2f;en&#x2f;careers&#x2f;why-us&#x2f;our-locations&#x2f;americas&#x2f;" class="link more">

					</a>
				
			</section>

					<section>
						







<div class="content teaser-sidebar">
	
		
	
	<a href="&#x2f;cms&#x2f;en&#x2f;careers&#x2f;job-descriptions&#x2f;sales-marketing&#x2f;" class="block-level" target="_blank">
		<h4>What is the job of our colleagues in Sales & Marketing?</h4>

		
		
		

		
			
			
			
				
				
				
				<figure>
					<img src="/export/sites/default/.data/job/_jobdetail-images/functional-areas-images/Mediapool_01-Reinraum-AMOR.jpg_1539246700.jpg" width="595" height="336" class="img-responsive " />
				</figure>
			
		

		
			<div class="copy">
					<p>We want our customers to be happy. That's why our sales &amp; marketing employees around the world look after our customers - globally as well as locally. </p>
			</div>
		
		
						<span class="link more">
							Sales & Marketing
						</span>
		
	</a>
	
	
		<ul class="linklist blue-button-link">
			
				<li>
					
						
					
					<a href="&#x2f;cms&#x2f;en&#x2f;careers&#x2f;job-descriptions&#x2f;sales-marketing&#x2f;field-application-engineer&#x2f;" target="_blank">

		</ul>
	
</div>

            </aside>
          
          
        </div>
      </div>
    </article>

			<a href="&#x2f;cms&#x2f;en&#x2f;careers&#x2f;professionals&#x2f;" class="block-level" target="_blank">
				
					<h4 >Careers for everyone</h4>
				
				
					<figure>
						<img src="/export/sites/default/.data/job/_jobdetail-images/entry-level-images/Flexibility-Grobitzsch.jpg_1539246700.jpg" width="595" height="336" alt="" class="img-responsive" />
					</figure>
				
				
					<div  class="copy"><p>We offer three equivalent career paths: the Technical Ladder for our technical experts, Management Careers for our executive personnel, and the Individual Contributor for our knowledge carriers.       s.server=window.location.hostname;

			s.hier1="home|en|careers|job search|job search |senior system application engineer - automotive power";

			/* Custom Conversion Variables, max 255 chars */

			s.eVar2=location.pathname.replace("/cms", "") + location.search; // relative page URL
			s.eVar3=s.prop3="D=g";
			s.eVar4="senior system application engineer - automotive power [en]";
			s.eVar5=s.prop5="en";
			s.eVar7="";
			s.eVar8=s.prop8="D=r";
			s.eVar10="careers"; // ok
			s.eVar21="f54dc891-86b7-11e4-9e8b-40f2e90e8d04";

      // save initial pageName, hier1 and 2 for later use
      // important for resetting to initial values (used in trackSinglePageSection)
      vi.trackingData.initialPageName = s.pageName;
      vi.trackingData.initialHier1 = s.hier1;
      vi.trackingData.initialHier2 = s.hier2;

			/* Custom Traffic Variables, max 100 chars  */
			s.prop2="D=v2";
			s.prop4= (typeof s.eVar4 === "string" && s.eVar4 != "") ? "D=v4" : "";
			s.prop6= "";
			s.prop7= "";
			s.prop9= (typeof s.eVar9 === "string" && s.eVar9 != "") ? "D=v9" : "";
			s.prop10= (typeof s.eVar10 === "string" && s.eVar10 != "") ? "D=v10" : "";
			s.prop11= (typeof s.eVar11 === "string" && s.eVar11 != "") ? "D=v11" : "";
			s.prop12="";
			s.prop16="Flash Player " + getFlashPlayerVersion();
			s.prop18="";
			s.prop21= (typeof s.eVar21 === "string" && s.eVar21 != "") ? "D=v21" : "";

      initSearchTrackingOnPageView();

      // set eVar22 - 28, generate from s.hier2;
      setAdditionalHierarchyVars(s.hier2, '|', 22, 28);

			/*** defer Adobe Analytics default pageView tracking to get userGroup from backend or cookie ***/
			// first try getting userGroup from cookie
      if (vi.helpers.getCookie('userGroup') != '') {
        s.eVar6=vi.helpers.getCookie('userGroup');
        var s_code=s.t();if(s_code)document.write(s_code);
      } else {
        // execute pageView tracking if userGroup not retrieved within 1.5 sec
        // eg. user not logged-in, no login on page or server doesn't respond
        var defaultTrackingTimeout = window.setTimeout(function() {
          s.eVar6='*empty*';
          // re-initialize search tracking, in case trackSearch was already executed
          initSearchTrackingOnPageView();
          var s_code=s.t();if(s_code)document.write(s_code);
          vi.trackingData.pageViewTrackingSent = true;
        }, 1500);

        // when user is logged-in, get userGroup and save in cookie
        $(window).on('vi.logged_in', function() {
          window.clearTimeout(defaultTrackingTimeout);
          if(typeof vi.trackingData.userGroup != 'undefined') {
            vi.helpers.setCookie('userGroup', vi.trackingData.userGroup, 365 * 20);
            s.eVar6 = vi.trackingData.userGroup;
          } else {
            s.eVar6 = '*empty*';
          }

          // execute tracking only if tracking request was not already sent
          if (!vi.trackingData.pageViewTrackingSent) {
            var s_code=s.t();if(s_code)document.write(s_code);
          }
        });
      }

			</script>
